name: Right smack 'n Central Hong Kong!!
description:
This is a great flat in a great location for a great price!

The space
This is the perfect place to stay in Hong Kong â€“ you can't beat the location, just a few minutes' walk from both Central and Sheung Wan stations, and right in the heart of the bustling streets of cafes and markets.
You have direct access to the pulsating melting pot of Soho with all the delicious restaurants, bars, clubs and Hong Kong's best coffee shop (Hazel&Hershey on Peel Street) is just around the corner. It's a 1 min walk to The Centre building (taxistand!), the escalator, NoHo area. It's in one of the last places in Central that still has small shops and street markets. I'm on the 4 th floor of a low rise, walk up building (no lift nor elevator!). The studio is bright, spacious enough for two people,( ok for 3, possible for 4 if they know each other well :-()) tidy and you will hardly find a better located place for a reasonable price like this.
I believe in great sleep so I'
host_about:
I'm from the Netherlands but I have been living in Hong Kong for the last 18 years. I work as a carpenter/builder/art handler and do projects all over the world. Last year my business partner Marcus and I started a rooftop and playground garden company. Our aim is to improve the life of our students and residents by changing concrete to jungle.
  I like skiing, yoga ( great stretch after a days building...) and baking and eating apple pie and muffins! As for the past... Schooled as a tailor and trained as a carpenter, I have hitch hiked from my village in Holland to Japan, took cargo ships to and from South America, taught English, Dutch and Spanish in Paraguay, tour guided in Patagonia, Bolivia and Chile for 3 years, cycled from Dehli to Hong Kong on Indian bicycles and had some more adventures in between and after.

host_location: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong
host_about:
I am Chinese & was brought up in the UK and born in Malaysia, but lived in Hong Kong for over 30 years now.

My childhood was spent mainly travelling around with my family of  5 siblings as my father was stationed at several British Army bases around Malaysia, Singapore, Hong Kong & the UK. Therefore, I enjoy travelling & meeting people of different cultures.

I have travelled to Europe & the States during my student days & most of my family members have now settled in the States & the UK.

I preferred to settle in Hong Kong as the place is as vibrant as the people who play hard, & work hard here. Hong Kong has a 'buzz' you cannot find anywhere else in the world. 

It has been interesting living through the changes from the British colonial days to the handover back to China, & being part of 'history', & revealing of the versatility of the people here to the changing times to not just strive, but thrive in various aspects of their lives & livelihood.

Hong Kong brings out the best & worst in you... ^_^

Electronic Room safe

neighborhood_overview:
Made internationally famous by the 1960 film The World of Suzie Wong, historic Wan Chai is not just Hong Kongâ€™s party district; by day itâ€™s a pleasant neighbourhood for wandering and shopping.
Dotted along Queen's Road East are a number of excellent rattan and Chinese furniture shops that will happily arrange to have your purchases sent home for you or, for competitively priced clothing, try Spring Garden Lane where stalls offload garments originally earmarked for export. Techies wonâ€™t complain about getting lost in the Wanchai Computer Centre on Hennessy Road; a building jam-packed with hardware, software, accessories and other gadgets. And both kids and â€˜kidultsâ€™ might want to check out Tai Yuen Street; an entire strip of toys touting everything from the latest to the classics.

I am a two-kids mother. I lived and worked in Hong Kong.
Every year I'll travel to different cities.
I look forward to meeting you and sharing advice and recommendation about this wonderful city.

host_location: Wan Chai, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong
host_about:
I love to meet different people and visit to other places, visiting the local farmer's market and experience and live like a local using bnb.  

I have been airbnb host since 2011 for 7 years already.  So Glad to have over 670 guest reviews!!  We work so hard to keep happy guests but only 20% of guests spend their precious time to write reviews :-)  CHEERS to all supportive new guests, return guests and referred guests.  I hope to serve you better.  Please do give us private feedback anytime and I valued your feedback and will improve my apartments.  I am so glad many of you appreciate all the hard work and bare with the occasionally 1% silly mistake / fault / defect I have made.  Thank you so much for your patient.  

Again, should you need anything during your stay, don't be shy, please do let me know via calling or email me.  I am more than happy to provide suggestion / immediate assistant / support as soon as possible.

*********************************************************************************
FOR NEW airbnb user, below are some of the FAQ links for your perusal (questions & answers useful for new user). Please do let me know if you have any problem, my response would be faster than airbnb support team as sometimes their hotline as very busy (but I only can help you on general question).

GENERAL FAQ for guests before booking 
www.airbnb.com/help/topic/traveling

FAQ: What are Airbnb Service Fees? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/104

FAQ: For How to Book 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/85

FAQ: For How to make a payment / reservation 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/126

FAQ: For How to Contact Airbnb Support 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/9

FAQ: How and when do I make a payment for my reservation? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/92

FAQ: How can I view or print a billing receipt or itinerary for my trip? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/100

FAQ: How are cleaning fees added? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/58

FAQ: How does the Airbnb payment system work? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/51

We strongly recommend reviewing all cancellation policies before making your reservations: www.airbnb.com/home/cancellation_policies?guest_fee_policy=grace_period_48_hours#strict-with-grace

FAQ: When do I pay for my long-term reservation?
www.airbnb.com/help/question/245

Due to the reason that Sep-Apr is peak season, you are advised to make your reservation earlier.   I can only do first book first serve basis, where I won't cancel current booking just because other guests have a longer / bigger booking.  Due to strict cancellation policy, I haven't cancel guest booking so far, except from time to time having guest need to cancel or amend their booking due to different reason and we will considerate case by case (so far only full refund to 1 group of guest as they are able to provide document to proof that their immediate family member need emergency operation). 

Max Capacity is cater to big group consists of family n kids with standard asian size.  If group with members with huge body size or some members prefer to have a bed by their own, not sharing with other, then please split your group into two apartments for more comfortable stay.  I have tried my best to write the apartment description as detail as I could. Please spend time to read through before you book.  I am definitely happy to answer any question that is not in the apartment description.


Contact Number and Email Information will only be released until a booking is made. 

Below is the FAQ on airbnb â€œWhy canâ€™t I call or email a host before booking?â€: www.airbnb.com/help/question/111

Hope this helps you get to know how airbnb works :-)

name: yau ma tei 3 beds
description:
The space
Location:
This apt is located next to Langham Place luxury mall Mong Kok, 5 minutes away fromYau ma tei (MTR) exit A2.

Banks in the area: ICBC, HSBC, BEA, Citibank, Argricultural Bank of China and ICBC.

Pharmacies/beauty stores: Watsons, Mannings, Bonjour, SaSa.

Shopping: Langham Place, Mong Kok Centre, New Town Mall, Ladies Street, Sport Shoes Street, Trendy Zone etc.

24hrs convenience stores & supermarkets are plentiful in the area.

Accessibility: Mong Kok is the heart of Hong Kong, buses along Nathan road will take you to any part of the island. If you are getting around by the MTR, this is the approximate travelling time to each location:

Admiralty (Ocean Park) - 10 minutes
Central - 12 minutes
Disney Land - 30 minutes

name: Convenient,Cosy 2 BR Apt in Wanchai
description:
Our 2 bedrooms apartment is perfect for families and friends. A stone throw away from Wanchai MTR station, tram stop, bus stop, and Wanchai ferry pier.
Enjoy the restaurants, convention center and Southorn Playground which is just around the corner

The space
Located in the heart of wanchai, the apartment is located near Wanchai MTR, only a 2 min walk away.
It has 2 bedrooms with double bed in each of them . It can accommodate 4 people comfortably. It also has a well-equipped kitchen, dining table in the dining area and a living room with sofa and flat screen tv.

The apartment is close to the Central, Admiralty & Causeway area.
- 2 min walk to Wanchai MTR station,
- 2 min walk to the rows of restaurants and food places behind the apartment
- 5 min walk to the Convention & Exhibition Centre, Central Plaza, Hopewell Centre, Wanchai bar area.
- 10 minutes walk to Causeway Bay SOGO, Times Square,
Hysan Place and Paci
neighborhood_overview:
Bus, tram, minibus, Ferry terminals (to TST) ,MTR and Airport bus (A11, E11) are all within few mins walk from the building, providing services to every part of Hong Kong till mid night.
It is close to the Pacific Place, Admiralty, Lan Kwai Fong, the H K Convention & Exhibition Center,
The immigration Center,Time square, Sogo Dept store. Hysan Place. There are plenty of restaurants, bar ,Supermarket, 7-11, McDonald's are all just downstairs and open 24 hrs a day, shopping place is also around the area. Regal L hotel is just opposite the apartment.

Party area:
- Lan Kwai Fong, a 8 min tram ride from the tram station just below the apartment. Any tram will take you to Lan Kwai Fong.
- Lockhart Road, a 10 min walk to the rows of bars and pubs in the start of Wanchai district
- The Pawn, 5min walk away to drink in the pubs in the historical building

Eating area:
- 24h McDonalds just below the house
- Japanese food, local Hon
host_about:
I am a friendly person, educated in England studying Hotel and Catering Mangement .I am married with a 4 years old son called Yung. and I have a pet dog, his name is Teddy.
I am a fun loving person. Love to go movie  'three idiots ' is one of my most favorite film, I enjoy cooking and music listening and am a keen concert goer.
And I like travel especially cruise trip. have been to Alaska, Asia, Africa & many European countries, most like city is Prague.  Planning to go to Tuscany for one month next year and will use airbnb.
Meeting & hosting people from all over the world is one of my  dream and thanks to airbnb, my dream has came true.

description:
PLEASE read the description of the flat before you make your reservation! Thank you!

Great value for Excellent access to all the high lights of kowloon. 3 minutes walk from MK station, 2 minutes from Nathan Road, the night market and birdcage walk.

The space
This is a wonderful clean and cozy apartment with a rare special love cage balcony that hardly can be seen in this busy crowded area, and it just has been newly renovated.

Location:
The apartment is located at the cross road of Sai Yeung Choi Street and Shantung Street which is in the most popular downtown heart of all ages in HK.

Guest access
1.4m splendid super comfy & clean double size bed is provided in this cozy home , can accommodate 2 adults freely.

What I have prepared for you :

Air-Conditioner
Cable TV
Table with Chairs
Hair Dryer
Standard Bed & Mattress
Cabinets
1-Door Refrigerator
neighborhood_overview:
The streets lined with shopping malls, open-air bazaars with a wide variety of shops around.

Within walking distance , you can easily reach large shopping malls like - Langham Place , New Century Plaza , Sino Centre , Hollywood shopping center , the first of the square , the trend of the SAR , the new city center and the Grand Tower etc.

Mong Kok streets are famous for its unique characteristics , such as Western Choi Street , Sneaker Street , Kwong Wah Street ( gun Street ) , Ladies Street, Bird Street , Garden Street , Flower Market Street , Goldfish Street etc.

Mong Kok is a shopping paradise where you can buy whatever you could think of and easy to get lovely or freaky interesting souvenirs back for family and friends, it is definitely worthy to have a walk around even not interested in buying anything.

Thousand restaurants downstairs offer different style of food from all over the world that you could absolutely get excited about!

neighborhood_overview: Causeway Bay is a true microcosm of Hong Kongâ€™s shopping scene, with up-market fashion to be found in Lee Gardens, and Fashion Walk, mid-price and luxury goods in SOGO Department Store and wtc more, affordable youth fashion boutiques in the warren of shops that make up the Island Beverly Centre, and bargains galore at the chaotic Jardineâ€™s Crescent street market. And, in between all this, are yet even more shops specialising in everything from shoes, to electronics, computers, skin care, snacks, home accessories and more â€“ overwhelming doesnâ€™t begin to describe it!

name: Hidden Gem! 1 Bed in Fabulous Soho
description:
Location and space! Best of both worlds in the heart of buzzing Soho / Central.

My spacious apartment has a queen bed and it is right in the heart of the coolest part of HK. It's literally directly behind the old prison!!

The space
**The space is about 600 sq ft (55 sq m), completely renovated and refurnished.
**There's a nice comfy queen size bed that sleeps two
**The living space is large with TV (you can plug in HDMI) and I've a dining table for 4 which is quite useful to stay in and eat.
**Kitchen / Appliances: fridge, gas stove, kettle, cooking utensils etc
**Bathroom: toilet, shower
**A soft touch: Towels, bed linen, hair dryer
** Wifi available
** No washer but there is laundry service round the corner of the building
** There is another room which I keep my stuff locked up in there

Guest access
I'll be sharing my home with you so you're really my house guests!
Welcome to Hon
neighborhood_overview:
**SoHo / LKF is the coolest and trendiest neighborhood in Hong Kong right now. All kinds of nice restaurants, bars, boutiques and shops are within steps from the apartment!
**Personally, I've lived in the area for the past 12 years and I love it! It's so awesome I can't wait to share it with you! :)
host_about:
Hi everyone! 

Other than work, I'm an aspired yogi, a keen hiker and an avid traveller. I love sun and beach, getting a tan and being in the ocean.

One thing about me is that I was an architecture student and studied conservation. I absolutely LOVE old buildings! I love traveling to different cities and looking at their unique architecture. You see, Hong Kong is pretty much a concrete jungle, but I still managed to find the coolest spot to live. My apartment overlooks into the old colonial prison!! It's a rare hidden gem!

name: Luxury Penthouse w/ Panoramic view in Hong Kong
description:
Located above Central on the convenient address MacDonnell Road, newly renovated in 2013, the apartment features luxury amenities and panoramic views. Baby crib, stroller and care amenities available upon request. Helper and car services available.

The space
The 1050 sqft apartment is centrally located 5 minutes taxi ride away from Central, unique for its panoramic view of the city, expansive open layout, and luxury amenities.

On the 27th floor of the St Louis Mansion, the apartment has a panoramic sea view of the city, 3 floor to ceiling windows offers tremendous natural light with stunning views at night.

The living room is arranged with a custom made sofa with optimal views of all three windows. Guest can enjoy facilities, such as a 57" TV offer cable channels to CNN, BBC, CNBC Bloomberg, Discovery Channel, etc.

The open kitchen include all kitchen ware facilities, infra-red panels, washing machine and microwave.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment building is located at a 20-22 MacDonnell Road, one of the most prestigious address in Hong Kong's luxury residential neighborhood.

5 Minutes Taxi ride to Central Business District and Admiralty. What I love most about my neighborhood is its prime location of convenience as well as its surrounding of being safe and steps way from transportation.
host_about: An university instructor, investor, and I have a passion for hospitality.   I love the idea of creating a remarkable and beyond expectation experience for my guest, because I believe any guest who make their way to Hong Kong deserves the best experience.  Hope my team and I have the opportunity to host you in Hong Kong!
neighbourhood: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

name: Luxurious Rural Retreat, Lantau
description:
Think suite of rooms. Our newly renovated apartment is situated in a charming, Mui Wo village in the heart of Hong Kong's green belt, Hong Kong as you have never seen it! Located on Lantau Island yet only 30 min by fast ferry from Hong Kong's famous Central district.

When you stay with us we offer unrestricted and very private access to the living room, balcony, dining area, bathroom and kitchen.

The space
Your suite is located on Lantau Island in the rural valley of Mui Wo, Hong Kong's outdoor activity hub. This is the perfect place for either an activity based getaway or a relaxing sunbathing break on a tropical beach. Lantau offers a diverse range of opportunities and Mui Wo is the gateway to them. Hiking, mountain biking, cycling, swimming, surfing, sea-kayaking or sunbathing with a chilled beer. It's Hong Kong as you have never seen it. No noise, farmers working hard in their organic farms and lots of native bird life. It's hard to believe th
neighborhood_overview: A very traditional indigenous Chinese village.  In our village the temple, dedicated to the god Pak Tai, is the focal point of all meetings and celebrations.  The village has a very large square that traditionally was used for drying rice, today, you could be lucky and be present for one of the temple's amazing celebrations complete with firecrackers and lions.  Usually the village square is used for sitting out talking and for children to play in.  This village really is Hong Kong 40 years ago!
host_about: We've been hosting on Airbnb since 2014.  It's been an amazing experience, we've hosted hundreds of people from around the world and taken great joy in showing what Hong Kong and Lantau Island in particular can offer.  It's a real joy to show our guests that the great outdoors is available in Hong Kong, it's on our doorstep and yet we are only 30 min away from the busselling heart of Central, Hong Kong.
neighbourhood: Islands District, New Territories, Hong Kong

name: CWB Beautiful Studio w/ NEW renos *2B
description:
Lovely studio apartment with kitchenette in the heart of Causeway Bay, unit was renovated and updated again in May 2016. The apartment is a shopaholic's dream come true as it's 3 minutes walking distance from the shopping areas. Foodies will also appreciate the diverse selection of great food.

The space
*PLEASE message me first before making a booking thanks.

The apartment is newly renovated and features a kitchen and ample room for two. You will be hard pressed to find a better deal on Hong Kong Island! Please note there are 2 other units right next to this one so if this unit is booked please check out the other ones:

https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/2970536
https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/2970176

Guest access
The studio is located on the second floor of a traditional Chinese building (with no elevator). Despite being on the second floor, the unit faces a courtyard which makes it tranquil during your peaceful sleeping
neighborhood_overview:
Causeway Bay is a fantastic area to stay in Hong Kong. Just shopping alone could take days as there are over a dozen malls within 5 minutes of the apartment with both high end and low end shopping.

Whether you're craving for local food or Western, Japanese, south east Asian, you name it... Causeway Bay's got it! The neighborhood is filled with fantastic restaurants and bars.
host_about:
Thank you for checking out our listing! To let you know a little bit more about us, we run a service apartment company called Tane Residence. Currently, we operate more than 90 units in Hong Kong and over 20 units in Vietnam. We are rapidly expanding this network, opening between 20 to 30 new properties every year.

Our tastefully decorated apartments blends the best of worlds - homely comforts and modern design to offer a unique stay.  

We value offering our customers outstanding service, excellent experience and great value for money. With a team that works 7 days a week to answer emails and ensure the needs of our guests are taken care of, we are proud to offer top notch customer service support.

IMPORTANT: All photos here are for REFERENCE ONLY. Please message me to confirm if the room is available or not. There is NO move in after 7 pm. There is a Flat share agreement to sign with us if you decide to confirm the booking with us, and a Hong Kong Government stamp Duty to pay to the Hong Kong Government Tax which is usually less than HK$ 100 AND a Key Deposit $ 500 which is refundable when you move out with us. It is mandated by Hong Kong law that a tenant and landlord / principal tenant have to sign a tenancy agreement to make the deal legal.
Thank You for Understanding.

The apartment has bed, sofa, washing machine, fridge, pots and pans, microwave, desk, chair, Wifi internet, all the kitchen utensils, blanket, curtain, pillows etc.



Start with the historic Western Market, which offers an array of handicraft shops nestled inside an Edwardian-style mall. To the west is Dried Seafood Street, Wing Lok Street and Bonham Strand West, where locals head to purchase dried abalone, scallops and other pungent products for soups and tonics. Make sure to drop into Koh Shing Stree

name: Room in Tin Hau
description:
This room, located in the heart of Hong Kong, is highly affordable, easy access to shops, bars, restaurants, convenient stores, MTR & buses. To share: bathroom, kitchen and living room.

The space

name: Sai Ying Pun MTR 1 min walk withrooftop terrace 63
description:
Take a break on your rooftop terrace perfect after a long day in the city, this cozy 1 bdrm aprt with all the fixings of a modern studio is situated conveniently near public transport and the Sun Yat Sun Memorial Pool&Park,traditional HK at its best.

The space
This One Bedroom apartment is conveniently located in Sheung Wan (near Central). The private rooftop area offers nice city and sea view of Hong Kong and is a great place to wind down after a busy day in the city shopping, eating, meeting, etc.

It is tastefully renovated and includes:
- FREE WiFi
- an open kitchen, electric burner, refrigerator with freezer.
- one bedroom with large double bed occupying and one single bed.
- large flat screen TV on a wall mount for viewing from the living room, NOW Cable TV, and a DVD player.
- Hair Dryer

The apartment is on the 11th floor and has a nice glimpse of the ferries coming into the harbor.

The apartment i
neighborhood_overview: The Sheung Wan neighbourhood is ever changing and a fantastic mix of "old' and "new" Hong Kong.  This apartment is located in the heart of Hong Kong's commercial, cultural and shopping districts and within short walking distance to the subway and HK Macau Ferry Pier.  A few minutes walk away from the harbour front and the fantastic Sun Yat Sun Memorial Park and Public swimming pool over look the world famous Victoria Harbor.
host_about: I was born in California and raised in Hong Kong. Went to college in the states and returned to Hong Kong a few years ago.  I absolutely love travelling around the region but Hong Kong has always welcomed me home and I look forward to showing off my home town and sharing all the little insights and local specialities with all my guests!
amenities: ["Shampoo", "Air conditioning", "Essentials", "Heating", "Kitchen", "Elevator", "TV", "Wifi", "Fire extinguisher", "Cable TV"]

name: Wanchai cozy 3BR+2Bath for 5 (Heart of HK)
description:
Located in the heart of Wanchai, the fully furnished apartment has 3 bedrooms (1 double bed, 1 single bed (bunk) and 1 bunk bed), 2 bathrooms with showers and is equipped with a kitchen and a washing machine.

The apartment is about a 5 min walk from the Wan Chai MTR station, and is also close to trams and buses. There are countless restaurants and shops in the neighbourhood.

Pls understand apartments in HK might not be as spacious as those in your home country. Our 3 single beds are bunk beds.

The space
Our apartment is modern, clean and simple. We have paintings hung on the walls that will be changed from time to time.

In the apartment we provide clean beddings and towels to every guest (not including toothbrushes and slippers). There is cable TV in the living room and Wi-Fi access for our guests.

The access to the lift in the building is easy and direct. Big luggage and baby stroller are fine.

The size of t
neighborhood_overview:
Very convenient for everything. And most people staying in this district are very friendly.

Where to go and what to do in HK?
A: There are lots of things to do in Hong Kong. I suggest the following websites where the most updated information is summarized:
Timeout - HK
KLOOK - HK
Discoverhongkong

For foods in HK, local people use this website and think they are reliable:
OPENRICE - HK
All restaurants in Wanchai District and most restaurants in Causeway Bay District are within walking distance.

name: 1BR Super Convenient Kowloon near 2 MTR 500mb WiFi
description:
*REVAMPED UNIT* recent feedback had us check the place carefully.

* Please quickly message to give basic info about your stay and guests.

* With super location between Jordan and Yau Ma Tei - located in the middle of the Subway map, giving access to all major MTR routes.

* Close to 2 MTRs, Both the red and green line / daily night market, Skyline daily light-show, Star ferry, Jade market, malls, airport buses / airport express train (Kowloon St) with free shuttle bus downstairs, more.

The space
Located in a central spot of Kowloon. Experience the real Hong Kong vibe around the area. Getting to other locations is quick & easy. There is everything you need here at anytime, this area bustles 24/7, 365 days a year!

The location is just a few minutes walk to both Jordan and Yau Ma Tei Subway MTR stations.

There is a bus just downstairs which goes straight to the airport too, good to know!

Guest acc
neighborhood_overview:
The Neighborhood

Just by Temple Street Night market, Jade market and Nathan Road. A few stations away from Kowloon harbor front, and even within walking distance. Near great shopping spots in Kowloon and very well located for taxi, bus / MTR / airport express.
host_about:
Look forward to hosting you! 

For any questions please feel free to contact me, sorry for any delays as per time difference.

name: 1 bdrm shared apartment @ HK Uni 1
description:
Large apartment a few minutes from Hong Kong University, lots of nice and hip restaurants and drinking holes nearby, it's a perfect location for travellers looking for a bit of local flare and entertainment. Very popular location for HK Uni students

The space
Located in Mid-levels West, near the Hong Kong University Campus, Queen Mary Hospital and situated brilliantly located in the city with plenty of easy public transport access nearby to get all over Hong Kong. A revamp of the area has brought a lot of fantastic new restaurants and bars into the trendy High Street neighbourhood.

This is a private room in a large shared flat and offers a large comfy double bed in the room, FREE Wifi, hair dryer, large LCD TV with entertainment DVD system.

This apartment is located on the 4th floor of a traditional Hong Kong low rise building, it is an easy walk up via well lit interior stairwell.

It's a perfect place to stay to get some ni
host_about: I was born in California and raised in Hong Kong. Went to college in the states and returned to Hong Kong a few years ago.  I absolutely love travelling around the region but Hong Kong has always welcomed me home and I look forward to showing off my home town and sharing all the little insights and local specialities with all my guests!

name: INCREDIBLE Architect Design DUPLEX
description:
oOo ENTIRE Second Floor Unit only oOo

Rare village house from the 1980s sitting on the hillside overlooking the rich green mountains and concrete city from a distance. Located about 3-5mins walk from Shatin MTR, this is truly a hidden gem sheltered by nature. Safe and secured location requiring to take some stairs to reach an architect designed home. BOOK EARLY!

The space
- ENTIRE 2nd floor (750sq. ft.) with a gorgeous view.
- ONLY 28 days or above are considered.
- 90m of moderate slope & stairs to the unit.
- 400m / 5-10mins walk from Shatin MTR.
- MAX CAPACITY: 6 people in the unit.
- Ideal: Expats, HKSTP & CUHK students.
- DO NOT bring multiple luggages.
- NO viewings & FLAT rates.

Guest access
# LG Washing & Drying machine w/ detergent.
# WHIRLPOOL air-conditioner w/ remote.
# Coffee machine w/ coffee & Tea packs.
# High powered gas heater shower.
# DOVE shampoo & Shower
neighborhood_overview:
- Pai Tau Village is a nature oriented environment.
- Located near tourist attraction points, the duplex owns its private spot in the area.
- Town Centre / New Town Plaza is the biggest and busiest shopping mall in New Territories. 9 floors high with over 400 stores. (Opening hours: Monday - Sunday 10am - 10pm).
- Ideal for students in: (i) City University of Hong Kong / CityUHK, (ii) Chinese University of Hong Kong / CUHK, (iii) Hong Kong Design Institue / HKDI
- Local restaurants are only 2 minutes walk; the area is also near: (i)Government offices, (ii)JP Morgan, (iii)IKEA.
host_about:
Hello everyone and an advance welcome to Hong Kong. I love to travel, explore and meet people around the world. Airbnb allows me to achieve all that. I love architecture and continuously think of new ways to offer a home feeling to my guests. I turn my guests into friends, so I know the key ingredients of a 5* stay. I am looking for guests who are friendly, easy going and respectful.

Your safety, security and comfort are my top priorities, so once your reservation is accepted; rest assured, you are in the safest hands. I treat my guests like long lost friends, so expect a warm welcome from me when you check in.

I respect religious freedom; however, my place will not cater for any special religious worship or practices. I will also not cater any rude guests, guests with hotel expectations and guests who do not agree with my house rules. Thank you for reading and wish you all a safe and pleasant trip ahead.
neighbourhood: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong

name: Oceanview 1 bed apt, BRAND NEW reno
description:
One bedroom apartment in Discovery Bay, tucked away in a quiet neighbourhood with access to a playground downstairs and a 5 min walk to the plaza- where the shops and restaurants are. Cleaning services available weekly. B&O sound and TV system, Miele kitchen.

The space
Unique interior with open kitchen plan
Double bed in room with extra double sofabed in living room. Wifi, DVD and TV all provided.
Fresh linens and basic necessities provided in the pantry and kitchen.

Guest access
Access to playground downstairs
Cleaning service 1x or 2x per week depending on length of stay.

Other things to note
Please contact me if you plan on staying longer than one week. We have extra discounts for extended stays.

host_about:
Hello everyone and an advance welcome to Hong Kong. I love to travel, explore and meet people around the world. Airbnb allows me to achieve all that. name: Midlevels Modern Apartment with Peak Views
description:
BOOK IN FOR CHRISTMAS - DON'T MISS OUT
Stylish, modern 1600sqf 3 bedroom apartment + media room (with pull-out sofa accommodating 1 adult), 2 bathrooms & sleeps up to 6 guests! Immaculate minimalist designer home with all mod cons - Wifi, 2 flat screen Sony Bravia TV's - a 55inch & one used for Sony PS4, washing machine/dryer, dishwasher, air-con throughout, wonderful views from most rooms to The Peak and is centrally located minutes from Soho and the CBD

The space
We love our home as it is centrally located to all of HK's vibrant shopping, bar and restaurant scene, you get beautiful views of the Peak mountain from most rooms, and it is child friendly with loads of fun toys and books for your little ones. It comfortably sleeps up to 6 guests (1 king bed in master bedroom, a bunk bed in the second bedroom, a further single bed in the third bedroom and a fold out double sofa bed in the media room perfect for one adult, or 2 small children). It is located on th
neighborhood_overview: Midlevels is a fun, bustling neighbourhood between the stunning Peak mountain and world famous shopping in Central. Access to Midlevels escalator is 1minute away taking you straight down into Soho, Central, IFC and the Star Ferry
host_about: We are an Australian expat family of five living in vibrant and fun Hong Kong - my husband is an architect and I am currently working alongside an interior designer helping create fabulous spaces in peoples' homes and designing ottomans on the side. I had previously worked in hotel and fashion PR and event management back when we lived in Sydney (15 years ago!). We have 3 children, twins aged 10 and an older child aged 13. We adore Asia and all it has to offer, especially HK which is so eclectic, busy and constantly surprising. My husband and I have a passion for design, architecture, photography and interiors and as a family we all love hiking Hong Kong's many trails, visiting art galleries, travelling, dining out and socialising.

name: Stunning FULL harbourview, 2 beds, high floor.
description:
Comfortable, conveniently located apartment (970sqft) on HK Island with a fully loaded kitchen, full amenities that's suitable for up to 6 people.

Large open living room, windows with super high views over the Victoria Harbour

Large master bedroom w/ en-suite bathroom, single bedroom with bunk bed, double foldout sofa bed in living room and guest bathroom with double sized shower.

The space
Huge, bright, sunny, comfortable, modern open plan living room. 3 seat sofa with folds out to a large double sofa bed, and 2 lounge chairs, a writing chair and a double writing desk. Big 7.5 x 3.2m living room, very unusual for Hong Kong.

Super high floor. Full floor to ceiling windows, superb westward facing views over the Victoria Harbour, perfect for city, island views, dawn and sunset.

Views over HK Island- Causeway Bay, Wanchai, Central, Victoria Peak and TST in Kowloon and Lantau island. The Harbour laser show is every ni
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is in Fortress Hill, a leisurely 10 minute walk through Victoria Park (the biggest park in HK) next to the always popular Causeway Bay shopping / night area.

This little quiet neighbourhood pocket still has a great feel of the old local HK character with lots of small locally run enterprises surrounding it.

400m walking distance from Tin Hau's very own 'food street' on neighbouring Electric Road.

50+ restaurants within a 5 minute walk: Chinese Dim Sum, Hot Pot, Seafood, Dai pai Dongs, Thai, Japanese Sushi, Vietnamese Pho, Korean BBQ, various Noodles, Western cafes, Bars, Dessert etc all open to at least 10pm every night.

They are all open everyday for breakfast, brunch, lunch, afternoon teas sets and dinner and late night too.

Starbucks, McDonalds, Burger King nearby.

Electric road carries on to Tung Lo Wan road and down to the very popular bohemian village of Tai Hang, again both are lined with sm
host_about:
Fun easy going, outgoing guy with an interest and passion for classic cars, motorbikes, architecture, history, travel, hiking, sailing, swimming and enjoying the outdoors! 

5 things I can't live without:
Thai food!
Summer!
Exploring beaches!
Traveling - Just returned from the arctic circle!
Windsurfing!

As a host:

Think you will find me as a relateable person easy to talk to as I enjoy travelling around the world (40+ countries and counting!). Feel free to contact me thru email,phone, or (Hidden by Airbnb) and I would be happy to tell you more about myself!

name: Central Park vibe in ultra-trendy Causeway Bay
description:
Uber-convenient, private room in sunny 3-BDR apartment with a fabulous view of Victoria Park located in shopping and foodie heaven Causeway Bay. Easy airport access, a 24-hour supermarket and M&S Foods a 3-min walk away, shopping, trendy eating spots, cafes and roof-top bars...need we say more? Oh and homemade muffins, nespresso coffee ... and turtles for entertainment!

The space
The view...and the host! No, seriously, one may never leave my balcony once they fall for the view. The apartment is large and sunny, perfect for lounging around on those rainy days. And it is unbelievably convenient no matter what your fancy!

Guest access
Shared bathroom with the host, so no towels on the floor please!

Other things to note
Almost always have freshly baked muffins available for snacking!
neighborhood_overview: CWB is known as the neighbourhood that doesn't sleep. 24-hour supermarkets, shopping till 10pm, restaurants from Japanese to Indian abound, great Japanese cocktail bars and karaoke and massages! I love that I can run out and get milk at the 24-hour supermarket or M&S Foods, shop til I drop, eat amazing Japanese food or eat yummy wonton noodles on the street, or go upscale at my favourite cocktail bar. CWB is the perfect, central location for seeing and doing HK the right way.
host_location: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong
host_about: Addicted to travel myself, I much prefer the more personal experience Airbnb offers over the dreary, small hotel room, and believe it helps make the trip that much more special. Also having someone point you in the right direction for good eats and fun drinking spots also helps! I believe good food and wine makes the world a better place, so like-minded travellers always welcome!

name: Yellow Bamboo Bay
description:
Breakfast coffee on the balcony?! Peaceful, comfortable apartment overlooking the village & sea with super easy transport network to the nearby towns & country park.
Warning- Not for guests with hip/knee issues as short hill & 2 staircases.

The space
The location is fantastic! I love living here! Super comfortable inside, great to chill in or sit and do online work. The neighbourhood is very peaceful and I feel like I'm on holiday every time I go out on the balcony. I have a beautiful rescue cat called Sassy who is very timid of strangers at first, but loves to play if you will- and will equally leave you alone and sunbathe on the window sill. Please never ever leave windows or doors open where she can escape.

Shared bathroom with large, powerful shower, kitchen has all mod cons if you want to cook, juice veggies or bake a cake! Breakfast items available to help yourself.

I have my own office at home. I do go off sailing around Asia at
neighborhood_overview: Fairly peaceful with nice neighbours. Quite a few village elders around with the odd street cat. Dogs only bark when you stand outside their territory.

host_about:
Love animals and the sea. Jack of all Trades. Love music, the environment and I am a vegetarian. I love travelling to Philippines and Thailand. If there's a beach and water I'm happy.

Born and bred Hong Kong expat.

~one life. live it.~

name: 500MB WIFI: Near 2 MTR stations (Red/Green lines)
description:
Super convenient. Unbeatable location in KLN between Jordan & Yau Ma Tei MTR stations. Airport bus downstairs.

*There is a review which mentions bedbugs - and I did not have the chance to reply. The man's rashes did not look like bedbug bites. I am accused of replying quickly - it's because I care and want the issue resolved pronto.

We checked and there was indeed bed bugs, the first time in my 6 years as host of 10+ properties. We have addressed the issue with a pest control company.

The space
The studio is always maintained well, cleaned well and feels cosy and safe inside. It is well equipped with things for basic living to make life on the go easier.

Experience the real Hong Kong vibe around the area. Getting to other locations is quick & easy. There is everything you need here at anytime, this area bustles 24/7, 365 days a year!

The location is just a few minutes walk to both Jordan and Yau Ma Tei Subway MTR st
neighborhood_overview:
The Neighborhood

Just by Temple Street Night market, Jade market and Nathan Road. A few stations away from Kowloon harbor front, and even within walking distance. Near great shopping spots in Kowloon and very well located for taxi, bus / MTR / airport express.

The airport bus is located on Nathan road just near the entrance of the building
host_about:
Look forward to hosting you! 

For any questions please feel free to contact me, sorry for any delays as per time difference.

neighborhood_overview:
Mong Kok is one of Hong Kong's liveliest districts and includes popular markets, shopping streets, stalls and malls. The neon-bathed historic streets that wind through one of the densest parts of the world are worth visiting.

The neighbourhood includes one of Hong Kongâ€™s most popular markets, the Ladies' Market, and also has a ton of shopping streets, which are a common feature in southern China. Conveniently, these are where a cluster of merchants sell one type of product on a single street. Mong Kok has entire streets and street sections dedicated to the sale of goldfish, flowers, birds, sneakers, and kitchenware.

ãƒ»Sai Yeung Choi Street sells electronics, cosmetics and clothes.
ãƒ»Shantung Street and Dundas Street are where you can pick up the latest Japanese and Western fashion and accessories.
ãƒ»Langham Place is one of the many malls where you can do your Mong Kok shopping in air-conditioned comfort.

I am from Hong Kong, I love travelling to explore something new. I am a web-editor of a women website in HK, i also have a personal blog, and i love to share my travel experience with my readers and friends.

as a host, i have private rooms to rent (where in Mongkok), and i am familiar with food & beverage & beauty products, please feel free to contact me for suggestions on dining and shopping. hope that i can help u to enjoy more during ur stay in Hong Kong. =)

name: North Point's hidden treasure!
description:
An oasis in a bustling city. Conveniently located near everything but quiet with a private yard

The space
We have a spacious apartment on the first floor (with a lift) in North point. North point is amazing! It's a very local neighborhood yet close to everything. There's a shanghai barber shop (open air, alley way "salon" where you can get a cut and a shave), a bustling cooked food market with a Michelin star establishment in it! There are lots of funky streets to explore. Yet it's only 6 minutes to Causeway Bay and 12 min to Central by MTR, a 3 minute taxi ride to Quarry Bay, and a 6 minute ferry ride across to Hung Hom on Kowloon side.
The flat has an open kitchen with a full size oven, microwave and fridge /freezer. The Sofa in the living room pulls out into a proper double bed. The bedroom has a queen size bed and the small room has a single sofa bed. The bathroom has a rain shower and a bathtub.
And then there is the 300 sq.ft. outside private y
neighborhood_overview: North Point still has the charm of Hong Kong of yester year. The neighborhood is buzzing with traditional food stalls and a historic wet market with the tram running straight through. If you are looking for up and coming new food or affordable Michelin star North Point is hard to beat.
host_about: I am a foodie who loves to read and watch movies. I am your basic culture geek who loves to explore new places and meet new people.

name: Cozy Studio near Mongkok
description:
Just 10 minutes walk from Prince Edward subway Station.
24 Hours Security.
Free High Speed Internet and Wifi.

The space
It is a studio type apartment. No bed room. Just like a hotel room with bathroom, size is about 313 sq ft. A Queen size bed is on the platform and an extra bed is stored under the platform. The living room is good enough for 2 people to enjoy drinks/coffee while listening to Music and reading magazines.

10 minutes walk to Prince Edward MTR station. 15-20 minutes from Olympic station. From airport, take airport express and get off at Kowloon Station, then get a taxi. 5 minutes to a shopping mall.

It is a quiet neighborhood. In fact, the building is in industrial area, so it will be very busy in the day, but quiet at night. Not much eat/drink at nearby, but 10 minutes to Mongkok where you can get lots of entertainment there.

Mini Fridge, Kettle, Hair Dryer, Towels are provided.

* 10 minutes wa

name: A gem in  HK Island  (next to a brand new hotel)
description:
Bright & sunny room with Queen Size bed in a lovely flat in North Point, with shared toilet (but mostly for yourself ), access to kitchen, washing machine & dryer & close to everything with easy transport and serrounded by 3 hotels.

You can find restaurants, malls, market are within walking distance. Immerse yourself in the locality of Hong Kong.

The space
The flat is lovely and very clean in a 735 sqf flat. There are 2 toilets in the flat, so most likely you are the only ond that use the toilet. You also have access to kitchen. The surrounding area is full of restaurant, shops and market and easy transport.

There is also another room for rent in the flat, so you might have another traveller friend. How does it get any better than that?.

Guest access
You can use washing machine, shared bathroom and you have your own keys. You are welcome to put some of your stuff in our fridge too.

Other things
neighborhood_overview:
My neighborhood is very special. It's very local so you will find cheap things around but at the same time there are different hotesl around (such as Ibis Hotel, South China Hotel, City Garden, etc). Therefore, you can find international flavors too.

I am very social. I host a lot of social activities. Therefore, you will not get bored. Just ask me if you like to join :)
host_about:
I love meeting new people and make a new friend. That is why I love Airbnb  as it gives me an opportunity to meet people from different part of the world. 

I am very easy going and very social and love being out and about. I also do an energy work, passionate about equality and living. :)

name: Room in a modern apt, in cool  spot
description:
Fun apt in a new and upcoming area of HK,which is central and easy to get to. Very secure and modern apt block with own bathroom. Gym and pool available .
Sadly a single bed room, Ideal for someone passing through town . But not ideal for a couple., just too cramped sadly. speak soon

The space
A great location with a great mix of the old and new HK.Access to the apt is easy as very centrally located with buses and taxis galore.
Many restaurants and galleries 4 minutes walk away. Chinese medicine shops shops at your feet which make it a very interesting place to stay.

Guest access
Full gym and pool available also maid service who will clean your room .
neighborhood_overview:
The area is very central and close to places you are likely to visit. Man Mo temple, ladder street and Po hing Fung are all 4 minutes walk away. Great coffee shop next door called Winstons.
Also close to Sai yin pun high street which has over 15 restaurants to choose from.
host_about: Lived around the world originally from Holland . Very  active and travel around Asia alot

name: å°–æ²™å’€åœ°éµæ–°è£…èˆ’é©3æˆ¿8äºº/Newly Reno TsimShaTsui MTR/3Br/8ppl
description:
This newly renovated apartment is at Granville Road which has three bedrooms, each with a queen-sized bed. It also has a sofa bed, good for 2 adults. There is plenty of room for a family or a small group of travellers. It is also convenient, located just five minutes away from the Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station. Restaurants n shops are steps away. All you can do is eat n shop & eat n shop again. ^_^

The space
This newly renovated apartment is ideal for a family or small groups of up to eight people. It has three bedrooms, each with a queen-sized bed. It also has a sofa bed. There is even a large living and dining area with a dining table that sits four. If you get hungry, you can try one of the many restaurants downstairs or prepare a small meal in our kitchen. Feel free to use the utensils and other equipment.

One of the best things about this space is the large amount of natural light. The flat is located on a higher floor of the building. The view is fa
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in Tsim Sha Tsui, a mecca for luxury shopping containing shops for almost all of the worldâ€™s most exclusive international brands â€“ from Armani to Zara. Look for them between and along Nathan Road (two minutes away on foot) and Canton Road. Also, the Peninsula Hotel and the harbor front are minutes away on foot. From the waterfront, you can treat yourself to the finest views of the island side or take a Star Ferry ride to Central.

When you are feeling hungry, sample one of the neighborhoodâ€™s many dining options, from Michelin-star restaurants to everyday quick fixes such as McDonalds and Starbucks. When you are done, why not get a massage at a local shop?

If you head up Nathan Road or take the MTR two or three stops, you can reach Yau Ma Tei and Mong Kok. Yau Ma Tei is home to the Temple Street Night Market. The market opens in the late afternoon and stretches from south to north along Temple Street from Jordan Road to Man Ming Lane. It is

name: Causeway Bay FURNISHED room
description:
WIFI internet ,available ROOM!!
This flat is furnished
Close to mtr station

Other things to note
PLEASE NOTE:
All photos here are for REFERENCE ONLY. Please message me to confirm if the room is available or not.
There is NO move in after 7 pm
There is a Flatshare agreement to sign with us if you decide to confirm the booking with us, and a Hong Kong Government Stamp Duty to pay to the Hong Kong Government Tax which is usually less than HK$100 and a Key Deposit HK$500 which is refundable when you move out with us.
It is mandated by Hong Kong law that a tenant and landlord/principal tenant have to sign a tenancy agreement to make the deal legal.
Thank you for your understanding.

name: INCREDIBLE Architect Design Duplex SPACE Ensuite
description:
oOo SPACE Room only oOo

Set in Shatin's natural countryside, our duplex is hidden between quiet villages on the hillside; overlooking rich green mountains, enticing you a fusion of both nature and city. Wake up to birds chirping and a glimpse of local vibe in a peaceful vintage environment. Our renovation is inspired by contemporary and natural surroundings delivering exceptional experience. BOOK EARLY!

The space
- Located on 2nd floor of a three story duplex with a gorgeous view.
- ONLY 28 days or above guests are considered.
- SPACE room (90sq. ft.) w/ Private bathroom.
- 90m of moderate slope & stairs to the unit.
- 400m / 5-8mins walk from Shatin MTR.
- MAX CAPACITY: 3-4 people in the unit.
- Ideal: Expats, HKSTP & CUHK students.
- DO NOT bring multiple luggages.
- NO viewings.

- SPACE bedroom is available: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/4138543
- EARTH bedroom is available: https://www.airbnb.c
neighborhood_overview:
- Near tourist attraction points, the house owns its private spot in the area.
- Next to heart of Shatin: "New Town Plaza." (Hours: 10am - 10pm).
- Pai Tau Village is a nature oriented environment.
- Ideal for students in: (i) City University of Hong Kong / CityUHK, (ii) Chinese University of Hong Kong / CUHK, (iii) Baptist University / HKBU.
- Near: (i)Government offices, (ii)JP Morgan, (iii)IKEA.
host_about:
Hello everyone and an advance welcome to Hong Kong. I love to travel, explore and meet people around the world. Airbnb allows me to achieve all that. I love architecture and continuously think of new ways to offer a home feeling to my guests. I turn my guests into friends, so I know the key ingredients of a 5* stay. I am looking for guests who are friendly, easy going and respectful.

Your safety, security and comfort are my top priorities, so once your reservation is accepted; rest assured, you are in the safest hands. I treat my guests like long lost friends, so expect a warm welcome from me when you check in.

I respect religious freedom; however, my place will not cater for any special religious worship or practices. I will also not cater any rude guests, guests with hotel expectations and guests who do not agree with my house rules. Thank you for reading and wish you all a safe and pleasant trip ahead.
neighbourhood: New Territories, Hong Kong, Shatin, Hong Kong

description:
we are guest house in hong kong with license , is not a home but is my home , hope you will love to stay in my place , and i will help you to know anything about hong kong !
(we are looking for some long term guest , rent for month and year , if interesting please contact me )

The space
We use Korea lock , we will give the guest key card to come in

You can take bus A21 from airport

Guest access
you can use the computer outside the room , and there is hot water you can cook by yourself at the public place , also there is a extra restroom in public place incase both of you need it at the same time

Other things to note
There will be other guest inside the guest house , some people love to make friend , but some don't , make sure everyone in the right mode , thanks !
neighborhood_overview:
Located at Jordan, 3 minutes walking distance to the Jordan MTR station (Tsuen Wan Line) , also 5 minutes walking distance to the Austin MTR station (West Railway Line).

Air shuttle bus services Route A22 are available (every 15 minutes) outside the building. It is the cheaper and faster way to and from the HK Airport. It takes you around 35 minutes arrive Airport.

My apartment located between Mongkok and Tsim Sha Tsui, which these 2 district are must-go area when you come to HK.

If you are looking for a bargain, Temple Street Night Market is just a 5 minutes walk.

2 station down will get you to Mong Kok where you will find everything from upscale malls like Langham place to the famous ladies street market.

If you are planning a trip to Ocean Park Hong Kong, take the MTR down to Admiralty (10minutes) and head to the Ocean Park booth in the bus interchange.

Hong Kong Disneyland is a 30 minutes MTR ride away.

A

i love online game , computer game, basketball game , foot ball game , and sure i love to eat !!! i know a lot of place for food !! ask me !! 
play hard ! work hard !!

description:
'La Famille' with 1 double bed & 1 super single bed, is perfect for a family of 2-3 members or a group of friends for long stay. It is designed for the exquisite accommodation for quality couple;
Super high speed free Wifi provided;
Free luggage storage service before check in and after check out;

The space
PLEASE READ THROUGH THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE BEFORE MAKING ANY INQUIRY OR RESERVATION:

La Boutique de Austin, opened in late November 2014, is a boutique hotel situated at a residential building, located at the center of Kowloon West. The building is just right at the exit of MTR Austin station, and a bridge across Elements, where the Airport Express Kowloon station locates.

There are in total of 14 rooms of different type at the same unit. Room size varies from 90sqf to 150sqf. All the rooms have private washroom and bathroom, double-layer glass windows and ventilation system. Toiletries we provide include: Shampoo, shower gel, s
neighborhood_overview: The area is well known as Gourmet corner for Hong Kong locals. You can have a taste of a variety of local and exotic cuisines just downstairs of the guesthouse.
host_location: Yau Tsim Mong District, Kowloon, Hong Kong
host_about:
Hello everyone on Airbnb! My goal is to have my footprints in all the countries in the world. (How big a goal it is!) I have been to Australia, the UK, Italy, France, Monaco, Holland, Hungary and Korea for travelling, and to the US, China, Taiwan, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand and Cambodia mainly for work. I lived in China, Thailand and Mexico for years and now living in my hometown Hong Kong. I enjoy every single moment travelling from one place to another. It's the best time for me to overlook the world and to empty my mind. It is said that the world is becoming smaller and smaller. We are on the southern hemisphere in the morning and appear on the northern in just some hours. The best way for me to feel home anywhere is to meet local people! I listen to their stories and learn their cultures, respect their traditions and share mine with them. This is what travelling means to me.

Thanks to Airbnb, it provides a platform for people to meet friends and look for accommodation at reasonable price. Star-rated hotels are great, but local hosts can give you warm welcome and make you feel home.

I have years of experience hosting foreign guests through couhcsrufnig (CS), but stopped hosting since 2 years ago. After I returned from Mexico to Hong Kong in 2014 to start this hotel business, I found that airbnb is one of the best platforms which combines couhcsrufnig and business into one. Look forward to seeing you, my new friend!

The space
This apartment is solely yours for when you book. It is located in a quiet area with easy access to local eateries as well as a short trip to more high-end dining spots. A short cab ride can take you to the Pier of the Star Ferry & Ocean Terminal (Mall). This provides easy access for sightseeing the rest of Hong Kong.

Hung Hom is a peaceful area with low-rise buildings surrounding the area. Supermarkets and convenient stores are nearby when you come out of the apartment. Public transport is an ease in Hong Kong, and you will be able to get around to all areas of Hong Kong within in a short period of time.

The apartment is fully furnished en-suite bedroom with a desk and chair equipped with air conditioning a
neighborhood_overview:
Hung Hom is an area of Kowloon. The area is mainly residential, giving people easy access to other districts of Hong Kong and connections directly to the Hong Kong Island.

It is really easy to get around in Hong Kong and this apartment located in Kowloon will get you to anywhere within 15-20 minutes by bus, taxi or train (all ways of transport are cheap in Hong Kong relatively).

name: Kowloon Mongkok 1812 Quadruple Room B,near station
description:
Located at center of Mongkok. 3 mins walk to Mongkok railway station & the biggest shopping mall of the area â€“ Langham Place. Clean & tidy room with free wifi.

Free luggage storage service: starts from 9:30am on check in day / until 6pm on the check out day.

The space
Located at center of Mongkok. 3 mins walk to Mongkok railway station & the biggest shopping mall of the area â€“ Langham Place. Clean & tidy room with free wifi.

Free luggage storage service: starts from 9:30am on check in day / until 6pm on the check out day.

Please feel free to ask for if you want to explore Hong Kong in local way, I have many suggestions for restaurants and places to go.

Public Transportation
Mongkok railway station, bus stops are nearby, you can go anywhere easily.

Getting here from Airport:
Airport Bus (recommended): Take A21 bus, get off at Nathan Road, our place is opposite to the bus stop.

Railway: t
neighborhood_overview:
Mong Kok is one of Hong Kong's liveliest districts and includes popular markets, shopping streets, stalls and malls. The neon-bathed historic streets that wind through one of the densest parts of the world are worth visiting.

The neighbourhood includes one of Hong Kongâ€™s most popular markets, the Ladies' Market, and also has a ton of shopping streets, which are a common feature in southern China. Conveniently, these are where a cluster of merchants sell one type of product on a single street. Mong Kok has entire streets and street sections dedicated to the sale of goldfish, flowers, birds, sneakers, and kitchenware.

ãƒ»Sai Yeung Choi Street sells electronics, cosmetics and clothes.
ãƒ»Shantung Street and Dundas Street are where you can pick up the latest Japanese and Western fashion and accessories.
ãƒ»Langham Place is one of the many malls where you can do your Mong Kok shopping in air-conditioned comfort.
host_about:
I am from Hong Kong, I love travelling to explore something new. I am a web-editor of a women website in HK, i also have a personal blog, and i love to share my travel experience with my readers and friends.

as a host, i have private rooms to rent (where in Mongkok), and i am familiar with food & beverage & beauty products, please feel free to contact me for suggestions on dining and shopping. hope that i can help u to enjoy more during ur stay in Hong Kong. =)

name: Own bathroom, terrace, TST Cosy Rm
description:
Room in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui in a spacious apartment with private bathroom (not ensuite) and terrace. Easy access to museums, restaurants and shopping. Two MTR stations (Jordan and Tsim Sha Tsui) only 8 min walk away.

The space
We are located on the 1st floor of an old building with lift access. It's in the heart of Tsim Sha tsui ( 8 min walk to TST station and Jordan station). We are on a side street off two main roads therefore it is a quiet location but central. Our location is closer towards Tsim Sha Tsui area than what the map indicates on Airbnb. Please read "Other Things to Note" before booking especially first time airbnb users! Thank you.

The apartment is a 2 bed, 2 bathroom apartment with a decent size living room with cable TV, sofa and dining set. There is also a large terrace, where you can take your meals on our outdoor dining set, or relax on the outdoor sofa. Your room is a small one bedroom with a queen size bed. It has a des
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in the 'K-town' area of Tsim Sha Tsui with lots of Korean restaurants close by, and a 3 min walk to Knutsford terrace which is a street full of outdoor restaurants and bars. Jordan is also a 8 min walk away with lots of local food and shops . You are a stone's throw from all of the museums in Hong Kong, and also lots of shopping malls within a 5-15 min walk ( the One, Mira Mall, K-11, Harbour City and Gateway).
host_about:
Vivian : Foodie, fashionista, traveller, media junkie. Big airbnb fan who have now gone to the hosting side. Loves Sheung Wan in Hong Kong for it's cafes and boutique shops. 

Kevin : NBA fanatic, english teacher whose favourite Hong Kong area is Sham Shui Po - home of the computer malls and  local eateries. 

Together we have travelled around the world using airbnb, and we have now settled in Hong Kong and we look forward to hosting other travellers in our flat.

description:
'La Famille' with 1 queen-size bed & 1 super single bed, is perfect for a family of 3-4 members or a group of friends for long stay. Separated bathroom and toilet are considerately designed for multi-users at the same time.

The space
PLEASE READ THROUGH THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE BEFORE MAKING ANY INQUIRY OR RESERVATION:

La Boutique de Austin, opened in late November 2014, is a boutique hotel situated at a residential building, located at the center of Kowloon West. The building is just right at the exit of MTR Austin station, and a bridge across Elements, where the Airport Express Kowloon station locates.

There are in total of 9 rooms of different type at the same unit. Room size varies from 90sqf to 150sqf. All the rooms have private washroom and bathroom, double-layer glass windows and ventilation system. Toiletries we provide include: Shampoo, shower gel, soap, comb, shower cap, toothbrush and toothpaste. We also provide towels, slippers, hai
neighborhood_overview: The area is well known as Gourmet corner for Hong Kong locals. You can have a taste of a variety of local and exotic cuisines just downstairs of the guesthouse.
host_location: Yau Tsim Mong District, Kowloon, Hong Kong
host_about:
Hello everyone on Airbnb! My goal is to have my footprints in all the countries in the world. (How big a goal it is!) I have been to Australia, the UK, Italy, France, Monaco, Holland, Hungary and Korea for travelling, and to the US, China, Taiwan, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand and Cambodia mainly for work. I lived in China, Thailand and Mexico for years and now living in my hometown Hong Kong. I enjoy every single moment travelling from one place to another. It's the best time for me to overlook the world and to empty my mind. It is said that the world is becoming smaller and smaller. We are on the southern hemisphere in the morning and appear on the northern in just some hours. The best way for me to feel home anywhere is to meet local people! I listen to their stories and learn their cultures, respect their traditions and share mine with them. This is what travelling means to me.

Thanks to Airbnb, it provides a platform for people to meet friends and look for accommodation at reasonable price. Star-rated hotels are great, but local hosts can give you warm welcome and make you feel home.

I have years of experience hosting foreign guests through couhcsrufnig (CS), but stopped hosting since 2 years ago. After I returned from Mexico to Hong Kong in 2014 to start this hotel business, I found that airbnb is one of the best platforms which combines couhcsrufnig and business into one. Look forward to seeing you, my new friend!

The space

neighborhood_overview:
- Less than 10 minutes walk from subway (LOHAS Park MTR exit C1).
- Covered and leveled walking path is required.
- Easy access to Restaurant, supermarket, grocery stores, convenience store, bakery, doctors, dentist, dry cleaning service in the neighborhood.
- 24/7 security (Access card is required throughout the complex) Concierge on duty in main entrance, and lobby.
- Cycling track (completely isolated from road and pedestrian traffic) that connects Tseung Kwan O area with a scenic ride along the promenade.
- University of Science & Technology is 10 minutes drive.
- Hong Kong Design Institute / HKDI is 15 minutes OR 3 stations away.
- We are less than 10 minutes drive from the nearest hospital in case of emergency.
host_about:
Hello everyone and an advance welcome to Hong Kong. I love to travel, explore and meet people around the world. Airbnb allows me to achieve all that. I love architecture and continuously think of new ways to offer a home feeling to my guests. I turn my guests into friends, so I know the key ingredients of a 5* stay. I am looking for guests who are friendly, easy going and respectful.

Your safety, security and comfort are my top priorities, so once your reservation is accepted; rest assured, you are in the safest hands. I treat my guests like long lost friends, so expect a warm welcome from me when you check in.

I respect religious freedom; however, my place will not cater for any special religious worship or practices. I will also not cater any rude guests, guests with hotel expectations and guests who do not agree with my house rules. Thank you for reading and wish you all a safe and pleasant trip ahead.

neighborhood_overview:
This flat is in a vibrant neighborhood. Downstairs, there are many shops and restaurants where you can sample the local cuisine, as well as a supermarket. Many eating options, and souvenirs too, are also available in the famous Temple Street Night Market, located just five minutes away on foot. Make sure to look for Tin Hau Temple, one of the oldest temples in the neighborhood and a major landmark. It is north of the expressway. And while you are in the neighborhood, make sure you do not miss the Jade Market off Kansu Street. It is also nearby.

For a luxury shopping experience, walk 10 minutes to Tsim Sha Tsuiâ€™s Canton Road, or walk to the Elements mall, located just ten minutes away under the ICC, Hong Kongâ€™s tallest building. You can even top off a trip to the mall with a visit to the ICCâ€™s Ozone, the worldâ€™s highest bar. The view from the 118th floor is stunning. Round off your trip with a short MTR ride to Tsim Sha Tsui. Thatâ€™s where the best nighttime harbor views are f

name: Cottage-style flat in Sai Kung
description:
Newly renovated in old French cottage style with Scandinavian influence, 2 bedroom 700 sq.ft. flat is on the ground floor of a 3storey village house, opening up to green forest and ocean view. 10 minute walk into Sai Kung town, easy access by minibus. Queen bed & sofa bed. No TV

The space
It's a 700 sq.ft. flat with a small BBQ pit and private patio that is perfect for enjoying meals outside. Sun shines on the balcony during from 6am - 12pm. One bedroom opens into the kitchen/living room with large folding French doors which reduces privacy of that room but adds a lot of character to the flat overall.
With inverted air-cons and full insulation in walls, floors and ceiling, the flat remains nice and cozy during the winter months.

Guest access
Free Wi-Fi, fully equipped kitchen, bath tub and shower, maid services upon request. BBQ out on the deck.
No television.

Other things to note
Strictly no partie
neighborhood_overview: Very green surroundings, you're definitely out in the country side now.  Fantastic hiking trails start right by the house.  This is a perfect place for someone looking for a quiet, relaxing time out from the hustle and bustle of the busy city life.

neighborhood_overview:
Sai Ying Pun is an area in Western District, in the northwestern part of Hong Kong Island, in Hong Kong. It is administratively part of Central and Western District.

In Chinese language (Cantonese dialect regarding the spoken version), Sai (è¥¿) means "west" and Ying Pun (ç‡Ÿç›¤) means "camp", especially military camp. It was where the early British military (website hidden) Ying Pun is built on the steeply sloping lower slopes of Victoria Peak and also on the western reclamation. The areas of Shek Tong Tsui and Kennedy Town are located to the west, Sheung Wan and Tai Ping Shan are to the east, and Midlevels is higher on the hill to the south. Victoria Harbour is to the north.
host_about:
I've often thought that one of the best things about traveling the world is getting to meet new people with exciting stories and backgrounds. Hosting on Airbnb gives me the chance to do that every day! 

I love traveling, playing guitar and drums, playing all kinds of sports, cooking, going to the beach, learning about everything I can, and pursuing new business ideas! And traveling! 

Let me know when you are coming to Hong Kong and I will do my best to help make arrangements for you! This an amazing city, and whether you are coming for the first time or the fiftieth, you can always find something new! 

See you soon and safe travels! 

-Mark

name: Wanchai Private Suite 2-Bedroom Apartment
description:
A bright and well-kept 2-bedroom flat in the heart of Hong Kong. One block from MTR, major bus routes, tram, and taxi services. Walk 15 minutes to the HK Convention Center. Owner lives nearby.

- Wanchai Private Suite 2-Bedroom Apartment

The space
A bright and spacious apartment located in a walk-up building near Wan Chai's wet market (food market). Conveniently located in the heart of Hong Kong within one block of the MTR light rail station and a stone's throw from major bus routes, trams, and taxi services. Everything, and I mean everything, is at your doorstep.

Expect convenience and a relaxed place to spend the night in Hong Kong. If you're looking for a quality place to rest during your time here - look no further. Your own door and key - come and go at your own convenience.

The apartment includes:
- full kitchen (sink, fridge, microwave, stove, water boiler, dishes)
- living area (sofa 2-seat, coffee table, chairs)<
neighborhood_overview:
Wanchai, the very heart of Hong Kong, is home to primarily two things - office buildings and a rather seedy nightlife. The area also boasts easy and direct transportation to almost all areas of Hong Kong SAR.

FOOD:
Check out my Airbnb Guidebook on the listing. It is also HIGHLY recommended to download 'Open Rice' app for restaurant discovery, locations, and reviews.

NIGHTLIFE:
Wan Chai has a busy nightlife scene. There is always live music going late into the night and plenty of popular clubs and bars. Take a note, however, that Wan Chai also has a well-established prostitution scene consisting mostly of Filipino women trying to convince you to enter the more seedy locales.

For further nightlife a 5 minute taxi ride will take you to the famed Lan Kwai Fong "LKF" (about 30HKD by taxi, or, for the cheaper route, about 8HKD by tram) and the Central / Soho bar and club scene.

Other nightlife areas are: Star Street, Hollywood Rd, Tsim Sh
host_location: Wan Chai, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong
host_about:
I am an Architect out of Seattle and Hong Kong. I have built projects in Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Thailand, and Hong Kong â€” as well as the United States.

I frequently travel and enjoy the flexibility Airbnb provides in sharing my place in Hong Kong as well experiencing others' in far away locales. I explore the world, meet people, and observe foreign cultures. I pride myself as a great host and have an eye for details. My goal is to provide the same experience as what I would expect to receive.

description:
â€˜ La Tatamiâ€™ perfectly fits a couple or any individual. The 10-inch queen-size mattress guarantees real comfort and refreshment. You get exactly what you see from the pictures. The room is approx. 100 sqf in size. Super-sized baggage not suggested.

The space
PLEASE READ THROUGH THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE BEFORE MAKING ANY INQUIRY OR RESERVATION:
La Boutique de Austin, opened in late November 2014, is a boutique hotel situated at a residential building, located at the center of Kowloon West. The building is just right at the exit of MTR Austin station, and a bridge across Elements, where the Airport Express Kowloon station locates.

There are in total of 9 rooms of different type at the same unit. Room size varies from 90sqf to 150sqf. Toiletries we provide include: Shampoo, shower gel, soap, comb, shower cap, toothbrush and toothpaste. We also provide to
neighborhood_overview: The area is well known as Gourmet corner for Hong Kong locals. You can have a taste of a variety of local and exotic cuisines just downstairs of the guesthouse.
host_location: Yau Tsim Mong District, Kowloon, Hong Kong
host_about:
Hello everyone on Airbnb! My goal is to have my footprints in all the countries in the world. (How big a goal it is!) I have been to Australia, the UK, Italy, France, Monaco, Holland, Hungary and Korea for travelling, and to the US, China, Taiwan, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand and Cambodia mainly for work. I lived in China, Thailand and Mexico for years and now living in my hometown Hong Kong. I enjoy every single moment travelling from one place to another. It's the best time for me to overlook the world and to empty my mind. It is said that the world is becoming smaller and smaller. We are on the southern hemisphere in the morning and appear on the northern in just some hours. The best way for me to feel home anywhere is to meet local people! I listen to their stories and learn their cultures, respect their traditions and share mine with them. This is what travelling means to me.

Thanks to Airbnb, it provides a platform for people to meet friends and look for accommodation at reasonable price. Star-rated hotels are great, but local hosts can give you warm welcome and make you feel home.

I have years of experience hosting foreign guests through couhcsrufnig (CS), but stopped hosting since 2 years ago. After I returned from Mexico to Hong Kong in 2014 to start this hotel business, I found that airbnb is one of the best platforms which combines couhcsrufnig and business into one. Look forward to seeing you, my new friend!

name: DELUXE LAN KWAI FONG room --- CENTRAL
description:
Yes, the apartment is RIGHT IN LAN KWAI FONG (LKF) !
Flat-shared apartment !
-w/ super friendly flatmates

4th floor ( NO LIFT)

Great place to live for those who LOVE the nightlife or even first-timers

Just bring your suitcase and enjoy your stay !

The space
During the day:
From SOHO & IFC MALL to Hong Kong Zoological and Botanical Garden. You will never get bored roaming about Central

During the night:
Our most famous spot for the nightlife LFK is right under the apartment !

Plus, with 24-hour convenience stores nearby, you won't be running out of anything

Going to public transportation, such as MTR, bus, tram, taxi are also very convenient.

Guest access
Has the privilege of using the bed, blanket, curtain, pillows, washing machine, dryer, fridge, pots and pans, microwave, WiFi internet, utensils, etc.

name: Spacious 1,000 sq ft apt in Central
description:
Spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom with a living space, large kitchen & washer, located in the heart of Central, 2-minute walk from Wyndham & Lan Kwai Fong surrounded by restaurants & bars. MTR underground is only 5-minute walk & Hong Kong park.

The space
The spacious apartment is 1,000 sq ft with 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apart, a living/dining room with a fully-equipped kitchen. There is a washer, free Wifi and comfortable furnishings. It is located in the heart of Central and a short walk away from Wyndham and Lan Kwai Fung with restaurants, bars and shops.

Guest access
Free WiFi, Cable TV, Washer
