description:
â€˜ La Tatamiâ€™ perfectly fits any individual. The 10-inch mattress guarantees real comfort and refreshment. You get exactly what you see from the pictures. The room is approx. 90 sqf in size. Super-sized baggage not suggested.

The space
PLEASE READ THROUGH THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE BEFORE MAKING ANY INQUIRY OR RESERVATION:

La Boutique de Austin, opened in late November 2014, is a boutique hotel situated at a residential building, located at the center of Kowloon West. The building is just right at the exit of MTR Austin station, and a bridge across Elements, where the Airport Express Kowloon station locates.

There are in total of 9 rooms of different type at the same unit. Room size varies from 90sqf to 150sqf. All the rooms have private washroom and bathroom, double-layer glass windows and ventilation system. Toiletries we provide include: Shampoo, shower gel, soap, comb, shower cap, toothbrush and toothpaste. We also provide towels, slippers, ha
neighborhood_overview: The area is well known as Gourmet corner for Hong Kong locals. You can have a taste of a variety of local and exotic cuisines just downstairs of the guesthouse.
host_location: Yau Tsim Mong District, Kowloon, Hong Kong
host_about:
Hello everyone on Airbnb! My goal is to have my footprints in all the countries in the world. (How big a goal it is!) I have been to Australia, the UK, Italy, France, Monaco, Holland, Hungary and Korea for travelling, and to the US, China, Taiwan, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand and Cambodia mainly for work. I lived in China, Thailand and Mexico for years and now living in my hometown Hong Kong. I enjoy every single moment travelling from one place to another. It's the best time for me to overlook the world and to empty my mind. It is said that the world is becoming smaller and smaller. We are on the southern hemisphere in the morning and appear on the northern in just some hours. The best way for me to feel home anywhere is to meet local people! I listen to their stories and learn their cultures, respect their traditions and share mine with them. This is what travelling means to me.

Thanks to Airbnb, it provides a platform for people to meet friends and look for accommodation at reasonable price. Star-rated hotels are great, but local hosts can give you warm welcome and make you feel home.

I have years of experience hosting foreign guests through couhcsrufnig (CS), but stopped hosting since 2 years ago. After I returned from Mexico to Hong Kong in 2014 to start this hotel business, I found that airbnb is one of the best platforms which combines couhcsrufnig and business into one. Look forward to seeing you, my new friend!
neighbourhood: Kowloon, Tsim Sha Tsui, Jordan, Austin, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

description:
* Please always quickly message me first to see if the dates are available or suitable, before sending a reservation request. Thank you!

LOCATION: it's within walking distance to Austin MTR / Jordan MTR NEARBY: Kowloon Airport Express / ICC / supermarkets, wet market, night market, small restaurants, laundry - everything you need within a stones throw.

AMENITIES: Fully Equipped / Fully Furnished / Fast WiFi / 24 hr security on G/F

The space
The studio is near ICC, Austin/ Yau Ma Tei / Jordan MTR stations. Kowloon harbor, Cultural center, Space museum, Science museum, Nathan Road, Temple street and so much to see in the area. So close to all subway lines so commuting is a BREEZE! It's also so close to taxis, bus, train and the airport express too!

Guest access
The Studio apartment is fully private. The apartment is yours during your stay and we hope you can help us look after it well too.

- All mod-Cons -
neighborhood_overview:
Transport is very convenient from this location. This is closeby Nathan Road. Close to Yau Ma Tei MTR, Austin MTR and Jordan MTR. Buses opposite side of the street. Taxi's are available just downstairs!

EATING is just fantastic around this area - If you're a foodie. (Sichuan Hot Pot, Hong Kong restaurants, Vietnamese, Tandoori & Indian, BBQ Seafood, Chinese BBQ, it never ends and this part of town has some amazing restaurants which won't nreak the bank.

I love food and have lots of recommendations!

Supermarket and 24 hour convenience store within short reach should you need anything.
host_about:
Look forward to hosting you! 

For any questions please feel free to contact me, sorry for any delays as per time difference.

name: 6 Queen Size Beds with 2 private bathrooms
description:
Launched in Dec. 2014, we are centrally located in a soulful Chinese neighbourhood and just a stoneâ€™s throw to the cityâ€™s hustling bustling attractions, as well as its renowned mountain & coastal charms.

The space
Our Deluxe Queen Pods, are extremely spacious, Have their own keycard safes and privacy blinds, their own personal chill-out lounge area and 2 private showers!

Pull down the privacy curtain and enjoy your own private space! There are x6 Queen Pods in the Dorm and you have access to x2 bathrooms and the Deluxe lounge space in the room.

1. Considered Design:

We set up our hostel to maximize the space and minimize the stress. We think you will like our little touches like reading lights and personal electrical sockets to name just a couple.

2. Authentic Neighborhood:

To Kwa Wan is REAL Hong Kong. A hectic kaleidoscope of colour, sights, sounds and smells. Avoid the touristy districts and enjoy some dee
neighborhood_overview:
Location

Conveniently located in the centre of Hong Kong, and just a stoneâ€™s throw to all main attractions (even those you didnâ€™t know of):

-10-15 mins to Tsim Sha Tsui harbourfront promenade
-10-15 mins to Mong Kok ladiesâ€™ market
-15-20 mins to Central CBD and Lan Kwai Fong nightlife district
-30-40 mins to Sai Kung seafood village
45-60 mins from Sai Kung & Clearwater Bay country parks, beaches, mountain hikes and moreâ€¦

Neighbourhood

To Kwa Wan is one of the last remaining urban areas in Hong Kong that has large scale low rise walk up buildings (known as â€œTong Lauâ€ in Chinese) constructed and common throughout the 1950s/1960s.

It is changing fast however, and rampant gentrification is well under way with local galleries, cafes and new modern shops replacing the old family run and owned shops, restaurants and industries.

Now is the time to experience this important heritage before it is gone. Walk t
host_about:
Founded by backpackers and soultrippers, The Mahjong is the result of years of pursuing a dream to establish a comfortable boutique hostel that offers cultural immersion in addition to a social exchange for travelers to meet and swap stories.

The Mahjong takes its name from a traditional game that dates back to late Qing dynasty when locals gathered together over a table of 144 game pieces to play and while away the days. Today, the game has evolved into a national pastime and is played everywhere â€“ at home, in the park, even dedicated mahjong parlours around the city. There are various legends on how the game got its name â€“ one being the Mahjong sparrow it was named after, for its petite yet agile body that resembled the game pieces.

neighborhood_overview:
TRAFFIC TO TOURIST ATTRACTION
MongKok is also a place that many 24 hours bus will pass-by, convenient for guest to enjoy flexible schedule.
1. Ocean Park Hong Kong
Bus 629 from Central Pier 7 or from MTR Admiralty Station, Exit B and alight at the park.

2.The Peak
-Bus 15 from Exchange Square bus terminus (near MTR Hong Kong Station, Exit D)
-Minibus 1 from MTR Hong Kong Station public transport interchange.

3.Avenue of Stars
MTR East Tsim Sha Tsui Station, Exit J. Follow the signs to the Avenue of Stars.

4.Temple Street Night Market
-MTR Yau Ma Tei Station, Exit C, turn onto Temple Street at Man Ming Lane.

-MTR Jordan Station, Exit A. Turn right onto Jordan Road and then take another right onto Temple Street.

5.Sik Sik Yuen Wong Tai Sin Temple
-MTR Wong Tai Sin Station, Exit B2, walk for about three minutes.

description:
located in the busiest part of the City, Tsim Sha Tsui; It is just a step away from the TST MTR station.

The space
There is one 125cmX190cm double bed and one 80cmX190cm single bed in the room.For 3 person.Private Bathroom

Located in the busiest part of the City, Tsim Sha Tsui; it is just a step away from the TST MTR station.



Sightseeing and Shopping

Major attractions and shopping malls near by are Victoria Harbour, Avenue of the Stars, Kowloon Park, Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Star Ferry Pier, Miramar Shopping Arcade, Ocean Terminal, The Gateway, Heritage 1881, The One, K-11, SaSa, Bonjour, etc.



Cuisine

From local cheap eateries to fine-dining restaurants, you can choose from numerous options.

Known as the â€œKowloon Lan Kwai Fongâ€, Knutsford Terrace offers international cuisine, from Spanish to Italian, Japanese to Thai. Some restaurants have outdoor seating and bars off

Our place is very convenient where you can reach our studio in 25 mins from airport by airport bus A22 (HK$39). This bus is operated in 15 mins interval.

Nearby shopping mall/night market: ICC/The Element shopping mall, Harbour City shopping, Temple street (the night market), Kowloon Park, etc.

Jordan is located at Kowloon city centre and is a vibrant area where we are:
- 2 mins walk to Temple street night market
- 2 mins walk to Austin Station(West Railway Line)
- 5 mins walk to Jordan MTR Station
- 10mins walk to Tsim Sha Tsui (TST)
- 15 mins walk to China Ferries Terminal (Ferries to Macau and China)

There are convenient stores, supermarket nearby our place. Apart from that, many variaties of restaurants serving different type of cuisine like Sichuan, Japanese, Korean, local cantonese food can be find nearby the area.

neighborhood_overview:
If you are a nature lover, this is definitely a place for you. You can walk to the waterfall, temple, many farms nearby and also go hiking around the famous Tai Mon Shan Country Park.

You may also rent a bike at the Tai Po Market and ride around to many places in the Tai Po Area.

If you like Hong Kong real local food, Tai Po is a food paradise.
host_location: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong
host_about:
I decided to start this airbnb after my two years of traveling around the world. Hong Kong is an very interesting city where there are lots of hidden treasures around. I like to meet travelers and show them another side of Hong Kong . You would be staying with me & my husband in our two floors village house. I always believe it's best to stay with the locals to get a real experience of the country. Hope you will enjoy your stay. 
Check out our Ethnic Guesthouse to know more on (website hidden) page.

name: Bright charming Sheung Wan studio
description:
Sunny studio apartment for 2 with 180-degrees of windows over calm street and greenery. Comfy bed, huge work table, dining table, mini sofa.
Space for yoga, plus mats.
Small kitchen with all necessities. Basic bathroom.
Free wifi.

The area is full of restaurants, cafÃ©s, boutiques, galleries, local food stalls.

6 mins walk to design hub PMQ, Soho bars/restaurants, Central CBD.
200m to #26 bus on Hollywood Rd east to Soho, Central etc.
MTR - 5 mins walk to Sai Ying Pun, 8 to Sheung Wan.

The space
My flat is a typical Hong Kong flat. It's not flash or sophisticated, but I love the old Hk tiles on the floor, the light coming in through 180 degrees of windows and the Sheung Wan foodie location. Guests should know that the bathroom is basic, the kitchen too, but with all cooking necessities. And the rest of the space is lived in, but (I think) charmingly so. I'm a yoga instructor and have mats and blocks you're welco
neighborhood_overview: Upper Station Street and the surrounding streets of Tai Ping Shan, Sai Street, Po Hing Fong and Bridges Street (which leads to Staunton Street and SoHo), have a number of eateries, which range from tiny cafÃ©s, coffee shops and local noodle shops to Michelin starred restaurants. There are a growing number of boutique stores, as well as supermarkets down on Queens Road West and even a mini computer centre.
host_about: I'm a freelance writer and love travelling around Asia, and the world, exploring destinations for articles and awesome photos. I often stay with airbnb hosts when I'm away and so it's always great to have some guests at mine. And having such an old school Hong Kong apartment, my guests will really get a feel as to the local style of flats, but with western accessories of course. Enjoy!
neighbourhood: Sheung Wan, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

- Less than 10 minutes walk from subway (LOHAS Park MTR exit C1).
- Covered and leveled walking path is required.
- Easy access to Restaurant, supermarket, grocery stores, convenience store, bakery, doctors, dentist, dry cleaning service in the neighborhood.
- 24/7 security (Access card is required throughout the complex) Concierge on duty in main entrance, and lobby.
- Cycling track (completely isolated from road and pedestrian traffic) that connects Tseung Kwan O area with a scenic ride along the promenade.
- University of Science & Technology is 10 minutes drive.

host_about:
Hello everyone and an advance welcome to Hong Kong. I love to travel, explore and meet people around the world. Airbnb allows me to achieve all that. I love architecture and continuously think of new ways to offer a home feeling to my guests. I turn my guests into friends, so I know the key ingredients of a 5* stay. I am looking for guests who are friendly, easy going and respectful.

Your safety, security and comfort are my top priorities, so once your reservation is accepted; rest assured, you are in the safest hands. I treat my guests like long lost friends, so expect a warm welcome from me when you check in.

I respect religious freedom; however, my place will not cater for any special religious worship or practices. I will also not cater any rude guests, guests with hotel expectations and guests who do not agree with my house rules. Thank you for reading and wish you all a safe and pleasant trip ahead.

name: Work & Living in Prime Location I
description:
This unique studio apartment was designed with needs of modern dayâ€™s travelers in mind who are looking for mid-to long term stay for city exploration , work or both at the same time.

Located between Central , the financial hub of Hong Kong and Sheung Wan, where only faces have changed while authenticity has truly remained.

Long term rental : 25000/month all-inclusive

The space
The apartment is 400 square foot is 100% yours.

The building has 2 elevators and the lobby is guarded 24 hours a day.

The studio is designed with a modern bathroom and a kitchenette equipped with a solid collection of utensils and appliances. The living area has a large panoramic window with super wide open view looking over Hong Kong harbour.

The double bed (5ft x 6.5ft) can be retracted back into the wall panel if guests want to use the studio to receive guests or to hold work meetings or presentations.

There is a sof
neighborhood_overview:
Step downstairs to absorb the undeniably and very friendly vibe below on the Bonham Strand West and Wing Lok Street. So much is preserved here from the 'old Hong Kong'. SoHo, 5 mins walk away, is also the oldest neighbourhood in Hong Kong. What awaits you downstairs is an array of delicious restaurants, galleries, cafes, bars, eclectic boutiques, wet markets, all standing the test of time in this pulsating metropolis we call home. Donâ€™t forget your camera!

You will soon notice why Sheung Wan is undeniably Hong Kongâ€™s most charming, colourful, cosmopolitan and pulsating neighborhood.
My apt is incredibly, perfectly situated to everything you will need for your stay here! Just a few minutes walk down to Sheung Wan MTR or Sai Ying Poon MTR and is just one minutes walk to the worlds longest escalator. It is also a 4minute walk to central, the IFC, the HK Airport Express and all ferry piers which depart to the outlying islands. The Macau Ferry Terminal is right opposite
host_about:
I used to be a frequent traveller myself and therefore i am familiar with the modern needs of a modern traveller. 
Whenever I travel for leisure I prefer staying in apartments rather than in hotel rooms because staying in a 'local' accommodation allows me not only get acquainted with the city but it also allows me to get in touch with the locals and at the same time gain more insight on the local lifestyle. 

If i am not working , I would be on blasting trails my mountain bike or setting up my rig for some awesome windsurfing down at the beach... yes and surprisingly all is within hand reach in this concrete jungle of Hong Kong and as your friendly host i would love to show you around this beautiful and versatile gem city.

name: Quadruple Room@Tsim Sha Tsui,Austin,Jordan
description:
'La Supreme' with 2 double beds, is perfect for a family of 4 members or a group of friends for long stay. Separated bathroom and toilet are considerately designed for multi-users at the same time.

The space
PLEASE READ THROUGH THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE BEFORE MAKING ANY INQUIRY OR RESERVATION:

La Boutique de Austin, opened in late November 2014, is a boutique hotel situated at a residential building, located at the center of Kowloon West. The building is just right at the exit of MTR Austin station, and a bridge across Elements, where the Airport Express Kowloon station locates.

There are in total of 9 rooms of different type at the same unit. Room size varies from 90sqf to 150sqf. All the rooms have private washroom and bathroom, double-layer glass windows and ventilation system. Toiletries we provide include: Shampoo, shower gel, soap, comb, shower cap, toothbrush and toothpaste. We also provide towels, slippers, hair dryer, kettle and compli
neighborhood_overview: The area is well known as Gourmet corner for Hong Kong locals. You can have a taste of a variety of local and exotic cuisines just downstairs of the guesthouse.
host_location: Yau Tsim Mong District, Kowloon, Hong Kong
host_about:
Hello everyone on Airbnb! My goal is to have my footprints in all the countries in the world. (How big a goal it is!) I have been to Australia, the UK, Italy, France, Monaco, Holland, Hungary and Korea for travelling, and to the US, China, Taiwan, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand and Cambodia mainly for work. I lived in China, Thailand and Mexico for years and now living in my hometown Hong Kong. I enjoy every single moment travelling from one place to another. It's the best time for me to overlook the world and to empty my mind. It is said that the world is becoming smaller and smaller. We are on the southern hemisphere in the morning and appear on the northern in just some hours. The best way for me to feel home anywhere is to meet local people! I listen to their stories and learn their cultures, respect their traditions and share mine with them. This is what travelling means to me.

Thanks to Airbnb, it provides a platform for people to meet friends and look for accommodation at reasonable price. Star-rated hotels are great, but local hosts can give you warm welcome and make you feel home.

I have years of experience hosting foreign guests through couhcsrufnig (CS), but stopped hosting since 2 years ago. After I returned from Mexico to Hong Kong in 2014 to start this hotel business, I found that airbnb is one of the best platforms which combines couhcsrufnig and business into one. Look forward to seeing you, my new friend!

name: Long Term Rent, Studio Apartments
description:
This apartment is solely yours for when you book. It is located in a quiet area near the city with easy access to local eateries as well as a short trip to other places in Kowloon and Hong Kong. Convenient public transport nearby and on your doorstep

The space
This apartment is solely yours for when you book. It is located in a quiet area with easy access to local eateries as well as a short trip to more high-end dining spots. A short cab ride can take you to the Pier of the Star Ferry & Ocean Terminal (Mall). This provides easy access for sightseeing the rest of Hong Kong.

Hung Hom is a peaceful area with low-rise buildings surrounding the area. Supermarkets and convenient stores are nearby when you come out of the apartment. Public transport is an ease in Hong Kong, and you will be able to get around to all areas of Hong Kong within in a short period of time.

The apartment is fully furnished en-suite bedroom with a desk and chair equippe
neighborhood_overview:
Hung Hom is an area of Kowloon. The area is mainly residential, giving people easy access to other districts of Hong Kong and connections directly to the Hong Kong Island.

It is really easy to get around in Hong Kong and this apartment located in Kowloon will get you to anywhere within 15-20 minutes by bus, taxi or train (all ways of transport are cheap in Hong Kong relatively).
host_about: Like to eat and discover new restaurants and travel. Love exploring new cultures. :)
neighbourhood: Hung Hom, Hong Kong, Kowloon, Hong Kong

name: Modern Bohemian Rooftop Oasis
description:
Our bright and airy one bedroom apartment with a large rooftop terrace is an oasis of calm in the heart of bustling Hong Kong. It comfortably sleeps two and is located right in the WanChai/Causeway Bay district, with easy access to public transport.

The space
This apartment has a large rooftop terrace overlooking the bustling streets of Hong Kong. Feel the energy of the city, all while having the space and and air to feel away from it all!

Guest access
Best of both worlds: the apartment is in an up and coming neigborhood with local charm but still only a 5min walk from Hong Kong's prime shopping district, with restaurants, boutiques, and markets for exploring right around the corner.

The WanChai/Causeway Bay area is renowned for a mix of having both the new and "real" parts of "old Hong Kong." The Bowrington wet market is right across the street and there are many cafes and restaurants right nearby. There is a coffee roaster less
neighborhood_overview:
From trendy, michelin-starred restaurants to late-night street food stalls, this neighborhood has it all. Even though it is right nearby the city's prime shopping district, the area is considered one of the last remaining enclaves of authentic, "real" Hong Kong. There are dozens of small streets and alleyways to explore with a mix of both up-and-coming and classic little shops and small businesses.

Coffee Academics (a local coffee roaster), and DimDim Sum (a Bourdain's favorite) are among our neighbors and have you covered for the mornings and evenings.
host_about: Frequent traveler.
neighbourhood: Wan Chai, Hong Kong, Hong Kong

name: The-One-Stop Room in Hong Kong
description:
International + friendly host. Located in the central of Hong Kong. 2 mins from Yau Ma Tei MTR Station. Great food nearby (both HK-style and Western cuisine). 2 blocks walk from Mong Kong, the need-to-go district for tourist.

The space
I live here with another roomate. But, you will have your own private room.

Guest access
Amenties:
Fresh bed sheets
Fresh bed towels
Dry cleaners inside the apartment.

Other things to note
Each time a guest comes and goes, the area is throughly wiped down with sanitizer, the sheets are washed and area is vacuumed. So, I truly hope that you could be clean, courteous and respectful towards my place :)
neighborhood_overview:
Close to Mong Kong, the downtown of Kowloon Island (10 mins walk) which full of Hong Kong style restaurants and shopping.
15 minutes with subway/Metro/MTR to Hong Kong Island.
host_about: Full-time student. I enjoy activities such as hiking and swimming. I am a Chinese Indonesian. But, have been around in Hong Kong for 4 years. . Electrical Engineering. Love traveling + food + people + culture.
neighbourhood: Yau Tsim Mong District, Kowloon, Hong Kong

name: spacious 2-bedr flat with balcony
description:
Amazing location in upcoming well-connected area.
1 bedroom with double bed, 1 bedroom with sofabed, huge living room, open kitchen, large balcony, 2 bathrooms (1 shower and 1 bath tub), baby bed and nursery table available. Lots of light.

The space
The apartment has many big windows making this apartment very bright and airy. There's even a bit of a sea view!
The apartment is centrally located close to shops, restaurants, sai ying pun escalator and various transport links (including the future Sai Ying Pun MTR station) for you to easily explore the city. Big apartment with large balcony and lots of light. Baby cot and nursery table available upon request.
The apartment comfortably sleeps 2 although can easily sleep up to 4 with the fold out sofa bed in the guest bedroom and 2 bathrooms (one with bath tub and one with shower)

Guest access
Entire apartment, balcony and public giant rooftop (the latter to be shared with all a
neighborhood_overview: Sai Ying Pun area is a lovely, up and coming area of Hong Kong Island. It still has a very local feel to it allowing you to experience the old Hong Kong. Yet with many modern restaurants, bars and supermarkets you are still able to enjoy home comforts or experience various international cuisines without having to venture too far.
host_about:
Hi there,

I am Laurence and together with my husband and daughter we live in the amazing city of HK! We'd love to share our amazing apartment with you when we are travelling!

I am a world traveller, music enthusiastic, food lover and social animal. 

cheers
Laurence

name: Prvate Family Room For 4 travellers
description:
The apartment situated in the Mongkok. Mongkok is the famous shopping district in Kowloon. Transportation is convenient for both shopping and sightseeing. Just a 3 minutes walk distance, you can reach the nearby Mongkok MTR Station E1 Exit. You can take MTR directly to the Disneyland and the Ngon Ping 760 Cable car Station . There is only 1 min walk distance from the nearby A21/N21( Midnight airport bus) stop. You can also take only a 10 minutes walk to the CTS Hong Kong - Canton (China) bus terminal. Beside, the Mongkok East Rail Train Station is only 15 min walking distance form the place, You can take train from there to Lowu and transit to Shenzhen and Guangzhou.

The room has 1 double bed 1200mm width fits for 2 and 2 single beds 900mm width with mattress. One extendable 750 single bed is available underneath the double bed for extra guest

Facilities include

name: Room3) Two single bed & private washroom
description:
My place is located in the heart area in Mong Kok. You can go every part in the Hong Kong easily :D.

3 mins from Mongkok D2 MTR station(underground). And around 7 mins to Mongkok East station(train).

-bed size 77x184cm
-This room is no window
host_about:
Hello~! I love Hong Kong, come and meet us if you want to visit this vibrant city!
I can tell you what is good about Hong Kong, exciting things to do here, as well as places for authentic Hong Kong food.

I like chatting with people and listening to their stories :D 
Share with me about your job, lifestyle, your country, your travel experiences, or any other interesting things :D

I like watching Japanese drama and I can speak a little bit Japanese :P 
Feel free to speak to me in Japanese if you want to help me improve my poor speaking :( 
If you want to learn some Chinese (Cantonese), please tell me and of course you need to teach me your language(s) in return hehe~~

name: â˜…â˜…â˜… Spacious Studio â˜…â˜…â˜… Tsim Sha Tsui
description:
This very spacious studio is around 300 sqft, fully furnished, newly renovated in Mar 2018 and decorated in western design. It's located in a walk up building (3rd floor), right in the center of Tsim Sha Tsui, less than 2min by walk from the TST MTR station. Best location for travelers!!
Do not hesitate to send me message if you have any questions.

â˜…â˜…â˜… Don't forget to add the listing in your Wishlist â˜…â˜…â˜…
â˜…â˜…â˜… Over 100 reviews, you can read them below, most of them gave 5 stars ratings â˜…â˜…â˜…

The space
The studio is equipped with everything you'll need: a mini kitchen with fridge (cooking not allowed inside the studio) and microwave, spacious bathroom, 47" LED TV with many local channels, free WiFi, 2-seats sofa. It is ideal for an individual or a couple.

Guest access
In the studio, you'll find:
a queen size bed
a 47" LED TV with dozen of channels
free high speed WiFi
2 air conditioner
2 seats sof
neighborhood_overview:
The place is located in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui - biggest shopping and dining area in Hong Kong. Around 2 minutes walk to the TST MTR/Subway station, 10 minutes away from Central, Causeway Bay etc...
The neighborhood is full of restaurants, cafes and pubs and has terrific transportation: buses, mini buses, taxis, trams and ferries!
Have many shopping malls in the area: K11, the One mall, iSquare, Harbour city etc... Probably the best place of Hong Kong for shopping and eating.
Please check the Guidebook to see the best places to visit in Tsim Sha Tsui area.
host_about:
Hi everybody,
I am french and living in Hong Kong since 2010. Hope you will enjoy my studio in Tsim Sha Tsui.

name: Comfy 1-BR Apartment in Kowloon
description:
This apartment is 100% solely yours for when you book. It is located in a quiet area with easy access to whole of Hong Kong. There are restaurants and supermarkets a few steps away. Convenient public transport to whole HKG literally just outside.

The space
This apartment is solely yours for when you book. It is located in a quiet area with easy access to local eateries as well as a short trip to more high-end dining spots. A short cab ride can take you to the Pier of the Star Ferry & Ocean Terminal (Mall). This provides easy access for sightseeing the rest of Hong Kong.

Hung Hom is a peaceful area with low-rise buildings surrounding the area. Supermarkets and convenient stores are nearby when you come out of the apartment. Public transport is an ease in Hong Kong, and you will be able to get around to all areas of Hong Kong within in a short period of time.

The apartment is fully furnished en-suite bedroom with a desk and chair equipped wi
neighborhood_overview:
Hung Hom is an area of Kowloon. The area is mainly residential, giving people easy access to other districts of Hong Kong and connections directly to the Hong Kong Island.

It is really easy to get around in Hong Kong and this apartment located in Kowloon will get you to anywhere within 15-20 minutes by bus, taxi or train (all ways of transport are cheap in Hong Kong relatively).

Simply Hostel is, a brand new Licensed Guesthouse, located right next to the Exit B1 of Jordan MTR station. If you take the airport bus (A22), drop off at the Jordan Road (near Chi Wo St.), and it only take 1 min to walk to our building.

The space
Simply Hostel is a brand new licensed guest house providing a budget accommodation for tourists from all over the world. The hostel simply aims to bring you a feeling of coziness and happiness of your stay, let you fully enjoy your journey in Hong Kong! No matter whether you are spending your business trip or sightseeing tour here, you can feel the warm ambience of the hostel, and its simple and smart design simply makes you feel like home.

host_about:
Hello, I am Angel. I hope all of the guests have a nice stay in my guesthouse which is in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, you can come here with different methods:

1. Hong Kong airport to guest house by bus:

Take bus A21 in Airport. Get off in Tsim Sha Tsui named [Middle Road] bus stop, walks around 3-4 minutes to get there.

2. Metro Line from airport:

Airport >>>>Tsing Yi( Airport Express)
Interchange from Tsing Yi>>>>Nam Cheong (Tung Chung Line)
Interchange from Nam Cheong>>>>East Tsim Sha Tusi (West Rail Line)
Estimate journey time: 38 minutes

Exit East Tsim Sha Tusi station and walk to Tsim Sha Tusi Exit through subway. Takes around 2-3 minutes walk to the building.

3. Taxi: Take a taxi from the airport to guest house cost about $ 280.

4. Futian, Luohu Port or Port Directions: 

From the train station at Futian or Luohu, to Hung Hom Station, and then interchange to West Rail Line to East Tsim Sha Tsui station. 

Exit East Tsim Sha Tusi station and walk to Tsim Sha Tusi Exit D2 through subway. Takes around 2-3 minutes walk to the building.

â€¢ Popular Attraction Or Shopping Near By

Walk 1 minutes to K11
Walk 3 minutes to SOGO Tsim Sha Tsui
Walk 4 minutes to The ONE
Walk 5 minutes to iSQUARE
Walk 6 minutes to Mira Place
Walk 7 minutes to Hong Kong Space Museum
Walk 10 minutes to Harbour City
neighbourhood: TSIM SHA TSUI, Kowloon, Hong Kong

name: 2BR/Flat wz Terrace/Ladiesâ€™ Market/Conv'nt/Cozy-C
description:
This two-bedroom flat has a unique triangular terrace which looks out over one corner of the famous Ladiesâ€™ Market. The flat itself has a comfortable common area and a kitchen that is suitable for making small meals. Six people can stay here.

The space
This beautiful apartment is located in the heart of Mong Kok, right next to the famous Ladiesâ€™ Market. Mong Kok is one of Hong Kongâ€™s most lively neighborhoods with much activity almost 24 hours per day.

The flat has a unique triangular terrace that is perfect for enjoying your morning coffee or relaxing after a walk through this bustling area or a long day sightseeing. In the flat itself, there are two bedrooms, a kitchen, a bathroom and a common room.

Both bedrooms feature a comfy double bed with fresh linens, fresh towels, cabinets and an air conditioning unit. The living room has a sofa bed and AC unit too. This means that up to six people can stay in this flat comfortably. It is perfect
neighborhood_overview:
Mong Kok is one of Hong Kongâ€™s vibrated areas and is filled to the brim with all sorts of shops, dining options and supermarkets. You will find everything from shoes to electronics to cosmetics. Just downstairs is Tung Choi Street, the site of the Ladiesâ€™ Market, along which you will find many souvenir stalls and restaurants. You can see the market by looking over the wall of the flatâ€™s unique terrace. And, just a few streets over is Sai Yeung Choi Street. It becomes a lively walking street with street performers on the weekends after 4pm.

Other markets in easy walking distance include the Flower and Bird Markets (north of Prince Edward Road West and west of Sai Yee Street), and the Goldfish Market (on Tung Choi Street north of Burd Street). The Bird Market has an amazing diversity of birds and bird products on sale. The Flower Market and Goldfish Markets are what the names suggest.

One MTR stop south is Yau Ma Tei, home to the Temple Street Night Market. The mar
host_about:
I am from Germany and been living in Hong Kong since last 25 years.
I love travelling and meeting people from all over the world.

name: Simple and economical one night /Twin room
description:
Leisure Hostel is located at Tsim Sha Tsui, the centre point of HK, along Victoria Harbour. We are in the business and shopping district, near the ferry terminal and Mass Transit Railway (MTR) just walk 2min.. Hong Kong International Airport is 35 minutes away.

Other things to note
The price on website is per room per night. We have two types of room, Twin bedrooms and Double bedrooms. Each room can accomodate two guests. Some rooms have window with city view which depends on availability when booking.

description: Our rooms provide free WIFI service. Hotel is situated in the heart of Causeway Bay with easy access to transportation and is less than a 10-minute walk to most famous Shopping Mall such as Sogo, Times Square, Hysan Place.
host_about: Hello,I am GiGi ,welcome to our hostel.

name: Quiet 2BR, 6min CausewayBay MTR TimeSq, nr HKCEC
description:
Quiet 2 bedroom apt in Causeway Bay. The size is about 450 sqft. Only 6 min walk from Causeway Bay MTR station. Close to Time Square, Hysan Place & Sogo with many restaurants & fews Michelin nearby. But you are away from the city noise as we are located in a quiet neighbourhood.

The space
Newly renovated with two spacious master bedrooms.

The property is located only 6 min walk from the Causeway Bay MTR station. Also very close to Time Square, Hysan Place, Lee Garden and Sogo with many restaurants nearby. But yet, you are away from the city noise as we are located in a quiet residential neighbourhood. It offers a truly relaxing experience to recharge after a long day of shopping or from a long international flight.

Our apartment is about 450 sqft in size and can accommodate up to 4 persons, we provide:-

Bedroom 1: Queen size bed 152 cm x 197 cm / 60" x 75"
Bedroom 2: Queen size bed 152 cm x 197 cm / 60" x 75"
neighborhood_overview: We are in the prime shopping area - Causeway Bay where Times Square, Lee Garden, Hysan Place & Sogo are.  With Causeway Bay MTR station closed by.
host_about:
Hello!  I am Andrea.  a person who loves traveling and meeting with new people from all over the world. 

Hong Kong is such an amazing city with so much to do and see.  So do come to visit us, no matter for leisure or business or both, you will surely have fun.

I look forward to welcoming you.
neighbourhood: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

name: REMARKABLE Modern 2 BEDRM Unit 20mins Downtown
description:
Classy, very secure and convenient. 2mins walk to Tiu Keng Leng MTR station & Shopping mall with Starbucks, 7-11, groceries all within 5mins walk. Only 15mins away to Central while safely tucked next to the ocean at night. Enjoy a glimpse of local vibe and come home to relax in the nature surroundings in Tseung Kwan O.

The space
1. SECURITY
- ACCESS CARDS required at all times.
- NO CAMERAS inside the apartment.
- 24/7 Concierge w/ security guards.

2. THE APARTMENT (Southwest Mountainview direction)
- Minimum 28 days or above are considered.
- LOWER FLOOR Unit; <10 floor (674sq. ft.).
- 2 Bedroom + 1 Bathroom.
- NON-negotiable rates.
- 5 mins walk to MTR.
- NO viewings.

3. BEDROOM(S)
- CHERRY(Queen Size bed - 5ft x 7ft).
- OAK Room (Single Bed - 3ft x 6ft).

4. BATHROOM(S)
- Hair dryer.
- Bathtub & Walk-in shower stall.

5. KITCHEN
- Gas cooktop.
-
neighborhood_overview:
- Only 2 minutes walk from subway (Tiu Keng Leng MTR).
- Our complex is attached to the Metro Town shopping mall.
- Under 5 minutes to: Restaurants, 7-11, local fast-food chains, Starbucks, supermarket, convenience store, bakery, doctors, dentist, salon, dry cleaners, etc.
- 24/7 security (Access card is required throughout the complex) Concierge on duty in main entrance, and lobby.
- Private hiking trails right next to the complex; great for weekend exercise & walks.
- Cycling track (completely isolated from road and pedestrian traffic) that connects Tseung Kwan O area with a scenic ride along the promenade.
- Direct bus from/to the airport.
- University of Science & Technology is 10 minutes drive.
- Only 5 minutes walk or Right next to Hong Kong Design Institute / HKDI.
- We are less than 10 minutes drive from the nearest hospital in case of emergency.
host_about:
Hello everyone and an advance welcome to Hong Kong. I love to travel, explore and meet people around the world. Airbnb allows me to achieve all that. I love architecture and continuously think of new ways to offer a home feeling to my guests. I turn my guests into friends, so I know the key ingredients of a 5* stay. I am looking for guests who are friendly, easy going and respectful.

Your safety, security and comfort are my top priorities, so once your reservation is accepted; rest assured, you are in the safest hands. I treat my guests like long lost friends, so expect a warm welcome from me when you check in.

I respect religious freedom; however, my place will not cater for any special religious worship or practices. I will also not cater any rude guests, guests with hotel expectations and guests who do not agree with my house rules. Thank you for reading and wish you all a safe and pleasant trip ahead.
neighbourhood: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong

name: Beautiful Lantau, Hong Kong nature.
description:
Quiet and comfortable one bedroom apartment in Mui Wo on Lantau Island with all it's beaches, hiking trails and tourist attractions. Many great restaurants and shops downstairs and all only 30 minute ferry ride to Central or taxi ride from Airport.

The space
The apartment is a very comfortable one bedroom, queen size bed, with tatami dinning room, lounge and full kitchen. On the 5th floor with elevator and great outdoor bbq area on the roof with views over Silvermine Bay.

Guest access
All the facilities in the apartment. Wifi and TV also available.
neighborhood_overview: Location gives easy access to all of Lantau Island's quiet, peaceful and beautiful beaches, hiking trails and scenery. Whist still being only 30 minutes away from the "rush" of downtown Hong Kong. Numerous very good restaurants, supermarkets, Spa/massage and other shops all around our building.
host_location: Islands District, New Territories, Hong Kong
host_about:
I love the outdoor, hiking and paddling, lifestyle that Lantau offers whilst being conveniently within 30 minutes of Hong Kong airport and/or the city. Along with it's great restaurants and a friendly 'village' vibe.
The most important thing as a 'host' is to supply everything a guest needs to be comfortable and to give them total privacy.  I rarely meet my guests just let them enjoy the apartment, their vacation and the wonders of Lantau and HK:)
neighbourhood: Mui Wo, Lantau Island, Hong Kong

name: New 2 Bdr Very Central & Tranquil
description:
2 Queen Bedroom Apt. Newly Decorated. Living room, kitchen, bathroom and lots of storage. Ideal location, Central busi. district MTR 5 min walk. High floor w/elevator, quiet street w/green park view. Surrounded by restaurants, cafes & shops.

The space
Efficiently designed with two nice bedrooms and living/dining room very comfortable for 4 people. Nice brand new paint and decoration. Quality furniture and equiptment set the apt. apart! An especially bright, and green view add to the spacious feeling. QUIET by day and in evenings since the Apt. is on a short dead-end street with limited traffic. The apt. is approx. 380 sq ft which is relatively spacious and a nice value in the heart of the city.

Guest access
Enjoy all the amenities of a well appointed living/dining space, kitchen equiped for basic/light cooking needs, breakfasts etc. ice-buckets and glasses for a relaxing evening lots of storage for longer stays. Dry cleaning and wa
neighborhood_overview: Great restaurants downstairs and all around the Soho, Noho area - Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Italian, French, Fusion is just a beginning... its all here and some of the most traditional Dim Sum restaurants are also nearby.  From HK's most traditional restaurants to Michelin stars, its all within a few blocks!  Grocery and convenience stores are close by too and the Central market is a block away for everything fresh and colourful.  Hong Kong's well liked PMQ Entertainment (dining, arts and shops) has recently opened a block away.  The area is filled with art galleries, antique shops and a bustling temple!
neighbourhood: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

name: New En Suite + Bedroom recently featured in a film
description:
Our place is perfect for family vacation, friends and couple get away. Our newly renovated apartment has awesome views and many amenities, next to 2 parks, walking distant to famous sightseeing places and restaurants. We locate in residential area but yet only 2-5 minutes walk to many bus stops which can take you to many places such as Tsim Sha Tsui or Hong Kong side. MTR is just 15 minutes walk away, you can also take a mini-van in front of the building to MTR if you don't feel like walking.

The space
***Our home was used for filming recently, see photo section***

100 square meter spacious apartment with gorgeous view. Our guests can enjoy comfy living-dining room, fully equipped kitchen and laundry facility.

Master bedroom with private bathroom, queen size bed and closet space with storage for suitcases.

2nd bedroom has a full size sofa bed and closet space with storage for suitcases. It is FREE of charge for guests who come
neighborhood_overview:
Located just across King's park excellent for outdoor exercise, stair climbing. Walking distant to many attractions but yet there are two parks right next to us.

25 min walk to Fa Yuen Market
20 min walk to Temple Street Night Market
15 min walk to Ladies Market @ Mong Kok
10 min walk to local market, 7 Eleven and many local restaurants.
15 min. walk to Electronics and Sportwear / Shoes district

name: Country experience! Amazing mountain view Sai kung
description:
With road access, it take 35 minutes by taxi (depend on traffic) to the main city like Mong Kok or around 45 minutes to Central.


The beautiful views nature parks, mountains, the outdoor activities, the peace and quiet.

And there's a charming town center.


* Amazing location near the sea and hiking trails. A rare opportunity for rental.

Sai Kung differs to the city so much, once over the huge mountain, the air is fresh.

40 minutes drive from the city, public transport also available.

The space
The space is clean and comfy - my cats will not be there :)


Equipped with a big cushy Queen bed. fast WiFi, hot water with adjustable pressure, air conditioning, kitchenette, kettle, hairdryer. hangers for clothes, TV, DVD. Shampoo and shower gel is provided.

Fresh linens and towels are provided at start of stay.

You'll need to hand wash your own clothes or take them
neighborhood_overview: This is a wonderful neighbourhood which is more laid back. The reason there is a large expat community is because Sai Kung offers the ocean, the greenery and the lovely vibes in the Sai Kung town centre.
host_about:
Look forward to hosting you! 

For any questions please feel free to contact me, sorry for any delays as per time difference.

Located in TST nestled around 5-star hotels, HOP INN is a cozy hostel designed with independent travelers from around the world in mind. name: Cozy 2 Bedroom Apt. Great for Group of friends!
description:
Are you a traveler that seeks culture and local gems? Tired of the overrated, over reviewed yelp and tripAdvisors recommendations?

Come check out my place and Ride the DingDing!

My apartment, in the heart of Chun Yeung Street (Google me), sits in between the new world Hong Kong and the old traditional street market.

If you're an adventurous backpackers and/or budget tourists (I myself am one), Hong Kong Hostels is something you never want to go to. Trust me on this. Go read about it yourself.

The space
About Me and the place:

This listing used to by my home. I would list a spare room to host interesting travelers. I got to meet tons of interesting people all around the world and learn about their livelihood, but since I've moved forward in life... it was about time I got a private place (home) for my girlfriend and I.

But I'm still around and very nearby! And I still enjoy meeting interesting people from all

Love to host and meet interesting travellers!

name: Cebu Hotel Deluxe Double Room Ensuite Bathroom #7
description:
Cebu Hotel is a 2-minute walk from MTR Tsim Sha Tsui Station. Free WiFi access is available.
Each room here will provide you with air conditioning. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The space
Regular check-in time starts from 1pm. Early check-in is flexible only if the previous guest checks out early and the room is cleaned up by then. In case the room is not ready yet by the time of your arrival, you could leave the luggage at the reception. We will arrange in first priority to have your room cleaned up. Regular check-out time is 11:59am.

Guest access
A deluxe double bed room with a private bathroom.3 mins to Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station. Free high speed WiFi. Full set of toiletries: shampoo, shower gel, toothbrush and toothpaste. We also provide towels, slipper, hair dryer and kettle in room. There are shared refrigerator and microwave in the corridor.

name: Private room with harbour view Serviced Apartment
description:
My home is a 2-bedroom apartment in a hotel building, with Victoria Harbour view and can see fireworks. The apartment is modern, neat and cosy. We have gym and outdoor swimming pool, 24 houses front desk and security guard. My place is fully furnished. The room I am offering is a guest room, which is a single bed room for one person only. I mostly donâ€™t live in the apartment but I am near if the guest needs any help.

The space
Compare to many similar offers, I have got my own 40" LED TV set, Apple TV, Bose speaker in the living room and Sony speaker in the guest room. Music is important to me. I have toaster and oven also though they are small. Wifi free and wifi in the lobby as well in the clubhouse. You can even rent our theatre for movies. You can do laundry at home or we have a laundry service just downstairs.

My flat includes access to gym, sauna and steam room, clubhouse and a harbour view outdoor pool. A free shuttle bus that runs every 15 mins
neighborhood_overview: Though it is very close to tst, one is the most busiest shopping centres, but the place is quiet, and less people. 5 minutes walking to the harbour, less then 10 minutes walking to the supermarkets Wellkome, Park shop, and also convenience stores, restaurants. There are shopping central in walking distance as well as cinemas.
host_about: I work in film merchandise field, travelling a lot both for work and vacations. I enjoy being at home too, reading, listening music, watching movies etc. I also enjoy good conversations with people and occasionally going out for drinks.I do some water sports like Kayaking and sailing, I play golf too. My education was MBA in Marketing and business management.

name: Work & Living in prime location II
description:
Located just 1 street away from Victoria Harbour this unique studio apartment is designed to fulfil the needs of modern day travellers who visit Hong Kong for leisure or for work.

** CONVENIENT
** SUPER LOCATION

The space
A perfect place for overseas business start-ups who are looking for a place to stay and to work.

Spacious apartment with one 200cx165cm double bed (built-in).
The couch can be converted into a small double bed.

Price is based on 2 guests.
Guests above 2 must be mentioned in advance as there will be an extra Linen & cleaning fee charged if over two guests stay in the apartment.

The entire (100%yours) space not only allows guests find peace and relax after a long day of city touring or work but it can also be transformed into a formal space wherein office activities can be carried out such as meetings or presentations.

All furniture pieces are 'mobile' and you can make
neighborhood_overview:
Step downstairs to absorb the undeniably and very friendly vibe below on the Bonham Strand West and Wing Lok Street. So much is preserved here from the 'old Hong Kong'. SoHo, 5 mins walk away, is also the oldest neighbourhood in Hong Kong. What awaits you downstairs is an array of delicious restaurants, galleries, cafes, bars, eclectic boutiques, wet markets, all standing the test of time in this pulsating metropolis we call home. Donâ€™t forget your camera!

You will soon notice why Sheung Wan is undeniably Hong Kongâ€™s most charming, colourful, cosmopolitan and pulsating neighborhood.
My apt is incredibly, perfectly situated to everything you will need for your stay here! Just a few minutes walk down to Sheung Wan MTR or Sai Ying Poon MTR and is just one minutes walk to the worlds longest escalator. It is also a 4minute walk to central, the IFC, the HK Airport Express and all ferry piers which depart to the outlying islands. The Macau Ferry Terminal is right opposite
host_about:
I used to be a frequent traveller myself and therefore i am familiar with the modern needs of a modern traveller. 
Whenever I travel for leisure I prefer staying in apartments rather than in hotel rooms because staying in a 'local' accommodation allows me not only get acquainted with the city but it also allows me to get in touch with the locals and at the same time gain more insight on the local lifestyle. 

If i am not working , I would be on blasting trails my mountain bike or setting up my rig for some awesome windsurfing down at the beach... yes and surprisingly all is within hand reach in this concrete jungle of Hong Kong and as your friendly host i would love to show you around this beautiful and versatile gem city.
neighbourhood: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

name: 4 Guests Ensuite 56
description:
4 Single Beds or 2 Double Beds

All our rooms come with private bathroom, hot water, TV, air condition and free local phone. Internet access is free in all area.

Just 5 minutes walk to Tsim SHa Tsui MTR station

The space
We are named as the Best Hong Kong Hostel by Rory Boland on "About,com".

"Every bit as stellar as the name suggests, including rooms which feature direct phones, color TV and fantastically, free Wifi. Rooms, while small, are a cut above the white walled Hong Kong average, with some small splashes of Ikea design thrown in."

Cleanliness, Security and convenience Internet Access are first priority at Cosmic Guest House. We are the largest licensed guest house operating in the Tsim Sha Tsui area. We currently have 79 single/double beds available. The rooms are professionally maintained to guarantee utmost customer satisfaction.

The COSMIC GUEST HOUSE is conveniently located in the heart of Tsim Sh
neighborhood_overview:
Best Location for Shopping:

Every tourist loves to shop, and there is no other place better than to visit the world renowned shopping heaven of Hong Kong. Well-established shopping centers and multi-level shopping complexes are all within reach of the COSMIC GUEST HOUSE.

As you walk along Nathan Road, you will find a diverse variety of shops on both sides of the street, providing even the most demanding individual with an unforgettable and rewarding shopping experience.

Best Location for Dinning:

Just when shopping alone isnâ€™t enough, this is also the perfect place to get a taste of the world. Tsim Sha Tsui is undoubtfully the international food ecstasy of Kowloon with restaurants representing all major cultural delights

Attractions Nearby:

Destinations such as amusement parks, major tourist attractions, hotels, banks, just about anything that you can think of are just minutes away from the Cosmic.

Harbour C

name: 750sqft - hidden gem in old Kowloon
description:
This 750sqft apartment with 2 bedrooms and large open kitchen lies In the heart of Kowloon East, where cruise terminal is just walking distance away.Lots to explore in this area for one who likes to explore the historical side of Hong Kong. This place is perfect if you want to stay longer for work and your office is near Kwun Tong area. Even though the new MTR station is almost ready, getting to and from this apartment is very easy due to the extensive and efficient transportation system.

The space
- 2 bedrooms ; one with a double bed and the other with a low bunk bed
- Well equipped open kitchen
- View on greeneries

Guest access
The entire apartment.
Washing machine
Internet
55" Flat screen TV
Coffee machine
Blender
Ricecooker

Other things to note
Please check out this link to my other living spaces, or if your choice is unavailable.
HONG KONG SIDE
https://www
neighborhood_overview:
Temples , Nunnery , cruise terminal and many authentic typical Hong Kong style shops and restaurants are in the vicinity.
Opposite of the apartment you will find a good size department store (MIKIKI) with therein a japanese supermarket , restaurants and Cafe's.
host_about:
I used to be a frequent traveller myself and therefore i am familiar with the modern needs of a modern traveller. 
Whenever I travel for leisure I prefer staying in apartments rather than in hotel rooms because staying in a 'local' accommodation allows me not only get acquainted with the city but it also allows me to get in touch with the locals and at the same time gain more insight on the local lifestyle. 

If i am not working , I would be on blasting trails my mountain bike or setting up my rig for some awesome windsurfing down at the beach... yes and surprisingly all is within hand reach in this concrete jungle of Hong Kong and as your friendly host i would love to show you around this beautiful and versatile gem city.

name: Economic Double Room (TsimShaTsui)
description:
This room (6 sq m) is equipped with one bed (1.4m wide, 1.83m long) and a private bathroom for up to 2 occupancies. There is no window. Fresh air is circulated through the air conditioner. The rate is more economical compared with our other rooms.

The space
Bright Inn, located in a prime location on Nathan Road (TsimShaTsui), a city hub with door to door access to airport express bus and subway stations, is a guesthouse with 5 rooms offering a comfortable, clean and quiet stay for our guests.
Bright Inn offers individually adjustable air conditioning system, free high speed WIFI, power adaptor, LCD TV, new clean private bathroom with 24 hour hot water, towels, body wash, shampoo, conditioner, disposable toothbrush and toothpaste, bathing cap, slippers, hair dryer, comb, and detergent, and hangers for your convenience during your stay with us. We change bedding sheets and clean your room daily. We also provide free hot and cold drinking water.
neighborhood_overview:
Bright Inn is close to everything.
Nearby attractions: the Avenue of Stars, Kowloon Park, Space Museum, Museum of Art, Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Museum of History, Science Museum, and Temple Street.
Nearby shopping malls: Harbour City, iSquare, K11, Miramar Shopping Centre, New World Centre, Sogo, Silvercord, and The One.
Nearby food places: McDonald, KFC, Pizza Hut, Kebab & Curry Restaurant, Chinese Dim Sum Restaurant, Japanese Restaurant, Korean Restaurant, Hong Kong-style fast-food restaurants, wonton noodle shop, food court, and Jenny Bakery.
Other nearby places: money exchange shops, banks, Sasa, Bonjour, Fortress, Broadway, Chow Sang Sang, Chow Tai Fook, Luk Fook Jewelry, Supermarkets, and drug stores.

name: Top floor, roof, sea view in peaceful South Lantau
description:
Top floor flat in quiet Chinese village in Pui O, Lantau, with stunning views over fields with water buffalo, beach and mountains. 50 minutes to Central or Kowloon and 30 minutes to the airport by taxi.
Easy access to Macau via the bridge to Macau, taking less than 2 hours.
Separate lounge available for longer lets and more cooking facilities and a refrigerator (see photos). Long term deals available.
Roof terrace is ideal for BBQ and hotpot dinners. Equipment provided.

The space
The 8.5 sq. m. room has a double bed and balcony. There is one shared bathroom.
The room is air-conditioned in summer with heaters available in winter.
Towels, hair dryer and bath amenities are provided, as are tea and coffee making facilities.
Washing and ironing is available for a small charge.Please ask us about this if needed.
Bottled and boiled water are provided free of charge.

Guest access
The easiest way from the airpor
neighborhood_overview:
Lantau has many attractions from the stilt fishing village of Tai O, the Buddha at Ngong Ping monastery to Disney Land and outlet shops at Tung Chung.
But the best thing about staying on Lantau are the many walking trails over mountains and along beaches everywhere. Your host has been, and continues to be, a keen hiker. We can give you lots of advice on what to see and do.
neighbourhood: Hong Kong, Lantau Island, Hong Kong

name: Deluxe 4 Guests Ensuite 82
description:
Deluxe 2 Double Beds Ensuite with Fire Escape Windows [Licensed!!]
(2 Double Beds 44~48 inches wide.)

All our rooms come with private bathroom, hot water, TV, air condition and free local phone. Internet access is free in all

Only 5 minutes walk to Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station

The space
We are named as the Best Hong Kong Hostel by Rory Boland on "About,com".

"Every bit as stellar as the name suggests, including rooms which feature direct phones, color TV and fantastically, free Wifi. Rooms, while small, are a cut above the white walled Hong Kong average, with some small splashes of Ikea design thrown in."

Cleanliness, Security and convenience Internet Access are first priority at Cosmic Guest House. We are the largest licensed guest house operating in the Tsim Sha Tsui area. We currently have 79 single/double beds available. The rooms are professionally maintained to guarantee utmost customer satisfaction.
neighborhood_overview:
Best Location for Shopping:

Every tourist loves to shop, and there is no other place better than to visit the world renowned shopping heaven of Hong Kong. Well-established shopping centers and multi-level shopping complexes are all within reach of the COSMIC GUEST HOUSE.

As you walk along Nathan Road, you will find a diverse variety of shops on both sides of the street, providing even the most demanding individual with an unforgettable and rewarding shopping experience.

Best Location for Dinning:

Just when shopping alone isnâ€™t enough, this is also the perfect place to get a taste of the world. Tsim Sha Tsui is undoubtfully the international food ecstasy of Kowloon with restaurants representing all major cultural delights

Attractions Nearby:

Destinations such as amusement parks, major tourist attractions, hotels, banks, just about anything that you can think of are just minutes away from the Cosmic.

Harbour C

name: Long-stay Wanchai 2-BR Flat- Airy & Charming
description:
Beautifully maintained doorman building in the heart of Wanchai off Queen's Road East. High floor, fully renovated with 4-star service apartment spec. lots of windows with unobstructed view. 1 minute to buses and 5 minutes to subway & tram - the apartment is set up for minimum 28 nights stay, my previous guests have stayed here from one to 6 months.

The space
The apartment is in a well-maintained door-man building with 24 hours security and a proper entrance and Lobby.

We have just completed a gut-renovation in line with all requirements of a 4-star service apartment.

Guest access
The whole apartment is yours during your stay.

Other things to note
There is a jogging trail accessible within a 15 minutes hike of stairs through Wanchai Gap Road (Bowen Road).
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in a quieter residential part of Wanchai (very close to Hopewell Centre on Queen's Road East) close to local markets as well as western gourmet food markets with charming upmarket bars/restaurant/shopping as well as local eateries dotted all around. It is 8 minutes walk to the hard-core Wanchai Bar District.

name: 3 bedroom flat with hillside views
description:
This is a 3 bedroom flat with a study or guest room.

Each bedroom has a peaceful outlook onto the lush green hillside landscape, & bay windows are provided with a cushion mat ideal as a seating or relaxing den area.

The space
3 bedroom + study spacious flat with plenty of storage and a peaceful outlook onto the lush green hillside landscapes.

For less than 5 nights stay, please specify as this will incur an extra cleaning fee of $350, and for more than 4 guests, there is additional toiletry, and laundry charges for bed linen and towels.

There is a double bed in the main bedroom and in the second bedroom, and the third bedroom is provided with a twin bed and loft bed, and the living room has a queen-sized sofabed that can sleep another 2 people.

There is a study or maid's room if you wish to hire extra furniture eg. single bed or inflatable twin mattress as listed below.

neighborhood_overview:
Discovery Bay is popular for tourists, families and executives working in Central (25 minute ferry journey) and Kowloon side as well as the New Territories due to the highly integrated transport system in DB being linked to the public transport infrastructure such as the MTR that takes you to any location in HK efficiently with regard to time/speed as well as being cost effective.

Many people come to visit DB, and especially over the weekends just to eat at our Western restaurants, and close by is the beach promenade that provides nightly fireworks display from Disney and panoramic views towards Hong Kong Harbour.

Itâ€™s actually a very enjoyable place to spend an afternoon, with its tree-lined beach promenade, al fresco restaurants and some stunning natural scenery.

There are 18 restaurants, bars, cafÃ©s and bakeries facing the plaza on one side and the beach or bay on the other.

It also has many walking trails and scenic landscapes ideal for p
host_location: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong
host_about:
I am Chinese & was brought up in the UK and born in Malaysia, but lived in Hong Kong for over 30 years now.

My childhood was spent mainly travelling around with my family of  5 siblings as my father was stationed at several British Army bases around Malaysia, Singapore, Hong Kong & the UK. Therefore, I enjoy travelling & meeting people of different cultures.

I have travelled to Europe & the States during my student days & most of my family members have now settled in the States & the UK.

I preferred to settle in Hong Kong as the place is as vibrant as the people who play hard, & work hard here. Hong Kong has a 'buzz' you cannot find anywhere else in the world. 

It has been interesting living through the changes from the British colonial days to the handover back to China, & being part of 'history', & revealing of the versatility of the people here to the changing times to not just strive, but thrive in various aspects of their lives & livelihood.

Hong Kong brings out the best & worst in you... ^_^

neighborhood_overview:
Tsim Sha Tsui is the cityâ€™s most exciting area, with top notch museums such as The Science Museum and Art Museum clustered around the waterfront. Nathan Road, Chungking Mansions and the Avenue of Stars, the latter boasting the best views in town.

Although the apartment is in a vibrant area, the apartment itself is very quite a night. Its a perfect escape after a long day out and about.

There are over 2,500 restaurants in the area which cater to every taste, from traditional Chinese Dim Sum, hawker style stall foods to exceptional French cuisine within 5 star hotels.

Supermarkets and 24/7 convenience stores are just down the road, which can provide you all of your daily necessities any time day or night.
host_about:
Loves to travel and see the world.  Over recent years, I've travelled to London, Amsterdam, Paris, LA, San Francisco, Taiwan, Shanghai, Beijing, Australia, India, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, and Korea.  However, there is no place like home.

That is why I want to be a great host and have you enjoy your holiday.  Welcome fellow travellers.

Newly renovated studio apartment right in the heart of HK's Soho District. Five minutes walk to the partying areas like Lan Kwai Fong, at the doorstep of the latest hot spot PMQ, this is a spot not to be missed!

The space
The apartment is located on the third floor of a walk up building, no lift unfortunately! It is however completely brand new with a hotel quality queen size Serta Mattress, Video On Demand cable box and loads of amenities.

Guest access
You will have the entire apartment to yourself and I hope you will truly enjoy living right on Hollywood Road, steps away from HK's hot nightlife districts like Lan Kwai Fong, Soho, etc.

Other things to note
Check In & Check Out:

Check in is anytime after 3PM. If you need the unit before then please let us know and we will check if there is someone occupying the unit.

Check out is at 11AM daily and a later time can be arranged as long as there ar
host_about:
Thank you for checking out our listing! To let you know a little bit more about us, we run a service apartment company called Tane Residence. Currently, we operate more than 90 units in Hong Kong and over 20 units in Vietnam. We are rapidly expanding this network, opening between 20 to 30 new properties every year.

Our tastefully decorated apartments blends the best of worlds - homely comforts and modern design to offer a unique stay.  

We value offering our customers outstanding service, excellent experience and great value for money. With a team that works 7 days a week to answer emails and ensure the needs of our guests are taken care of, we are proud to offer top notch customer service support.

neighborhood_overview:
Sai Ying Pun is an area in Western District, in the northwestern part of Hong Kong Island, in Hong Kong. It is administratively part of Central and Western District.

In Chinese language (Cantonese dialect regarding the spoken version), Sai (è¥¿) means "west" and Ying Pun (ç‡Ÿç›¤) means "camp", especially military camp. It was where the early British military (website hidden) Ying Pun is built on the steeply sloping lower slopes of Victoria Peak and also on the western reclamation. The areas of Shek Tong Tsui and Kennedy Town are located to the west, Sheung Wan and Tai Ping Shan are to the east, and Midlevels is higher on the hill to the south. Victoria Harbour is to the north.
host_about:
I've often thought that one of the best things about traveling the world is getting to meet new people with exciting stories and backgrounds. Hosting on Airbnb gives me the chance to do that every day! 

I love traveling, playing guitar and drums, playing all kinds of sports, cooking, going to the beach, learning about everything I can, and pursuing new business ideas! And traveling! 

Let me know when you are coming to Hong Kong and I will do my best to help make arrangements for you! This an amazing city, and whether you are coming for the first time or the fiftieth, you can always find something new! 

See you soon and safe travels! 

-Mark

name: Cosy room in Sai Ying Pun heart of HK Female Only
description:
It is a quiet single bedroom with a bed, a drawer, a wardrobe and a foldable desk, high floor, modern contemporary decor with lots of natural lights and a touch with quality accessories.
The building itself located just 2 mins walk from Sai Ying Pun Station, 1-2 mins walk to supermarkets, cafes, 5-10 mins walk to HK Macau Ferry Terminal, 5 mins subway ride or 15 mins walk to central. Prime location, very easy access to all attractions, restaurants, bars and parks all over Hong Kong.

The space
Your room is a 1 person single guest room, with clean bed linens, drawer, wardrobe, etc. The apartment is cosy, clean and well maintained, convenient to stay in or go out to explore HK.

Advantages:
1. clean, modern decor, high floor with nice view overlooking Kowloon side
2.Your room is bright and quiet with all essentials to stay comfort
3.Easy access to all public transportations
4.Lots of resturants/bars/cafes/shoppings nearby
neighborhood_overview:
Located in between Sai Ying Pun and Sheung Wan, just 2 subway stops away from the luxury yet busy Financial District of HK, the neighbourhood is funky, lively , trendy, yet down to earth, easy to fit in. Known as "French quarter" or "small Brooklyn" of HK,it becomes a new hipster central, attracts to lots of young expats and local professionals who is working hard and play harder:)

The neighborhood is home to lots of brilliant cafÃ©s and coffee shops, fantastic local and international cuisine, antique shops , art galleries and boutique designers shops, the famous antique street and trendy PMQ just 10-15 mins walk from my place. Locals, expats, tourists, businessmen, artists, you can ran into a lot of different people here, very interesting and tourists friendly.

Parks: Sun Yat Sen Memorial Park just 5 mins walk, it offers a standard public swimming pool, morning jogging trail along the harbour , soccer field and 2 basketballs courts. Perfect for a morning walk
neighbourhood: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

name: STUDIO Apartment in Kowloon
description:
This apartment is solely yours for when you book. It is located in a quiet area near the city with easy access to local eateries as well as a short trip to other places in Kowloon and Hong Kong. Convenient public transport nearby and on your doorstep

The space
This apartment is solely yours for when you book. It is located in a quiet area with easy access to local eateries as well as a short trip to more high-end dining spots. A short cab ride can take you to the Pier of the Star Ferry & Ocean Terminal (Mall). This provides easy access for sightseeing the rest of Hong Kong.

Hung Hom is a peaceful area with low-rise buildings surrounding the area. Supermarkets and convenient stores are nearby when you come out of the apartment. Public transport is an ease in Hong Kong, and you will be able to get around to all areas of Hong Kong within in a short period of time.

The apartment is fully furnished en-suite room with a double bed, desk and chair
neighborhood_overview:
Hung Hom is an area of Kowloon. The area is mainly residential, giving people easy access to other districts of Hong Kong and connections directly to the Hong Kong Island.

It is really easy to get around in Hong Kong and this apartment located in Kowloon will get you to anywhere within 15-20 minutes by bus, taxi or train (all ways of transport are cheap in Hong Kong relatively).

host_about:
Panda Boutique Hostel is located within 1-minute walking distance from Mong Kok MTR station and several steps away from Sai Yeung Choi Street South, which recorded more per hour footfall average (20,500 pedestrians) than Time Square in New York (15,700 pedestrians). Guest could stay at Mong Kok for a taste of genuine street-side local culture, presented to you through the delicious snacks and art performance, or travel to other hot spots utilization the MTR within 5 to 10 minutes. 
Panda is delicately decorated with stylish accommodation, and offers 24-hour non-stop hot water, air-conditioning, wifi as well as high-resolution TV that you can surf the Internet with. We aim to provide cozy and simple accomodation at competitive price.

One bed room with double bed, storage and full mountain view

One bathroom with bathtub.

Guest rent the whole flat.

This is a quiet place in a beautiful setting.

Click our profile picture to view all our room types pictures from wish lists.

The space
We total have 3 shared bedrooms, 1 private semi-double bedroom, shared bathrooms, and comfortable common area, accommodate 14 people.

More than 20 bus and mini-bus routes from the bus stations 3 mins away from the dorm.

name: Greenery Gardens, Pokfulam
description:
Family Flat with 3 bedrooms & great amenities, balcony and sea view. Our home is on the South Side of Hong Kong that is very close to the vibrant city, 5 minutes away from stunning country walks and with an amazing sea view. The flat is open plan with a spacious living area, a large well equipped large kitchen. 3 bedrooms - 1 king sized ensuite, 1 bunk beds and 1 with a loft bed. The building has fantastic amenities with a great gym and popular outdoor pool. The pool opens Apr to mid Oct

The space
Being so close to the business and entertainment areas yet set in a quiet area with sea and mountains views makes this spacious flat a great base from which to enjoy Hong Kong. We are also five minutes away from Kennedy Town which is a vibrant part of Hong Kong with lots of great bars and restaurants.

Guest access
You will have full access to the entire flat. We will create space in the wardrobes and cupboards for your clothes.
neighborhood_overview: Pokfulam is a quiet residential area on the outskirts of the city.  It is very well connected to all areas in Hong Kong.  There are supermarkets within 5 minutes drive of the flat.  Kennedy Town is also 5 minutes away where there are great bars, restaurants and all the amenities of a small town.
host_about: I live and work in Hong Kong where I am a teacher.  I have three daughters and we love travelling.

name: Female Dorm Bed#2/Wan Chai/close to MTR
description:
My place is close to everything travelers want. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the coziness, the comfy bed, and the views. Friendly staff is guaranteed. The China Visa Office is a block away!

The space
The hostel is located at the most convenient spot you can find. We are well connected to every part of HK. Tram, buses, MTR and Ferries are all available modes of transport from our hostel. Our staff are friendly and experienced and always willing to run the extra mile to make your stay an enjoyable one. For guests who need a visa run, we are next to many embassy offices, e.g. China Visa Office, Vietnam Embassy. We are also close to the IELTS exam centre and Hong Kong Convention & Exhibition centre.

Guest access
Guests are most welcome to use the air conditioned common areas anytime. The common area on the Reception Floor is new and comfy. There are smaller common areas on each floor as well.

Other things to note
There
neighborhood_overview: Wan Chai is for foodies! Why? Just look at the number of Michelin restaurants we have in our neighbourhood. Wan Chai is also an area with local colour (e.g. Blue House, Tai Yuen Street) but connected to the international part of HK, e.g. Central, Causeway Bay.
host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.
