name: Modern Seaview 4 BR Apt-Marina view
description:
The 4-bedroom flat has been modernised & provides relaxing sea views overlooking the Marina.

It can accommodate up to 10-12 people. For less than 5 nights stay, please specify as this will incur an extra cleaning fee of $400, and for more than 5 guests, there is additional toiletry, and laundry charges for bed linen and towels.

Free WIFI & multi-channel TV.

You can view photo album for various children bed set designs for bedroom themes.

The space
The flat has been completely rewired with new plumbing and sanitary fittings, new tiling, new floors, new picture windows providing relaxing sea views and views over the Marina. It is a quiet location with a bright and breezy perspective.

Interiors & Facilities:-
The 4-bedroom apartment is efficiently laid out and planned for allowing up to 10-12 people to reside there. Even though at 814 sf, I have had up to 10 people booked at the flat with no problems for sleeping arra
neighborhood_overview:
Discovery Bay consists of a piazza with a strip of restaurants for alfresco dining, and the outdoor seating is very popular with most facing the promenade and overlooking the beach and Tai Pak Bay, or Disney in the horizon for nightly firework displays. Wi-Fi broadband connection is available free of charge at the eateries, along the beach and in the main plaza.

Discovery Bay Residents Club & Siena Clubhouse:-
For terms of 28 nights or more, access to Discovery Bay Clubhouses can be requested but all admin. fees and membership fees will be borne by the guest.

We have also have a private 7-seater car for additional leisure activities and photo field tours of HK for our guests, so you can always ask for more details if you are interested to do some field trips in various locations of HK.

For those who enjoy outdoor activities, you may also like to ask us about hiking trails or hire inflatable kayaks and family tents. We can arrange drop off at camp s
host_location: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong
host_about:
I am Chinese & was brought up in the UK and born in Malaysia, but lived in Hong Kong for over 30 years now.

My childhood was spent mainly travelling around with my family of  5 siblings as my father was stationed at several British Army bases around Malaysia, Singapore, Hong Kong & the UK. Therefore, I enjoy travelling & meeting people of different cultures.

I have travelled to Europe & the States during my student days & most of my family members have now settled in the States & the UK.

I preferred to settle in Hong Kong as the place is as vibrant as the people who play hard, & work hard here. Hong Kong has a 'buzz' you cannot find anywhere else in the world. 

It has been interesting living through the changes from the British colonial days to the handover back to China, & being part of 'history', & revealing of the versatility of the people here to the changing times to not just strive, but thrive in various aspects of their lives & livelihood.

Hong Kong brings out the best & worst in you... ^_^

name: saikung village house
description:
We have a beautiful room for rent in Saikung - just 30 mins bus and/or train to HK island, 20 mins bus to Mongkok and TST, 5 mins bus to HKUST and 10 mins bus to Saikung trail walk. Nearby you can easily find restaurants, a 7-11 and supermarket.

The space
We are in a quiet part of Hong Kong with hiking trails and the sea nearby. Part of a duplex with roof, the room is bright and airy with air-con.

You also have your own private bathroom with toilet and shower (not en suite) and access to a washing machine, kitchen, lounge and cable-TV. On the roof is a nice sitting indoor and outdoor area.

Living in the same house are two dogs (Max Mae) and two cats (Smudge and Munchkin).

The main town of Saikung is 15 minutes by bus and is packed with seafood / other restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and much more. There are also ferries to islands and beaches to explore.

Guest access
Kitchen with kettle, toaster and micr
neighborhood_overview:
It's quiet, peaceful and with plenty of lush greenery. Lots of hiking trails and very convenient for public transport.

This is ideal for people looking to experience another side of Hong Kong away from the hustle and bustle of the city yet still close enough to visit the island and shopping areas.

name: Soho Luxury Apt, All New Renos *1A
description:
Newly renovated studio apartment right in the heart of HK's Soho District. Five minutes walk to the partying areas like Lan Kwai Fong, at the doorstep of the latest hot spot PMQ, this is a spot not to be missed!

The space
The apartment is located on the second floor of a walk up building, no lift unfortunately! It is however completely brand new with a hotel quality queen size Serta Mattress, Video On Demand cable box and loads of amenities.

Guest access
You will have the entire apartment to yourself and I hope you will truly enjoy living right on Hollywood Road, steps away from HK's hot nightlife districts like Lan Kwai Fong, Soho, etc.

Other things to note
Check In & Check Out:

Check in is anytime after 3PM. If you need the unit before then please let us know and we will check if there is someone occupying the unit.

Check out is at 11AM daily and a later time can be arranged as long as there ar
host_about:
Thank you for checking out our listing! To let you know a little bit more about us, we run a service apartment company called Tane Residence. Currently, we operate more than 90 units in Hong Kong and over 20 units in Vietnam. We are rapidly expanding this network, opening between 20 to 30 new properties every year.

Our tastefully decorated apartments blends the best of worlds - homely comforts and modern design to offer a unique stay.  

We value offering our customers outstanding service, excellent experience and great value for money. With a team that works 7 days a week to answer emails and ensure the needs of our guests are taken care of, we are proud to offer top notch customer service support.

host_about:
Panda Boutique Hostel is located within 1-minute walking distance from Mong Kok MTR station and several steps away from Sai Yeung Choi Street South, which recorded more per hour footfall average (20,500 pedestrians) than Time Square in New York (15,700 pedestrians). Guest could stay at Mong Kok for a taste of genuine street-side local culture, presented to you through the delicious snacks and art performance, or travel to other hot spots utilization the MTR within 5 to 10 minutes. 
Panda is delicately decorated with stylish accommodation, and offers 24-hour non-stop hot water, air-conditioning, wifi as well as high-resolution TV that you can surf the Internet with. We aim to provide cozy and simple accomodation at competitive price.

Easy access to the airport, restaurants, shopping centers and tourist attractions. Every room has its own bathroom, air conditioning, TV and telephone. Free Wifi is also available. Welcome to Hong Kong! Since 2006, I operate a licensed hostel at 12/F, 440-442 Nathan Road (Search "440 Nathan HK" on Maps). The location is 3 minutes away from the Yaumatei MTR Station C Exit, providing easy access to the airport, restaurants, shopping centers and tourist attractions. Every room has its own bathroom, air conditioning, TV and telephone. Free Wifi is also available. Discount is offered for weekly or monthly stay.

*I'm not good at communicating in English. I apologize in advance if your inquiries are not responded in a timely manner.

name: Middle floor of Village House, Mui Wo, Hong Kong
description:
Modern, newly renovated, 650 Sq Foot middle floor, consisting of an open plan living room/kitchen, balcony, double bedroom and ensuite bathroom. Fibre Optic Wifi. Smart TV. Airconditioning with dehumidier and heating functions. Double glazed. Note: 1st floor shares door and open plan staircase with owners on top floor.

Located at the start of the Olympic Trail 2 kilometers from the Mui Wo ferry pier and bus terminals, and 800 meters from the Mui Wo sports center and Lantau taxi drop off point.

The space
A modern, fully equipped and newly renovated apartment occupying the middle floor of a shared Mui Wo village house. Surrounded by nature and with views of the mountains and buffalo fields, the apartment is a peaceful location to relax or enjoy trail running, hiking, swimming, cycling and water sports. Hong Kong Island, Kowloon, and the international airport are all less than 45 minutes away.

PLEASE NOTE : the guest space on 1st floor and
neighborhood_overview: Mui Wo is also called Silvermine Bay and used to be a traditional fishing village. It is now a thriving rural seaside community where most of its residents commute each day on ferry to work on Hong Kong Island or Kowloon.  It is a 30-40 minute taxi ride or bus ride to Hong Kong International Airport and 30 min ferry ride to Central Pier on Hong Kong Island.
host_about:
Fanny is a former professional volleyball player from Shanghai China and a round the world motorcycling adventurer. She now a lawyer, lives in Shanghai and Hong Kong and travels extensively. 

Rupert is a former Royal Hong Kong Police Inspector, Forensic investigator and motorcycling adventure. He lives in a tent and is occasionally allowed inside.

name: Cozy Guesthouse near CWB - FEMALE GUESTS ONLY
description:
Clean new apartment - renting bedroom room out for female backpackers. We will share the living room, kitchen and bathroom. You will have your own separate room with a double bed and look.

The space
New building with 24 hours service frontend desk. The room is located in the middle floor of the building. 10 mins walk to SOGO, 5 mins walk to Time Square/MTR Exit A and 10 mins by bus to Hung Hum.

The guest room is a room of 10 sqm/100 sqf. with double bed in a 2-room apartment. You will share the living room/the kitchen and the bathroom with the host.

Please note that as the host is female, so all guests need to be strictly FEMALE. Guests with kids, pleaes talk to host first before booking.

Access
1 min walk to the bus station of 1/101/111.
It is right next to the Chartered house hotel. For those who travel from airport, you can leverage the hotel shuttle bus.
Time to the below place
Central - 10 mins by bus

name: Special offer! 1 mins walk from MTR Causeway Bay!
description:
Modern, renovated unit in the heart of Causeway Bay. Stay in the middle of every convenience, pleasure and amenity HK has to offer: the MTR station, Times Square, Hysan Place, Fashion Walk, SOGO & hundreds of restaurants are all right by the building! You're also steps away from Victoria Park, the largest outdoor space on HK Island!

The space
The unit includes:
- high speed WiFi
- 1 double bed, bedding and all linens
- Fully equipped bathroom (shampoo, hair dryer etc.)
- TV

Sharing your story is fun!
You are able to meet people from around the world in our apartments!

Guest access
You may access the facilities and amenities in room(air conditioner,wifi, electric water heater, locker), the hallway (hairdryer, fridge)and the common area(including microwave oven, toaster, drinking water machine, iron, electric sockets and etc).

Other things to note
You may grab a fresh towel for 20hkd
neighborhood_overview: We are located at the heart of Causeway Bay with Wellcome supermarket, Pacific Coffee or Starbucks Coffee, Sogo and Time Square, restaurants, banks, Post Office, laundry shop and metro station all in walking distance of 3-7 minutes.

Let's joining us for home-stay!

description:
This beautiful Japanese tatami-style room is the perfect hideaway in the very heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong!

â€¢ Large window with sweeping views over Kowloon Park
â€¢ Comfortable queen-sized bed
â€¢ Small private bathroom with rain shower
â€¢ Split-type AC to keep you cool
â€¢ Daily room cleaning included
â€¢ Linens + toiletries provided
â€¢ Unbeatable location on Nathan Rd
â€¢ Impressive WalkScore of 100

The space
The Deluxe Park View Room at Atlas Hostel, designed by Ryoyu Kido, offers affordable luxury, insta-worthy views, and a super-central location.



This 1BD, 1BA room is ideal for single travelers or couples looking to stay in the middle of the action, surrounded by the endless restaurants, bars, shops, and landmarks of TST. Feel the pulse of Hong Kong and soak up the vibrant, multicultural atmosphere of the city, and then retreat to your beautiful room to recharge for tomorrow.
neighborhood_overview:
Atlas Hostel is centrally-located in Tsim Sha Tsui, a popular shopping and nightlife district that many would call the â€œtrue Hong Kong.â€ Full of diverse restaurants, bars, shops, and luxury malls, this area is an absolute must-see for all visitors.



Located on Nathan Rd, directly across from Kowloon Park and the iconic Mosque, and just steps away from MTR Exit B1. Itâ€™s close to malls, museums, galleries, the Promenade, and the Harbour. You couldnâ€™t choose a better launching pad to explore the city!
host_about: Conveniently located on Nathan Road, along one of Hong Kongâ€™s main arteries, Atlas is a stylishly designed accommodation that keeps its guests firmly on the pulse of this bustling metropolis. No matter who you are â€“ a group of friends looking to bunk in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, a businessman ready to combine work with pleasure, or a family looking for safe, comfortable accommodations close to all the top attractions â€“ Atlas suits the needs of any traveller. Just 20 meters away from Tsim Sha Tsui MTR Station and a 10-minute stroll from the Star Ferry Pier, Atlas offer easy access to all of Hong Kongâ€™s popular areas, including Central, Mong Kok and Causeway Bay. Affordable rates and its unique style make Atlas one of the best deals in the city!

This beautiful Japanese tatami-style room is the perfect hideaway in the very heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong!

â€¢ Large window with sweeping views over Kowloon Park
â€¢ Comfortable queen-sized bed
â€¢ Small private bathroom with rain shower
â€¢ Split-type AC to keep you cool
â€¢ Daily room cleaning included
â€¢ Linens + toiletries provided
â€¢ Unbeatable location on Nathan Rd
â€¢ Impressive WalkScore of 100

The space
The Deluxe Park View Room at Atlas Hostel, designed by Ryoyu Kido, offers affordable luxury, insta-worthy views, and a super-central location.



This 1BD, 1BA room is ideal for single travelers or couples looking to stay in the middle of the action, surrounded by the endless restaurants, bars, shops, and landmarks of TST. Feel the pulse of Hong Kong and soak up the vibrant, multicultural atmosphere of the city, and then retreat to your beautiful room to recharge for tomorrow.
neighborhood_overview:
Atlas Hostel is centrally-located in Tsim Sha Tsui, a popular shopping and nightlife district that many would call the â€œtrue Hong Kong.â€ Full of diverse restaurants, bars, shops, and luxury malls, this area is an absolute must-see for all visitors.



Located on Nathan Rd, directly across from Kowloon Park and the iconic Mosque, and just steps away from MTR Exit B1. Itâ€™s close to malls, museums, galleries, the Promenade, and the Harbour. You couldnâ€™t choose a better launching pad to explore the city!
host_about: Conveniently located on Nathan Road, along one of Hong Kongâ€™s main arteries, Atlas is a stylishly designed accommodation that keeps its guests firmly on the pulse of this bustling metropolis. No matter who you are â€“ a group of friends looking to bunk in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, a businessman ready to combine work with pleasure, or a family looking for safe, comfortable accommodations close to all the top attractions â€“ Atlas suits the needs of any traveller. Just 20 meters away from Tsim Sha Tsui MTR Station and a 10-minute stroll from the Star Ferry Pier, Atlas offer easy access to all of Hong Kongâ€™s popular areas, including Central, Mong Kok and Causeway Bay. Affordable rates and its unique style make Atlas one of the best deals in the city!

name: "Free" - Cozy, charming, just renewed studio
description:
This is a small studio that was just renovated Its comfy,neat,and greatly accommodates 1 or 2.Couch,bathroom small kitchen but fully equipped. Super well located,in heart of the city!near to all transport;3 min walk to metro. Weekly cleaning can be arranged at additional charges.

The space
THE STUDIO:
This is a small "L" shape studio flat on the 5th floor accessed by lift, very convenient and very well located in Sheung Wan bordering Central. It has about 160sq/feet in size newly decorated and painted, functional and charming looking flat. We tried our best make use of the space available and made it feel like home and at the same time easy to handle on rushy daily bases. It is plenty of storage space so you can keep your belongings organized to make use of the space.
Couch and Tv with Cable TV, computer desk, spacious wardrobe, vacuum cleaner for easy maintenance, practical and fully equipped kitchen: oven, microwave, fridge, blender, electric kettle,
neighborhood_overview:
Many restaurants, Cafes, plenty of laundry shops on the block, supermarkets (including international ones), fresh market, gyms, pharmacies... Pretty much everything you need for a pleasant stay. All nearby.

Its a calm street but it can get pretty busy during lunch time on weekdays.
The neighborhood is very very safe as is Hong Kong in general.
If you are not into cooking you have many choices of restaurants around both asian and western food.
neighbourhood: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

name: Modern Newly Decoration Cozy APT ~
description:
This apt is very close to the MTR/Subway,it only takes u 1 min to get to there,fully furnished,newly renovated in Oct 2015 and decorate in high class western design.It's located at the heart of busy Tsim Sha TSui District!

The space
. 1min walk to TST MTR
. 1 MTR stop from Temple Street. 3 stops away from Central.
. 1min to famous shopping malls e.g. "The One", "Miramar", "Miramall".
. 1min to very famous bars street "Knutsford Terrace".
. 3 mins to laundry.
. 5 mins to the Space Museum, the Science Museum.
. 5 mins to Avenue of Stars and Star Ferry.

name: 6 Beds Mixed Dorm 1
description:
This dormitory is including comfort bunk bed, clean and basic bed linings and personal lockers.

The room is bright and lots of fresh air because there are many windows in the room.

Air-conditioner is provided in the room.

No curfew ( Just remember to bring your key!)

The space
We provide the below things for every guest :
- Comfort bunk bed
- Clean and basic bed linings
- Personal locker (with lock)
- Reading light
- International plug and USB adapter

Guest access
Fully access to all facilities including:
-Free Wifi
-Free tourist information
-Free water, coffee and tea
-24 hours hot shower
-Fridge and microwave
-Comfort sofa
-Hair Dryer
-4 Shared bathroom
-Air-conditioner and fan
-Books exchange
neighborhood_overview:
You can reach the below shop and transportation within 2mins by walk!!
-24hours McDonalds
-Tsim Sha Tsui Metro Station (Exit A1 / C1 / H)
-Airport bus Station, bus no. A21 (Day-time) / N21(Over-night)
-Taxi stop
-Local style restaurant
-Convenience store
-I-square Shopping mall
-Supermarket
-Bar
-Cinema
host_about:
We had been being backpacking and travelling in many countries. Therefore we know what a traveller exactly needs. We set up this hostel is aimed to provide budget and comfort accommodation to you.

We are Located at the heart of Kowloon - Tsim Sha Tsui. Easy accessible from airport and to everywhere in Hong Kong even Macau and China nearby.
1 minute walking distance to MTR station and 2 minutes to airport bus stop.

The space
Licensed since 2006 and located in the heart of Hong Kong (Search "440 Nathan HK" on Maps), our hostel is 3 min walk away from the Yaumatei MTR Station C Exit. Easy access to the airport, restaurants, shopping centers and tourist attractions. Every room has its own bathroom, air conditioning, TV and telephone. Free Wifi is also available. Discount is offered for weekly or monthly stay.

Welcome to Hong Kong! Since 2006, I operate a licensed hostel at 12/F, 440-442 Nathan Road (Search "440 Nathan HK" on Maps). The location is 3 minutes away from the Yaumatei MTR Station C Exit, providing easy access to the airport, restaurants, shopping centers and tourist attractions. Every room has its own bathroom, air conditioning, TV and telephone. Free Wifi is also available. Discount is offered for weekly or monthly stay.

*I'm not good at communicating in English. I apologize in advance if your inquiries are not responded in a timely manner.

neighborhood_overview: Hop Inn is located in the heart of the historical Tsim Sha Tsui district, nestled among five star hotels. A three-minute walk takes you to the breathtaking Victoria Harbor, the monumental Cultural Centre and the Art Museum.
host_about:
Located in TST nestled around 5-star hotels, HOP INN is a cozy hostel designed with independent travelers from around the world in mind. Whether you are travelling with only one backpack or lugging along a couple of suitcases, we are pleased to offer you a comfy, modern, and clean, yet affordable, living space while offering friendly and helpful service.

* Exterior area is old in the building, we put a big effort to maintain our space in cozy, please reconsider before booking if it's your concern.

name: Cozy and beautiful room at Sai Kung
description:
We have a beautiful room for rent in Saikung - just 30 mins bus and/or train to HK island, 20 mins bus to Mongkok and TST, 5 mins bus to HKUST and 10 mins bus to Saikung trail walk. Nearby you can easily find restaurants, a 7-11 and supermarket.

The space
We are in a quiet part of Hong Kong with hiking trails and the sea nearby. Part of a duplex with roof, the room is bright and airy with air-con.

You also have your own private bathroom with toilet and shower (not en suite) and access to a washing machine, kitchen, lounge and cable-TV. On the roof is a nice sitting indoor and outdoor area.

Living in the same house are two dogs (Max Mae) and two cats (Smudge and Munchkin).

The main town of Saikung is 15 minutes by bus and is packed with seafood / other restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and much more. There are also ferries to islands and beaches to explore.

Guest access
Kitchen with kettle, toaster and micr
neighborhood_overview:
It's quiet, peaceful and with plenty of lush greenery. Lots of hiking trails and very convenient for public transport.

This is ideal for people looking to experience another side of Hong Kong away from the hustle and bustle of the city yet still close enough to visit the island and shopping areas.

name: Entire House 4 BR &  4 T/B (8-16pax)
description:
We are happy to host you in Hong Kong
1. Short Term (1 or 2 nights)
- birthday celebration,
- special events like Wedding or Banquet
- recreation and gathering,
We ensure sparkling clean and sanitized place for your family or friends to enjoy
2. Medium Term (more than 1 night)
- Tour to Hong Kong to stay
We are happy to assist or suggest itinerary for your vacation in Hong Kong
3. Long Term (1 month or above)
- negotiable, in case you prefer to stay long with us

The space
Our apartment is about 850 s.f located in 4/F of Block A of Pak On Building, Austin Road. We have 2 lifts in our building for the convenience of our guest and our building is accessible 24 hours daily (with 24/7 security guard on duty).

We have total 4 bedrooms that comes in different sizes. Each room have it's own TV, aircon, wifi access and private toilet.

We have refrigerator, microwave, kettle
neighborhood_overview:
We are nestled in the heart of Kowloon Central, in the centre of Jordan and TST Nathan Road. Public transportation is accessible including MTR, the fastest vehicle to reach all destinations in Hong Kong.

Going to the West side of our place is 2 minutes walk to Kowloon Park and 15 mins walk going to straight direction is a West Kowloon Promenade, Harbour City and Elements (Shopping Mall), West Kowloon Station (High Speed Rail connecting to China) as well as Hong Kong Macau Ferry.

Going to South Direction is Tsim Sha Tsui area, 10 mins walk to Avenue of Stars, Cultural Centre and HK Space Museum.

To the East is going to the direction of Polytechnic University, Hung Hom KCR station and TST east, Science Museum and Rosary Church.

To the North side is walking distance to Temple Street Night market or Two (2) MTR stops to Mong Kok Ladies Market & Nelson Street (Rubber Shoe Market), a place famous for all branded rubber shoes in good price.
host_about:
I live to eat! So I travel to meet new friends, see new places and explore different delicacies of different places in the world! 

I am a Filipina and my husband Ken is a local HK person. As a host, we match most of our guest expectations. We are hospitable and friendly family and we put cleanliness of our premises as priority. HK is also our expertise being a residence here for few decades. We give good tips to our guest to maximize their enjoyment during their stay in HK. We will be happy to host all kinds of tourist in HK coming from different parts of the world and from all walks of life.

name: Lantau House, garden,  7' to beach
description:
Three story house, bright and contemporary, 2100 sq ft, with lovely garden in a quiet area. Big master bedroom with en-suite large bathroom with Jacuzzi.
Views on Lantau mountains.
-20'to airport.
-7' walk to beach.
-10' to ferry to Central. (30 min ride)

Note: I understand that there is a lot of demand for short stays (I receive many inquiries) but I am very strict on the minimum of one week. Thanks for your understanding, do not ask me for shorter stays. Thanks.

Guest access
The whole house and garden will be available to you.

Other things to note
The beach is a 7 minute walk. The water is shallow and very suitable for children.There are many beautiful trails around the island and you can start walking right from the house. There are maps and guides of Hong Kong in the house.
host_about:
I am French and have been living for 40 years in Hong Kong. I am now retired and spend half of my time travelling and in my house in the Alpes de Haute Provence. 
Both in France and in Hong Kong I enjoy walking in the mountains and outdoor activities. 
My house has lots of CDs ,music of all kind, DVDs, books and adult and kid bikes

name: Artsy Neighbourhood near HKU and MTR
description:
This 450 sqft flat offers an ideal combination of location and comfort to help you make the most of your stay in Hong Kong. Located on one of Hong Kong's hippest streets full of designer cafes, creative agencies and boutiques, the flat itself is a quiet retreat with beautiful, soft natural light throughout the day. It has a modern bathroom and fully equipped kitchen including washing machine, and the second room is set up as an at-home office.

The space
The design-driven space is located on a quiet side-street in one of Hong Kong's most up-and-coming neighbourhoods. For a relaxing and hopefully inspiring stay, the apartment features all the comforts of home, including:

-Comfortable double bed with high thread-count linens
-My personally curated guide+map to the neighbourhood, plus guidebooks for larger Hong Kong
-Coffee, tea and a fully stocked kitchen
-All toiletries provided, plus excellent water pressure in the shower
-Air condi
neighborhood_overview:
Shek Tong Tsui, and particularly Po Tuck Street, have really come into their own in the last few years. When I first moved in, it was all automobile repair shops and furniture-building workshops, which now blissfully coexist alongside hip cafes, boutiques and watering holes. In this way, a stay on Po Tuck Street offers a microcosm of life in contemporary Hong Kong.

A pleasant 10-minute walk in either direction will get you to the fully gentrified areas of either Sai Ying Pun to the east or Kennedy Town in the west, both worthy destinations for a fun night out.
You also have Hong Kong's beloved Morning Trail at your doorstep for the most rewarding morning runs, and a 5 minute downhill, just under the sci-fi-esque fly-over, will reward you with a wonderful waterfront vista from one of Hong Kong's best kept secrets: Instagram Pier.
host_about: I'm a writer and editor who loves to live in exciting cities. My work and love for cities has taken me from Baltimore to Amsterdam and Cambridge to Melbourne, and now I'm happily settled for a bit in Hong Kong.
neighbourhood: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

name: ELEMENTS & ICC MTR AUSTIN! 850sf 2Baths Sleeps 7!
description:
Our place is in Kowloon few minutes from Elements Mall/ICC.
It offers quality open living space and Harbour View.

MTR
#High Speed Rail & Austin Exit B5 (3min)
Jordan Exit A (5min)
Kowloon (10min)

AIRPORT BUS
A22(H$39) @ Austin Station

Newly renovated open-plan spacious for a group
-One spacious open-plan 850sqf loft (unusual for HK standard)
-2 Bathrooms (Full-size bathtub, GROHE showers, TOTO bidet toilets)
-1 King bed, 2 Queen sofa beds, 1 Single sofa bed
-24/7 Security guard and elevator

The space
View from the huge window room facing Victoria Harbour View and Hong Kong Island in 500m ahead (see photos)

7-Eleven & Circle K convenient shops and many local restaurants are nearby

One of the kind tranquil designer loft with highly personalised detail
Block-out motorised block-out curtain for quality sleep

Open high ceiling contemporary living area wi
neighborhood_overview:
HK tallest building ICC/Elements mall is easily connected by foot bridge.

Local attractions close to our loft include Temple Street Night Market, Sky 100, Clock Tower, Tsim Sha Tsui Promenade, Star Ferry, Jade Market, Shopping in Tsim Sha Tsui, and Kowloon Park.

I believe in good design and simple pleasures in life.

Design can change the mind, the lifestyle, the way you feel. 
Inspiring travel starts with finding good accommodation.

Enjoy your stay!

name: The apartment is at the Mong Kok center and has brand new decorations; it is a cozy apartment suitable for 5 persons; it is near the subway entrance; and there is a specially-assigned person who cleans the apartment and picks you up from the station.
description:
[Configuration] A bunk bed, with a lower bunk (for 2 persons) and an upper bunk (for 1 person)
There is a double bed which is 1.2 m wide, and the apartment can accommodate up to 5 persons.

Other configurations in the house are also complete, the air conditioner, the television, the electric kettle, the changeover plug, the hair dryer, the high-speed free Wi-Fi network and 24-hour hot shower and the like are all provided, and possible trouble is avoided; the house further has the private bathroom, to let you enjoy the private space.

Slippers and towels and so on are provided in the apartment; basic washing products such as shampoo and shower gel are also provided; and disposable toothbrushes and toothpaste etc are provided.

The mansion where the apartment is located has an elevator, and the apartment belongs to houses with elevators. It is under security, and is very convenient to come in and go out.

name: No sweat we got an elevator
description:
Forget the walk ups. Because this artsy studio has a lift . MTR, Trams and busses all in 1 minute away. In the super up and coming neighborhood of Sai Ying Pun. Where you still find true spirit of Hong Kong merged with the modern.

The space
Peaceful space to relax your mind after a day of busy Hong Kong.
You have a lot of luggage?
No problem, the LIFT will help you bring everything to the 18 th floor.
I also have a DOORMAN who will make sure everything is OK.
Unlike the old walk up buildings in Hong Kong.

Most of the furniture is home made with love. So they have their own character.
And each tiny detail in the flat has its story of being there.

MTR, Trams and busses all in 1 minute away. In the super up and coming neighborhood of Sai Ying Pun. Where you still find true spirit of Hong Kong merged with the modern.

Guest access
- WiFi
- Lift
- Doorman
- Fresh towels
- S
neighborhood_overview:
Located in one of the most up and coming areas of Hong Kong, Sai Ying Pun.
This neighborhood has a mix of classic vintage Hong Kong feel and trendy bars and restaurants.

1 minute walk away from a fresh food market where you can get fresh vegetables and meat.
A super convenient juice place, where you can get your day started.

There is also a super nice hidden pier. Where you can just admire Hong Kong s beauty.
host_about: Streetartist based in Hong Kong originally from Belgium.
neighbourhood: Sai Ying Pun, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

name: Cozy 2BR @ Kowloon downtown - walk to TST (1-6pax)
description:
Our cool & warm apt. is conveniently located in the very center of HK where next to a major transportation hub :
Hung Hom & Ho Man Tin MTR & is leisurely short walk to whampoa MTR. Also, walking to Tsim Sha Tsui (TST) area from Hunghom MTR exit D is just 10mins away.

** We also have another 2bedrooms modern apartment just newly renovated with all brand new furniture ready to welcome you. Please visit the link below for details and pics :-

https://abnb.me/KjpsaLrjmS

The space
This is my family's apartment. Since they only in HK a few months a year, we would like share our place when they travel and hope u enjoy staying in our sweet sweet home.

This 2bedroom apartment is spacious in about 556 Sq.ft. Its brand new furniture and tailor-made quality bedding, to provide you with the best comfort. We keep replacing new bedding and linens to maintain the high quality and cleanliness. The apartment is very clean and cozy with lovely
neighborhood_overview: We are in the downtown HK and is just few mins walk from Hung Hom & Ho Man Tin MTR exit B1, bus stop and Ferry. Walking to Tsim Sha Tsui (TST) area (shopping paradise - Canton Road, Nathan road, Harbour City, Kowloon Park, The One, iSquare, the Mira and Museums...) from Hunghom MTR exit D is just 10mins away. So its very easy access to the virtual attractions all around HK.
host_about:
Hi I am a native HK Chinese. I love travel and meet people from all over the world. I travel quite a lot and I have been to many cities around Europe, Australia and Asia. I love staying in apartment when I travel to learn more about the local cultures, languages and lifestyles. So I know what you need and will do my best to make your stay more comfortable and enjoyable.  

Apart from being a superhost, I would be pleased to be your local guide to show u the hidden side of old hk and see how local people live in that small but energetic city. A half day tour is hk480 per person. 

Tailor made tour will be according to your interest and time. Such as:-

~ making dumplings (other traditional Chinese food where available) in a studio, with shopping ingredients in wet market together. All equipments and ingredients incl. 

~ having a nice traditional Chinese meals or hotpot with a local family in their flat to experience locals lifestyle in real life. 

~ explore an area known for its deep-rooted fabric / fashion sourcing (incl fabric, beads, trim, buttons, leather, wool, pearls, tools ....) for many local and international designers! 

~ tour for viewing luxury apartments in HK with licensed real estate agency. 

~ A fun Cantonese lesson with a native speaker. So u can live like a local :) 

~ A nice relaxing deep tissue / shiatsu aroma massage hk480/hr. Hk780/2hrs. 

And whats more ....! Let me know your fantasy about HK and I will always make ur dreams come true !! Pls free feel to ask for more details :)

I look forward to be your new friend in HK and look forward to meeting u soon ;)

Cheers, 
Michelle xx

name: NEW Amazing Apt @ Central Wan Chai!
description:
Newly renovated designer apartment in the heart of Wan Chai, literally seconds away from the MTR station, restaurants, bars and entertainment area.
A beautiful space with a walk-in rain shower, Free WIFI, TV, comfy Queen Size bed and open kitchen.

The space
Newly renovated designer apartment (Dec 2015) in an older building in the heart of Wan Chai, literally seconds away from the MTR station, restaurants, bars and entertainment area.

The location is perfect for both business travelers and tourists exploring Hong Kong:
- 1 min walk to Wan Chai MTR Station
- Walking distance to Admiralty
- Less than 5 mins to Central or Tsim Sha Tsui by MTR (2 stops)
- Less than 3 mins to Causeway Bay by MTR (1 stop)
- Right in between the old and newer part of Wan Chai, with a great mix of local bars, restaurants and high-end modern restaurants.

The space itself is beautifully renovated:

- Open, bright views (a rar
neighborhood_overview: A minute walk from MTR station. Loads of bus, mini bus and taxi access.
host_about:
We are a couple from the UK, currently living and working in Hong Kong. Joyce runs her own Interior Design Firm. We just finished renovating our first apartment, and will start with the second one soon.
In our spare time we love to hike on one of the many amazing trails Hong Kong has to offer, travel, eat and take our dog to the beach. If you have any questions about our place or HK in general, feel free to ask!
neighbourhood: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

name: A cozy apartment in the center of the city!
description:
A well-furnished apartment located in the heart of city. 5 mins walk to Tin Hau MTR station and 30 secs to a tram station. many many nice restaurants and supermarket around. A big and comfortable bed (queenâ€™s size) perfect fit for a couple.

Lots of day light and quiet neighborhood.

A very convenient, compact and sparkling clean apartment with everything you need.

You can check more details re amenities I have posted in other sections of my post :)

(English speaking guests only)

The space
A compact apartment but you will get everything u need

Other things to note
Only can communicate with English speakers

description:
Whether youâ€™re a seasoned backpacker or a first-timer, Atlas Hostel will exceed your expectations! The Bunk Dorm Room is perfect for travelers on a budget, offering:

â€¢ A comfortable bunk bed with curtains for privacy in a 4-bunk room
â€¢ Split-type AC to keep you cool
â€¢ Personal reading light and charging port
â€¢ A shared bathroom with soap and shampoo
â€¢ Free WiFi
â€¢ Unbeatable location on Nathan Rd

The space
Welcome backpackers, wanderers, & explorers!

A mixed dorm room at Atlas Hostel gives you a great opportunity to meet people from all around the worldâ€¦right in the middle of the action, surrounded by the endless restaurants, bars, shops, and landmarks of Tsim Sha Tsui.

Explore on your own or meet up with your bunkmates: feel the pulse of Hong Kong and soak up the vibrant, multicultural atmosphere of the city!

Combining all the essentials + those little extras that make you feel at home, youâ€™ll
neighborhood_overview: Located on Nathan Rd, directly across from Kowloon Park and the iconic Mosque, and just steps away from MTR Exit B1. Itâ€™s close to malls, museums, galleries, the Promenade, and the Harbour. You couldnâ€™t choose a better launching pad to explore the city!
host_about: Conveniently located on Nathan Road, along one of Hong Kongâ€™s main arteries, Atlas is a stylishly designed accommodation that keeps its guests firmly on the pulse of this bustling metropolis. No matter who you are â€“ a group of friends looking to bunk in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, a businessman ready to combine work with pleasure, or a family looking for safe, comfortable accommodations close to all the top attractions â€“ Atlas suits the needs of any traveller. Just 20 meters away from Tsim Sha Tsui MTR Station and a 10-minute stroll from the Star Ferry Pier, Atlas offer easy access to all of Hong Kongâ€™s popular areas, including Central, Mong Kok and Causeway Bay. Affordable rates and its unique style make Atlas one of the best deals in the city!

* Tung Choi Street (alsoÂ known asÂ å¥³äººè¡—,Â Ladies' market,specializes in women's clothing, accessories, and cosmetics, and is open daily from noon to midnight. * Temple Street (night market and one of the busiestÂ flea marketsÂ at night in the territory)

Offering affordable rooms with flat-screen TVs, Hotel MK is ideal for a convenient stay in lively Mongkok District. Featuring free Wi-Fi, it is a 5-minute walk from Mongkok MTR subway station.

Hotel MK Hong Kong is a 15-minute walk from the numerous shopping options at the Temple Street and Fa Yuen Street. It is a 35-minute bus ride from Hong Kong International Airport.

Featuring city views, air-conditioned rooms at Hong Kong Hotel MK are simply furnished and have an attached bathroom. Tea/coffee-making facilities and bottled water are provided for guestsâ€™ convenience.

An outdoor terrace provides a nice setting for coffee and quiet afternoons in the sun. The staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist with luggage storage. In additional, complimentary Fresh Grind Coffee is provided at Hotel Lobby every morning (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) 

Transportation from Airport to Hotel:
We are suggest you can take Airport bus No. A21(HK$33 per person), take off at Mong Kok Sino Centre (Changsha Street) and our hotel is located across the Nathan Road. Or you also can by taxi from airport to the hotel is charge around HK$300 per trip (around 45 minutes).

24-hour professional concierge and security service

name: Home away from Home
description:
We welcome you with warm hospitality.

You come as a guest and leave as a friend of us.

Comfy 4.5 x 6 feet bed private room, cozy and homey shared common living area, kitchen and bathroom.

Flat located in a traditional Hong Kong style old building.

***** NO ELEVATOR. Easy 3 floors walkup to our place *****

Local & convenient district. Safe, unique, uncrowded.

100% true airbnb experience.

The space
This is our first and brand new airbnb flat in Hong Kong, therefore offering a huge discount for those who want to come, meet and explore Hong Kong. Definitely one of the *** best value-for-money *** stays in Hong Kong.

**********************************************************************
Our home is just 3 minutes walking from Sai Wan Ho MTR (Subway) station.

From the airport, the A12 airport bus will directly bring you to the entrance of our lovely place.
*************
neighborhood_overview:

This area is a 100% local and residential district.

Just 2-3 minutes leisure walking to Sai Wan Ho MTR (subway) station.

host_about:
We are a cheerful, friendly married couple from Hong Kong, the small, yet energetic and cosmopolitan city in Asia.

As a host, we will give you the best while you stay in Hong Kong.  The best bed, the best hospitality and the best secret in Hong Kong from us, the local who have the travelers' senses.

As a guest, we will make sure your place is 100% well-taken.  We are always hygienic, caring and respect local culture.

We have been traveling hard since we know how to spell  t-r-a-v-e-l.  From Himalayas to Dead Sea.  Drinking mojito in Cuba to eating kimchi in Korea.  Crossing the Pacific and Atlantic with cargo ship.  Walking through ancient Silk Road and trekking in Machu Picchu .  Riding donkey in the Andes while hitchhiking trucks in the Japan highways.

We went for a 30-month round-the-world journey since June 2013 and came back Hong Kong December 2015.

While we traveled, we always wanted to find a comfortable and homey place to stay and relax.  And now we are offering this to our guests.

We would love to meet you, share our experience and listen to your story.

Undoubtedly, you will get the best of Hong Kong from us.
neighbourhood: Sai Wan Ho, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

There is a Flatshare agreement to sign with us if you decide to confirm the booking with us, and a Hong Kong Government Stamp Duty to pay to the Hong Kong Government Tax which is usually less than HK$100 and a Key Deposit HK$500 which is refundable when you move out with us.

name: Sai Ying Pun - High Street
description:
Sai Ying Pun is an up and coming neighborhood near HK University. Since the opening of the MTR station, there's been a lot of new bars and restos opening up in this neighborhood. Young crowds, great vibe, and close to Central.

The space
This is a comfortable studio for 1 person maybe a couple. The unit has a double bed, desk, closet, pantry, bathroom, good window with lots of green view. Internet is included as well.
neighborhood_overview: This is a young and vibrant neighborhood with all sorts of bars, restaurants, supermarkets, laundry mats, gyms and close to the Sun Yuet Sun Park and Indoor Swimming Pool.  It's also steps away to the HK University.
neighbourhood: Sai Ying Pun, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong
amenities: ["Shampoo", "Air conditioning", "Essentials", "Heating", "Kitchen", "TV", "Wifi", "Fire extinguisher", "First aid kit"]

name: Entire Apt in Tung Chung, near Airport, Great View
description:
10 mins bus to Asia World Expo. 10 mins to airport. 5 mins to a mall. 30 mins train into the city. Close to the Big Buddha. Asian Style living room.
Balcony with panoramic views of the mountains and the sea. Cozy big bedroom with a work area attached. Fully equipped Kitchen and big bathroom. Remote controlled ceiling fans, heaters for winter. Close to train station/airport/hiking/shopping mall. Shuttle to Metro. Public Bus stop below.
Clean, private and peaceful haven that I share with you.

The space
The apartment is in the quieter and greener part of Hong Kong. It is 5 minutes to the train station and buses to the city also run from below the building. Perfect if you want to explore the city but prefer to wake up to some great view and quiet. You will have the entire apartment, except the tiny storage room.

The view is great and the apartment has a lot of plants which you do not need to water :) My helper will come in the morning on one
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet , yet you can access some of the open air bars and the big outlet mall within 5 mins.. The area is green with may gardens across the street and on the walk towards the train station. You can also walk by the sea. There is a bus station close by as well, that can take you to the various beaches. There is a hiking trail just opposite the apartment.
host_about: I travel for pleasure, and since my work involves a lot of travel, its a convenient arrangement :) I love to read! One motto ... you have been given life.. why not make the most of it! Make each day a new experience.
neighbourhood: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong

description:
House is located 5mins walk from Sham Shui Po and Prince Edward MTR. The private room has a single bed and a big closet, with window. You can enjoy the living area, kitchen and bathroom. Speaks great Eng, Mandarin & Cantonese.Lots of restaurant here

The space
The house is old fashion type, and paint the whole flat by ourselves, it is unique in the city^^

Guest access
Living Room , Kitchen and Toilet, All cooking equipment can be used too

Deposit of $1000 will be charged and will return back when check out if nothing is damaged.

description:
Ground floor of an old Hong Kong style house.
Super rare, accessible garden with a basketball court and all amenities free for use.

Fully equipped house
Extremely spacious, over 1000 sq foot of space. Living room, kitchen, dining area included.
Great location, right beside a convenience store (10 minutes walk to MTR, 15 minutes to Kowloon Tong) minutes from the bus station)

The space
Tired of living in small spaces and having to squeeze everyone in one room?
Well now you can have a whole place to yourself with a garden!
Extremely spacious and pleasant environment.

Guest access
Guest will have access to half the ground floor (over 1000sq foot)
Access to laundry, dishwasher, toilet etc.

Free Wi-Fi !!!
Your own room.

Other things to note
PLEASE NOTE:
All photos here are for REFERENCE ONLY. Please message me to confirm if the room is available or not.
There is NO move in after 7 pm
There is a Flat share agreement to sign with us if you decide to confirm the booking with us, and a Hong Kong Government Stamp Duty to pay to the Hong Kong Government Tax which is usually less than HK$100 and a Key Deposit HK$500 which is refundable when you move out with us.
It is mandated by Hong Kong law that a tenant and landlord/principal tenant have to sign a tenancy agreement to make the deal legal.
Thank you for your understanding.

name: Fully equipped village house, perfect for 2 people
description:
It is a two room village house with furniture and fully equipped kitchen. It allows you to stay in Hongkong at an affordable price and have enough space for max. 4 people to sleep. It is perfect for two people and gets a bit tight with 3-4 but it is doable.
It is quiet, with a nice view & rooftop.
2 min walk to Sui Wo Court, 12 min walk to Fo Tan MTR, close to CUHK, direct bus to Tsim Sha Tsui & Kowloon Tong

The space
We live at this place and rent it out when we are out of town. It has basic facilities: a queen size bed and a double mattress that we put in the living room when we have guests, a washing machine, sink, shower, toilet, lots of kitchen stuff ... It is possible to stay here with 3-4 people but it will be a bit tight and requires that you move the mattress every morning etc.
We do not recommend to stay with 4 people but as we know how difficult and expensive it is to find space for 4 people we do not want to limit that option.
host_about: Hi I am Paul, visiting many places and occasionally renting out my place in HKG

This one bedroom apartment in Sheung Wan/Central is the perfect hideaway for a young couple or single person looking to explore everything that Hong Kong has to offer.

The space

This apartment is situated on the 5th floor of a walk-up building. Carrying heavy luggage up the stairs may be strenuous.

host_about: Hong Kong is a beautiful city, so vibrant and diverse. I have been living in Hong Kong since 2010. description:
This room is a private room with a semi-double bed, Bathrooms share in the common area with guests in the house. A Co-living Space has 4 rooms total with a common area. Our place situated in a 90s vintage building in the heart of the city. only take 1 minute to Jordan MTR. We love meeting friends around the world.

Click our profile picture to visit all our room types pictures from wish lists.

The space
We total have 3 shared bedrooms, 1 private semi-double bed room, shared bathrooms and comfortable common area, accommodate 14 people.

Just 1 minutes walk from MTR (subway) Jordan station. 5-8 minutes walk to supermarket, wet market, convenience store, pharmaceutical, bank, coffee shop and local restaurant.

Easy walk to featured tourist spots: Victoria Habour, Temple Street Night market, Jade market......Also worth to visit our Kowloon Park, Hong Kong Science Museum and Hong Kong Museum of History. More than 20 bus and mini-bus routes from the bus stations 3 mins away from the dorm.
host_about: We love traveling, we love meeting people, we love sharing ideas together. If you want to experience a real and local culture, come and join us for parties. We have an open kitchen and a large common area. The interior is newly renovated and designed by us.

name: Views, privacy,  on the  edge of Sai  Kung town
description:
Airy, open, elegant, quiet and very private apartment on the edge of Sai Kung. Stunning views of the town, Ma On Shan, and the Bay. A 5-10 minutes walk or minibus to shop, eat, drink, sightsee. Buses and taxis in the town make Shatin, Kowloon, the HKG Island , the MTR and the countryside extremely easy to access. Countryside walks start at the doorstep. My housekeeper lives upstairs and is always available to assist in small ways. Not suitable for children or pets.

The space
Peaceful. relaxing, fully air-conditioned, double glazed.
Quiet neighborhood despite being so close to town.
Free WIFI, Rooftop available for relaxing. (Weather dependent)
Views !
Maximum two people.
No smokers please.

Guest access
Main floor - bedroom bathroom, living room and kitchen/dinning.
Upstairs roof outside open uncovered area. with umbrella available if not windy

Other
neighborhood_overview: Real  village - somewhat  untidy  outside.  Not  posh yet lovely neighbours. Really  close to  a vibrant  town.  Buses to  the  underground/ and  most  parts  of  Hong  Kong and  the  country  park run constantly.   5  good supermarkets. Many  fresh  vegetable  and fruit  outlets,  excellent restaurants and bars, at  all price-points and styles.  Try the  seafood on the  waterfront,  the  wee Cafe Alley  for  coffee and snacks ,  the  small  local  bakery  for great  pineapple  buns  and custard tarts.  Pubs, resturants  in the  square  and  much  more. Many  walks and other water  and land sports  activities,  Great  accessible countryside, superb scenery.   Kai  Sai Chau golf course pier  part of the  scenery  and very  close.
host_about:
Retired,  I enjoy company,  the outdoors, gardening,  music  and anything sporty.

 I  have a  two  bedroom two  bathroom  fully  insulated  and  furnished  cottage   in France available  for  a minimum of  1 week  and maximum of  six months without  prior  agreement.  Also one  room available  for  a minimum of two  nights. Animals  welcome.

I  have an apartment  in Hong  Kong  available for  a minimum of two  nights throughout the   Hong  Kong  Summer and occasionally  at  other  times of the  year..

Details are  in each listing.

I  enjoy  travelling  and use  AirBnb as much  as possible. And love meeting  other  hosts and travellers.

name: Bunk in Modern, Safe Hostel- Meet & Mingle, TST â˜…
description:
Whether youâ€™re a seasoned backpacker or a first-timer, Atlas Hostel will exceed your expectations! The Bunk Dorm Room is perfect for travelers on a budget, offering:

â€¢ A comfortable bunk bed with curtains for privacy in a 4-bunk room
â€¢ Split-type AC to keep you cool
â€¢ Personal reading light and charging port
â€¢ A shared bathroom with soap and shampoo
â€¢ Free WiFi
â€¢ Unbeatable location on Nathan Rd

The space
Welcome backpackers, wanderers, & explorers!

A mixed dorm room at Atlas Hostel gives you a great opportunity to meet people from all around the worldâ€¦right in the middle of the action, surrounded by the endless restaurants, bars, shops, and landmarks of Tsim Sha Tsui.

Explore on your own or meet up with your bunkmates: feel the pulse of Hong Kong and soak up the vibrant, multicultural atmosphere of the city!

Combining all the essentials + those little extras that make you feel at home, youâ€™ll
neighborhood_overview: Located on Nathan Rd, directly across from Kowloon Park and the iconic Mosque, and just steps away from MTR Exit B1. Itâ€™s close to malls, museums, galleries, the Promenade, and the Harbour. You couldnâ€™t choose a better launching pad to explore the city!
host_about: Conveniently located on Nathan Road, along one of Hong Kongâ€™s main arteries, Atlas is a stylishly designed accommodation that keeps its guests firmly on the pulse of this bustling metropolis. No matter who you are â€“ a group of friends looking to bunk in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, a businessman ready to combine work with pleasure, or a family looking for safe, comfortable accommodations close to all the top attractions â€“ Atlas suits the needs of any traveller. Just 20 meters away from Tsim Sha Tsui MTR Station and a 10-minute stroll from the Star Ferry Pier, Atlas offer easy access to all of Hong Kongâ€™s popular areas, including Central, Mong Kok and Causeway Bay. Affordable rates and its unique style make Atlas one of the best deals in the city!

name: Stunning Large Studio + Terrace. 1min to MTR.
description:
A rare hidden gem in the heart of the city! Modern, bright, and spacious - this beautiful apartment comes with a large private terrace, and has everything you need for the most incredible stay. Perfect for family holidays, friends vacays, and business trips alike.

Nestled in THE coolest neighbourhood - Sheung Wan, with delicious local diners and award-winning coffee houses at your doorstep. 1 min walk to MTR, 3 min to Central & Soho, 10 min to the peak hike trail, 20 min cab ride to the beach!

The space
This open and spacious studio comes with its very own private terrace.

Wake up, slide open the large terrace doors and enjoy your morning coffee on the huge private terrace overlooking the hustle and bustle of the city below and surrounded by the skyscrapers of Sheung Wan and Central. The apartment comes with everything you need for a fantastic stay, and is a perfect retreat after a day exploring this incredible vibrant city.

Th
neighborhood_overview:
This gem of a modern apartment is located inside a wonderful and neighbourly old building, nestled in the heart of our absolutely favourite area of Hong Kong - Sheung Wan.

Sheung Wan is traditionally a residential neighbourhood famous for its seafood and dried chinese herb trade. Over the past years, the area has slowly gentrified into a wonderful mix of old-meets-new and east-meets-west. You will find award-winning coffee houses right next to rice shops with >50 years history. Local eateries right next to a French creperie.

It's a wonderful sight to see old locals reading newspaper with their pet birds in the little city-garden, whilst expat families leisurely stroll to their Sunday brunch.

We regularly update our guidebook with recommendations on places to eat / drink / have fun! If you have a special occasion or cravings in mind, please feel free to let us know and we'll send you our fav hidden gems!
host_about:
We moved to Hong Kong from London in summer 2013, and this incredible city has been our home ever since. Ryan is from London and Krystal is originally from Hong Kong.

We both run our own businesses and travel regularly for our jobs and for leisure of course! Blessed with the proximity to other fantastic places nearby, we have been busy travelling extensively around Asia ever since we arrived in HK, including Tibet, Nepal, Cambodia, Vietnam, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Japan, Bali etc. We will be more than happy to share travel tips if any guests are making a trip to other Asian countries too!

In our spare time, we enjoy going on the many fantastic hikes in HK, sipping iced tea and cold beer on the beach, yoga, jazz, good coffee, a good book, and spending time with our furry friends Lola & Rosie. 

You may also meet our lovely helper Jay (she's is from Philippine and enjoys volleyball and table tennis!), who helps us out when we are not around.

When we travel abroad we always use Airbnb. For us, a clean, comfortable and safe place to stay is essential. This is exactly what we offer to any guests staying with us. We hope that our place will be a little home-away-from-home for you during your time in HK.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Krystal and Ryan

Mier is located in the heart of one of Hong Kong's most fascinating districts and traditional prestigious residential area on No. 8 Hospital Road, Mid Levels. Just a 5-minute walk to access Sai Ying Pun MTR (exit C). The 24-storey serviced apartment building with 48 luxurious apartments provide 2 types of studio layout with size 470 sq.ft. Mier guests can indulge in a laidback lifestyle away from hustle and bustle of the city.

The space
This is a studio apartment. Apartment size is 470s.f. (gross) / 380s.f. (net) plus a personal terraced garden (around 150s.f.)

name: Chic Studios in Heart of the City - A
description:
This studio apartments are approximately 210 sqft, have double bed, 1 bathroom with separated shower, located in 4th floor with building lift, security key card access to main door and to your room, with natural light, work desk spacious and storage. Located in heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, a district decorated with Hong Kong's famous neon lights. Around the corner from the MTR and multiple bus links, supermarkets and shopping malls.

The space
We believe in comfortable and wholesome living. Our studios include generously sized bedrooms and bathrooms with natural light, sleep, work and storage spaces.

Other things to note
Amenities to enjoy:
Fully Furnished Studio Apartment
32â€ Samsung Smart HD Television
Air Conditioning
Refrigerator
Electric Kettle
In-Room Safe
Security Access Key Card
24/7 Video Security
High Speed Fiber-optic Internet with WiFi
neighborhood_overview: Tsim Sha Tsui is truly the heart of the city, decorated with Hong Kong's famous neon lights, it is energetic both day and night. We are located walking distance from the Museum of Art, The Space Museum, The 3D Museum, The Peninsula Hotel, K-11 Art Mall and the ever-bustling Knutsford Terrace which is filled with great dining and night life options. Only a short ride away, you can access the Temple Street Night Market, Mong Kok Electronics Market, The Ritz Carlton's famous  Ozone Bar, and of course Lan Kwai Fong - Hong Kong's renowned food and nightlife district.

neighborhood_overview:
A great area with a upbeat buzz of an environment. Close to Nathan Road (Main road with many types of accessible transport)

- This area has some influence by the community of Koreans who live and open restaurants here.

- Travel by public transport is convenient and efficient - 5 minutes walk from T.S.T MTR Exit B2 & Jordan MTR station Exit D.

- Knutsford Terrace / TST shopping district very close.

- Nearest supermarkets - 2 minute walk away (Wellcome supermarket open till midnight) 24 hour 7/11s and other convienience stores

- Nearest Laundry 20 second walk away from entrance - well priced and reliable. Collectable within half a day.

- A great vibe in the area where you'll find really authentic Korean, Japanese, Vietnamese, Western and, of course Chinese food. Chungking Mansions is also close-by with the Indian restaurants.

- Great selection of Local and Western bars and clubs around

- Lots of landm

description:
My modern apartment is about 300 sqft, newly renovated and decorated in western high standing design. My apartment is fully furnished with everything you'll need. It's located in the wonderful heart of busy Tsim Sha Tsui District. Trust me, you will love it!

The space
In my modern apartment you will find everything you need: a mini kitchen, a bathroom, a big 42" LED TV with local channels, high speed free WiFi 1000mbps (Fiber Optic), a comfortable 3 seats sofa, table, fridge, etc.
It is the best choice if you want to spend a lovely moment in Hong Kong. Note that bed in designed as Japanese tatami style.

Guest access

a very comfortable double size bed, "tatami Japanese style"
a big 42" LED TV with dozen of channels

host_about:
Hi everyone !!
My name is Kathy, I'm 27 year old, and I'm from Hong Kong.
I love traveling and meeting new people all around the world. I've been to many places already in Europe and Asia, and plan to go America as soon as I can
Tsim Sha Tsui is the best area for travelers as it's in the very center of HK. You can go everywhere from TST.
Hope you will enjoy my great studio and can't wait to meet you :)

neighborhood_overview:
Discovery Bay is a mixed residential and resort complex with 20,000 residents. The vast amount of open space and the beautiful beach have made Discovery Bay well known in Hong Kong. It is located just 2 km west of Hong Kong Disneyland Resort.
DB has a 24-hour transport system includes ferry services, a 25 minutes ride between DB and Central on Hong Kong island, and shuttle buses services to airport.
Supermarket â€“ 5 minutes' walk
Sandy beach â€“ 5 minutes' walk
Ferry pier - 5 minutes' walk
Bus Terminal- 3 minutes walk
Thanks and Hope youâ€™ll have a great Holiday

Keiro

name: Mongkok Luxury Studio, New Reno *4A
description:
Lovely walkup studio apartment on the fourth floor with kitchenette in the heart of Mongkok. Minutes away from numerous tourist attractions such as the Ladies Market and shopping malls, this is the perfect unit for any solo traveler. The unit is newly renovated as well!

The space
The apartment is a newly renovated studio located in a walkup building. While there is no elevator, we offer a paid service to have people help you with your luggage.

Guest access
The entire apartment is yours, along with a small kitchenette and a private bathroom.

Other things to note
Check In & Check Out:

Check in is anytime after 3PM. If you need the unit before then please let us know and we will check if
there is someone occupying the unit.

Check out is at 11AM daily and a later time can be arranged as long as there are no guests after.
host_about:
Thank you for checking out our listing! To let you know a little bit more about us, we run a service apartment company called Tane Residence. Currently, we operate more than 90 units in Hong Kong and over 20 units in Vietnam. We are rapidly expanding this network, opening between 20 to 30 new properties every year.

Our tastefully decorated apartments blends the best of worlds - homely comforts and modern design to offer a unique stay.  

We value offering our customers outstanding service, excellent experience and great value for money. With a team that works 7 days a week to answer emails and ensure the needs of our guests are taken care of, we are proud to offer top notch customer service support.

name: Female Dorm Bed#1/Wan Chai/close to MTR
description:
My place is close to everything travelers want. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the coziness, the comfy bed, and the views. Friendly staff is guaranteed. The China Visa Office is a block away!

The space
The hostel is located at the most convenient spot you can find. We are well connected to every part of HK. Tram, buses, MTR and Ferries are all available modes of transport from our hostel. Our staff are friendly and experienced and always willing to run the extra mile to make your stay an enjoyable one. For guests who need a visa run, we are next to many embassy offices, e.g. China Visa Office, Vietnam Embassy. We are also close to the IELTS exam centre and Hong Kong Convention & Exhibition centre.

Guest access
Guests are most welcome to use the air conditioned common areas anytime. The common area on the Reception Floor is new and comfy. There are smaller common areas on each floor as well.

Other things to note
There
neighborhood_overview: Wan Chai is for foodies! Why? Just look at the number of Michelin restaurants we have in our neighbourhood. Wan Chai is also an area with local colour (e.g. Blue House, Tai Yuen Street) but connected to the international part of HK, e.g. Central, Causeway Bay.
host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.

neighborhood_overview: Tsim Sha Tsui is truly the heart of the city, decorated with Hong Kong's famous neon lights, it is energetic both day and night. We are located walking distance from the Museum of Art, The Space Museum, The 3D Museum, The Peninsula Hotel, K-11 Art Mall and the ever-bustling Knutsford Terrace which is filled with great dining and night life options. Only a short ride away, you can access the Temple Street Night Market, Mong Kok Electronics Market, The Ritz Carlton's famous Ozone Bar, and of course Lan Kwai Fong - Hong Kong's renowned food and nightlife district.

name: Fabulous 2BR in the heart of HK
description:
This 2BR/1BA apartment is nestled in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui (TST) in a quiet corner, connected to the best food, travel and attractions.

i) 5 MTR stations in 10 mins. radius (TST/Jordan/Hung Hom/Austin/East TST); Central MTR station is 2 stops away
ii) 2 mins. walk to Knutsford Terrace for late night food and drinks;
iii) 10 mins. walk to HKâ€™s biggest shopping mall (Harbour City) and Avenue of Stars
iv) 7 mins. walk to Temple Street night market
v) 5 mins. walk to History & Science Museums

The space
The house is very comfortable, and ideal for a group of up-to 6 people. The master bedroom is huge by HK standards, with queen-sized bed and 2 side tables. The second bedroom has a sofa-cum-bed for 2 people and is equipped with a working desk, a television, ironing board & iron and some ethnic Indian and Japanese seating. The living room has 2 mattresses and 1 sofa-cum-bed (for 1 person). All rooms come equipped with air conditioner
neighborhood_overview:
1. Superb MTR connectivity. Closest station is Tsim Sha Tsui (Exit B1/B2), which is 5 minutes away. Jordan MTR station exit D is also 5 minutes away. Hung Hom MTR is 10 mins. walk away / 5 mins. taxi, and that connects directly to Shenzhen, China.
2. It is nestled in a quiet corner, so, one can be guaranteed a peaceful night.
3. A host of restaurants and bars are just 2 minutes away in Knutsford Terrace serving a multitude of cuisines (Korean, Chinese, Turkish, Spanish, Italian, Japanese, Indian, Thai, Mexican, Vietnamese, Australian etc.)
4. HK's biggest shopping mall (Harbour City) is 10-12 minutes away.
5. Major tourist attractions of Avenue of Stars, Temple Street night market in a 10 minute walking radius.
6. HK History and Science museums are 5 minutes away.
7. The house is surrounded by plenty of 7-elevens and 3 supermarkets, one of which is open 24x7.
host_about: I am a collector of memories. Travel has shaped how I live and how I approach hosting and meeting people. I love to learn about new cultures, food, and different parts of the world. Moreover, I am intrigued by what people are seeking when they travel. Are you here to fill-up scrapbooks, collect business cards, or multiply your (Hidden by Airbnb) / (Hidden by Airbnb) followers? Whatever it is that you seek, you will find me all ears and full of suggestions to help make it that much worthwhile your time. Come. Stay. Share. And, enjoy!

name: Designer Apt w/ Terrace & Balcony
description:
Modern and comfortable 1-bedroom flat decorated with designer furnitures. Located on the 1st floor in a quiet lane right next to the Man Mo Temple in Sheung Wan, surrounded by trendy cafes and antic shops/arts galleries. 5 minutes walk from Soho/Central, 20 meters from the bus stop and 6-7 minutes walk from Sheung Wan MTR station.

The space
Our 1 bedroom flat is nice, comfortable and well equipped.
You will love taking a sunny breakfast on one of the 2 external spaces, the balcony on the front and the terrace on the back.
The kitchen offers many types of appliance (espresso machine, induction hobs, oven, blender, toaster, kettle...) as well as all necessary hand dishes, crockery, cutlery, pots, pans and other kitchen utensils.
Use our media center to enjoy our collection of hundreds of films and series or simply plug your computer to the big LCD screen and sound system to play your own media.
The bed is big and comfortable and the bedroom offe
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in the upper Sheung Wan, just next to the Man Mo Temple, one of the major tourist attractions in Hong Kong.
This area is probably the best in town. It is surrounded by antic shops, art galleries, trendy cafes and restaurants and the typical flea market.
There are also several supermarkets just a few blocks away.
Although the flat is at a walking distance from the buzzing central and its bars, restaurants and nightclubs, it is located in a small and calm lane with very few traffic.

description:
Beautifully decorated home in a quiet and safe area away from the city in Tin Shui Wai. Just a 2 min walk from Light Rail Transport and 5 minute walk from a bus taking you straight to Central in 35 minutes.

Shared living, dining and kitchen with me and my mother.

The space
Our home as been lovingly decorated with characterful interior. Perfect for a family with a balcony overlooking a park.

The building area is extremely safe with friendly guards all around including the lobby and entrance to the estate.

Guest access

neighborhood_overview:
Tin Shui Wai is a quiet, extremely safe and residential area of Hong Kong which is a great getaway from the hustle of Hong Kong. Wetland Park is a mere 5 minutes away from our home which serves as a perfect day out.

There is also a 7-11, supermarket, local restaurant and beauty/drug store a 5 -7 min walk from the building.

The space

host_about:
Thank you for checking out our listing! To let you know a little bit more about us, we run a service apartment company called Tane Residence. Currently, we operate more than 90 units in Hong Kong and over 20 units in Vietnam. We are rapidly expanding this network, opening between 20 to 30 new properties every year.

Our tastefully decorated apartments blends the best of worlds - homely comforts and modern design to offer a unique stay.  

We value offering our customers outstanding service, excellent experience and great value for money. With a team that works 7 days a week to answer emails and ensure the needs of our guests are taken care of, we are proud to offer top notch customer service support.

name: Convenient 2 bedroom spacious flat with view
description:
A quiet and peaceful 2 bedroom flat with beautiful sea views and Disneyland fireworks each evening. Only a 8 minutes walk to the DB ferry pier, supermarket, restaurants and the beach. 25 minutes to Central (by ferry) and the airport (by direct bus).
Unfortunately no kids under 10 yrs old please (due to prior experience) as this is my own home that I Airbnb when I am overseas.

The space
This is a beautifully decorated 2 bedroom flat with a 4 seater dining table, 2 seater sofa and poang chair. Fully fitted kitchen.

Guest access
Guests are able to use all part of the flat, main living room, bathroom, kitchen and both bedrooms. Minimal wardrobe space available.

Other things to note
Free WiFi but no TV available.
neighborhood_overview: Discovery Bay is a spacious, quiet and friendly neighbourhood popular for families and foreigners coming from abroad because of the peacefulness and green surroundings and the close proximity to Hong Kong Island and many tourist attractions (Disneyland, South Lantau beaches and hikes, The Buddha).
host_about:
My life motto is "Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass, its about learning to dance in the rain".  I love places that are off the beaten track,  the harder it is to get to the more rewarding a place can be.  Alexander McCall Smith is one of my favourite authors (I have almost all of his books in my home). I am very house proud and keep things neat and tidy. 
5 things I can't live without are:  Sunglasses (I like to go where the sun shines), a sarong, camera (or iPhone), my hula hoop and my blender for fresh fruit smoothies.
neighbourhood: Discovery Bay , Lantau Island, Hong Kong

neighborhood_overview:
This flat is in a vibrant neighborhood. Downstairs, there are many shops and restaurants where you can sample the local cuisine, as well as a supermarket. Many eating options, and souvenirs too, are also available in the famous Temple Street Night Market, located just five minutes away on foot. Make sure to look for Tin Hau Temple, one of the oldest temples in the neighborhood and a major landmark. It is north of the expressway. And while you are in the neighborhood, make sure you do not miss the Jade Market off Kansu Street. It is also nearby.

For a luxury shopping experience, walk 10 minutes to Tsim Sha Tsuiâ€™s Canton Road, or walk to the Elements mall, located just ten minutes away under the ICC, Hong Kongâ€™s tallest building. You can even top off a trip to the mall with a visit to the ICCâ€™s Ozone, the worldâ€™s highest bar. The view from the 118th floor is stunning. Round off your trip with a short MTR ride to Tsim Sha Tsui. Thatâ€™s where the best nighttime harbor views are f

The Sheung Wan & Sai Ying Pun MTR stations are a 5 min walk away.

description:
Hi there, this beautifully-appointed, conveniently-located designer apartment is spanking new. I finished renovating it for myself just as I had to leave for work overseas.
And now you get to stay in it.

The location is also super fantastic! It is only 3 minutes walk to Jordan station.

The space
The space is carefully appointed with Venetian plaster, glass mirror and marble. Its high end finishes is a part a move others.

Guest access
It is fitted with the best modern conveniences. Netflix, wireless B&W speakers...
All blinds are motorised and operated by a remote, 'yale' electronic door locks, full kitchen boasts De Dietrich oven, microwave and induction cooktops, elica rangehood, full fridge, 42 inch Samsung smart TV, mood lighting, and the place is air conditioned.

Other things to note
Lots of awesome food and bars around that you must explore. Very close to temple street market.
host_about:
Hi there everyone! I'm Julian and spend my time between Australia, Hong Kong and other places I travel to.
I love travelling and meeting people from all around the world.
One of the greatest joy with travelling and sharing great travel experiences with others- and Hong Kong is without doubt one of my favourite places on the planets.
I look forward to sharing this unique amazing city with you. I look forward to being your HK host.

host_about:
Thank you for checking out our listing! To let you know a little bit more about us, we run a service apartment company called Tane Residence. Currently, we operate more than 90 units in Hong Kong and over 20 units in Vietnam. We are rapidly expanding this network, opening between 20 to 30 new properties every year.

Our tastefully decorated apartments blends the best of worlds - homely comforts and modern design to offer a unique stay.  

We value offering our customers outstanding service, excellent experience and great value for money. With a team that works 7 days a week to answer emails and ensure the needs of our guests are taken care of, we are proud to offer top notch customer service support.
