name: A Gem Stand Alone House For Long Stay
description:
Come relax and unwind in a rare cool two-story freestanding village house. It sleeps 4-5 guests with 2 private gardens to enjoy the lush green surroundings. Enjoy the nearby beach, BBQ, hiking, biking, waterfalls. We are a 20 minute mountain view walk or a 10 minute quick bike ride from the Mui Wo ferry pier. This Getaway is perfect for couples, families, business travelers, and solo adventurers looking for a unique getaway experience

The space
We welcome you to our 2 story stand alone private house. Every window looks out into lush green vegetation. There is a bathroom on each floor. A fully outfitted custom kitchen and full size fridge, great for preparing meals . We have Vitamix for smoothies. The upstairs lounge is a great place to catch up on reading or take a well deserved nap. The bedrooms are comfy with lovely green views. We also stock several board games for fun time indoors.

Guest access
As our guest you will have full access t
neighborhood_overview: Our village as a very quite authentic local village with a nice mix of locals and expats. You have continuous mountain views and a great setting to relax. Even though the area varies in background and age I think it is safe to say we all love and respect the incredible nature and lifestyle here and we know you will too!
host_about: We are a creative family. I work as a consultant in the Fashion industry and Greg is a musician. We live in the US and Asia.
neighbourhood: Mui Wo, Lantau Island, Hong Kong

name: Mixed Dorm Bed#C/Wan Chai/close to MTR
description:
My place is close to everything travelers want. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the coziness, the comfy bed, and the views. Friendly staff is guaranteed. The China Visa Office is a block away!

The space
The hostel is located at the most convenient spot you can find. We are well connected to every part of HK. Tram, buses, MTR and Ferries are all available modes of transport from our hostel. Our staff are friendly and experienced and always willing to run the extra mile to make your stay an enjoyable one. For guests who need a visa run, we are next to many embassy offices, e.g. China Visa Office, Vietnam Embassy. We are also close to the IELTS exam centre and Hong Kong Convention & Exhibition centre.

Guest access
Guests are most welcome to use the air conditioned common areas anytime. The common area on the Reception Floor is new and comfy. There are smaller common areas on each floor as well.

Other things to note
There
neighborhood_overview: Wan Chai is for foodies! Why? Just look at the number of Michelin restaurants we have in our neighbourhood. Wan Chai is also an area with local colour (e.g. Blue House, Tai Yuen Street) but connected to the international part of HK, e.g. Central, Causeway Bay.
host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.

name: STUDIO in Tsmishatsui (T6e)
description:
7-8 mins walk to MTR
2/F walk up building without lift
with private bathroom

- Double Bed + wardrobe + desk with chair
- Fully furnished
- Air-conditioning
- Refrigerator, Microwave, Hot Plate, WIFI internet, etc.
All you need is a suitcase to move in!

The electricity is not included

Other things to note
Please note, there is a HK$500 key deposit (Refundable) will be collected before move in and will sign a flatshare agreement with us at our office.
Also, there will be a Hong Kong Stamp Duty Tax that need to pay to the government, is not alot, less than HK$80.
Electricity not included. Will be calculated pro-rated shared with other flatmates.
Thank you

name: comfy home close to city center
description:
The apartment is walking distance to Soho, Central, Hong Kong park, as well as the Sheung Wan MTR and all the main urban attractions. It is in a nice hip area; quiet at night. There are many cafes and eateries around it as well as local food markets.

The space
There is one bedroom in the apartment with a double bed which can sleep two people. Additional guests can sleep on the spare (mobile) bed as well as on the couch in absolute comfort in the living room. Relax in the bathtub after a long day of roaming the city. There is a filtered water tap in the kitchen, so you'll never get thirsty.

Guest access
Guests have easy access by foot to all the tourist destinations as well as the ferry piers,Macau ferry terminal and Sheung Wan and Central MTR stations as well as the central hub full of bars and restaurants including Lan Kwai Fong and Soho.

name: Perfect Retreat in Heart of City. 30sec to MTR.
description:
A little piece of heaven in the heart of the hustle & bustle of the city! This large and modern studio has a proper dining area and fully equipped kitchen - if you fancy cooking a storm with fresh ingredients from the local markets just next door!

Nestled in the heart of THE coolest HK neighbourhood - Sheung Wan - with delicious local diners and award-winning coffee houses at your doorstep. 1 min walk to MTR, 3 min to Central & Soho, 10 min to the peak hike trail, 20 min cab ride to the beach!

The space
Tastefully refurbished, this large and modern studio is the perfect home-away-from-home.

The open living area comes with properly sectioned living, dining, kitchen, and sleeping area.

The living space comes with a large and comfy sofabed, coffee table, and a large screen TV with plenty of local and international news and movies channels. Perfect for those rainy or lazy days when you just want to take it easy :)

The dini
neighborhood_overview:
This gem of a modern apartment is located inside a wonderful and neighbourly old building, nestled in the heart of our absolutely favourite area of Hong Kong - Sheung Wan. It's tucked away in a quiet corner just a strong throw from Central, so that Lan Kwai Fong, and Soho is only a few min walk away. Yet you can still retreat to this lovely home away from the hustle & bustle of the city.

Sheung Wan is traditionally a residential neighbourhood famous for its seafood and dried chinese herb trade. Over the past years, the area has slowly gentrified into a wonderful mix of old-meets-new and east-meets-west. You will find award-winning coffee houses right next to rice shops with >50 years history. Local eateries right next to a French creperie.

It's a wonderful sight to see old locals reading newspaper with their pet birds in the little city-garden, whilst expat families leisurely stroll to their Sunday brunch.

We regularly update our guidebook with recomme
host_about:
We moved to Hong Kong from London in summer 2013, and this incredible city has been our home ever since. Ryan is from London and Krystal is originally from Hong Kong.

We both run our own businesses and travel regularly for our jobs and for leisure of course! Blessed with the proximity to other fantastic places nearby, we have been busy travelling extensively around Asia ever since we arrived in HK, including Tibet, Nepal, Cambodia, Vietnam, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Japan, Bali etc. We will be more than happy to share travel tips if any guests are making a trip to other Asian countries too!

In our spare time, we enjoy going on the many fantastic hikes in HK, sipping iced tea and cold beer on the beach, yoga, jazz, good coffee, a good book, and spending time with our furry friends Lola & Rosie. 

You may also meet our lovely helper Jay (she's is from Philippine and enjoys volleyball and table tennis!), who helps us out when we are not around.

When we travel abroad we always use Airbnb. For us, a clean, comfortable and safe place to stay is essential. This is exactly what we offer to any guests staying with us. We hope that our place will be a little home-away-from-home for you during your time in HK.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Krystal and Ryan
neighbourhood: Sheung Wan, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

name: Mongkok Luxury Studio, New Reno *5B
description:
Lovely fifth floor walkup studio apartment with kitchenette in the heart of Mongkok. Minutes away from numerous tourist attractions such as the Ladies Market and shopping malls, this is the perfect unit for a couple. The unit is newly renovated as well!

The space
The apartment is a newly renovated studio located in a walkup building. While there is no elevator, we offer a paid service to have people help you with your luggage.

Guest access
The entire apartment is yours, along with a small kitchenette and a private bathroom.

Other things to note
Check In & Check Out:

Check in is anytime after 3PM. If you need the unit before then please let us know and we will check if
there is someone occupying the unit.

Check out is at 11AM daily and a later time can be arranged as long as there are no guests after.
host_about:
Thank you for checking out our listing! To let you know a little bit more about us, we run a service apartment company called Tane Residence. Currently, we operate more than 90 units in Hong Kong and over 20 units in Vietnam. We are rapidly expanding this network, opening between 20 to 30 new properties every year.

Our tastefully decorated apartments blends the best of worlds - homely comforts and modern design to offer a unique stay.  

We value offering our customers outstanding service, excellent experience and great value for money. With a team that works 7 days a week to answer emails and ensure the needs of our guests are taken care of, we are proud to offer top notch customer service support.

name: Bedroom only in SHARED convenient & spacious  home
description:
My place is close to great views, parks, the beach, and restaurants and dining. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the views, the location. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The space
You are booking one of my bedrooms ONLY, not the whole flat, in a 2 bedroom flat.

One bathroom to share with myself and the living room and kitchen space.

I have a beautiful balcony with chairs and table to enjoy your breakfast or afternoon cup of tea.
host_about:
My life motto is "Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass, its about learning to dance in the rain".  I love places that are off the beaten track,  the harder it is to get to the more rewarding a place can be.  Alexander McCall Smith is one of my favourite authors (I have almost all of his books in my home). I am very house proud and keep things neat and tidy. 
5 things I can't live without are:  Sunglasses (I like to go where the sun shines), a sarong, camera (or iPhone), my hula hoop and my blender for fresh fruit smoothies.

description:
Welcome to my apartment, 3BR newly renovated and furnished. Located in the heart of Hong Kong's shopping, food and culture center. 1 minute walk to TST MTR station, airport transfer and all major transport.

My place is close to the city center, parks, center of performing arts and culture. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the location, the people, the ambiance, and the neighborhood.

The space
Newly renovated and furnished 3 bedroom apartment. Conveniently located and very quiet. All decorations and fittings have been completed.

Our Cozy 3 bedroom apartment for 2-9 people is located in the heart of Kowloon (on Nathan Road), and just next to the Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station, 1 min walk from the entrance to the MTR!! The location is incredibly convenient.

Air-Conditioner

neighborhood_overview:
Tsim Sha Tsui is the cityâ€™s most exciting area, with top notch museums such as The Science Museum and Art Museum clustered around the waterfront. Nathan Road, Chungking Mansions and the Avenue of Stars, the latter boasting the best views in town.

Although the apartment is in a vibrant area, the apartment itself is very quite a night. Its a perfect escape after a long day out and about.

There are over 2,500 restaurants in the area which cater to every taste, from traditional Chinese Dim Sum, hawker style stall foods to exceptional French cuisine within 5 star hotels.

Supermarkets and 24/7 convenience stores are just down the road, which can provide you all of your daily necessities any time day or night.
host_about:
Loves to travel and see the world.  Over recent years, I've travelled to London, Amsterdam, Paris, LA, San Francisco, Taiwan, Shanghai, Beijing, Australia, India, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, and Korea.  However, there is no place like home.

That is why I want to be a great host and have you enjoy your holiday.  Welcome fellow travellers.

host_about:
Thank you for checking out our listing! To let you know a little bit more about us, we run a service apartment company called Tane Residence. Currently, we operate more than 90 units in Hong Kong and over 20 units in Vietnam. We are rapidly expanding this network, opening between 20 to 30 new properties every year.

Our tastefully decorated apartments blends the best of worlds - homely comforts and modern design to offer a unique stay.  

We value offering our customers outstanding service, excellent experience and great value for money. With a team that works 7 days a week to answer emails and ensure the needs of our guests are taken care of, we are proud to offer top notch customer service support.

name: Awesome Self-Contained Studio in LKF Central.
description:
Nestled in the famous Lan Kwai Fong area in Central - the beating heart of Hong Kong - you can't get better location than this!

This modern studio has everything you need for a great stay in HK. Comfy queen bed, fully equipped kitchenette, even a washer-dryer. Super popular amongst both short & long term guests - whether you're here for a solo citybreak, couple getaway, or a biz trip!

Delicious local diners, Michelin starred restaurants, amazing cafes all at your door step. 5min to MTR.

The space
Located in the beating heart of LKF Central, this self-contained studio is the perfect showcase of optimised compact city-living in Hong Kong (in a cosy 150 sqft apt) !

The living / sleeping space comes with a comfy queen sized bed and a large wardrobe. A drop-leaf desk is perfect for those who need to do a bit of work from home during their stay. We've also installed cable TV with plenty of local and international news and movies channe
neighborhood_overview:
Location, location, location! You can't get better location than this cosy little gem in Hong Kong. The studio is located inside an apartment block with over 40 years history, a neighbourly building that survived amidst a rapidly gentrifying jungle of new high-rises.

A little square located in the heart of the Central business district of Hong Kong, Lan Kwai Fong (LKF) is a little stretch comprises of uphill cobbled streets - home to over 100 restaurants and bars. A nightlife hotspot for locals and expats alike, this is the perfect place to start your HK trip whatever you are in the mood for. A hearty bowl of wonton noodle? Head to Tsim Chai Kee. A glass of champagne at a roof-top bar? CÃ‰ LA VI is just across the road. Dinner at a 3-starred Michelin restaurant? There are 4 within 10 min walk away. Or a cup of award-winner coffee to wake up after an overnight flight? Head downstairs to Coffee Academics

We regularly update our guidebook with recommendations on plac
host_about:
We moved to Hong Kong from London in summer 2013, and this incredible city has been our home ever since. Ryan is from London and Krystal is originally from Hong Kong.

We both run our own businesses and travel regularly for our jobs and for leisure of course! Blessed with the proximity to other fantastic places nearby, we have been busy travelling extensively around Asia ever since we arrived in HK, including Tibet, Nepal, Cambodia, Vietnam, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Japan, Bali etc. We will be more than happy to share travel tips if any guests are making a trip to other Asian countries too!

In our spare time, we enjoy going on the many fantastic hikes in HK, sipping iced tea and cold beer on the beach, yoga, jazz, good coffee, a good book, and spending time with our furry friends Lola & Rosie. 

You may also meet our lovely helper Jay (she's is from Philippine and enjoys volleyball and table tennis!), who helps us out when we are not around.

When we travel abroad we always use Airbnb. For us, a clean, comfortable and safe place to stay is essential. This is exactly what we offer to any guests staying with us. We hope that our place will be a little home-away-from-home for you during your time in HK.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Krystal and Ryan

neighborhood_overview: Interesting sightseeing spots in the Tsuen Wan area such as Sam Tung Uk Museum, a restored 200-year-old walled rural village, the Buddhist Western Monastery, and the Yuen Yuen Institute.
host_about:
Discover the new and old of the city - Dorsett Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong offers you excellence in both its facilities and location. With 30 minutes drive from the airport and Hong Kong Disneyland, and just a short walk to the nearest underground metro station, you can venture further with our complimentary shuttle services connecting you to Kwai Fong MTR, Tsing Yi Airport Express station and city centre Tsim Sha Tsui shopping district. Afterwards, relax and dine at our international cafe or unwind in our well-equipped gym and the outdoor pool. For families travelling with kids, you must visit our indoor interactive children play area - Kids Zone, newly opened in April 2019, offering 5 themed play areas i.e. â€œSuper Heroâ€, â€œBall Pit Roomâ€, â€œFire Stationâ€, â€œPrincess Royal Partyâ€ & â€œMini Townâ€, with scheduled kids programs for the whole family to enjoy.
Hotel features 546 guest rooms including special rooms and suites tailor for family travel such as Triple Rooms with one double and one single bed, Family Quad Rooms with 2 queen-sized beds & One-Bedroom Suites with sofa bed as well as 4 beautifully designed Themed Rooms (Animal Circus, Fairy Forest, Princess World & Traveler's Dream); all equipped with a 4G smartphone offering WIFI hotspot, free local calls and IDD calls at selected countries.

Our tastefully decorated apartments blends the best of worlds - homely comforts and modern design to offer a unique stay.

host_about:
*~Welcome to Winky's Homestay ~*
We are Winkyâ€™s family who are hospitable and gracious. We speak Cantonese, Mandarin, English, un peu Francais and Deutsch.  Winky, our super Boss, who is a lovely and friendly husky :) 

We like travelling and meeting friends. We would love to meet locals when we go on a trip through Airbnb. At the same time we would like to share our house at an affordable price on this platform. We hope to meet friends from all over the world. Hope we can host you like what you feel at your home.

We and our partners have few apartments with more than 50rooms in Cheungchau , one is 3000 sq.ft with two hostel style bedrooms, living room, common area, two bathrooms, a garden and a swimming pool. We welcome single travellers to stay in our dorm with a bulk bed. 

Our 400 sq.ft. Home-style apartment is with double beds and a single folding bed, bathroom.
We also have double private rooms, deluxe double with seaview , twin and triple rooms, dorm rooms. 
So you can check which room suits you and feel free to ask us question:)

Our houses are located on a beautiful island-Cheungchau. If you like nature,beach,hiking,cycling,local food, nice people, you must come and visit. Here is far different from what you know about HK^_^ 

It takes around 30-50mins ferry from Central to CheungChau island, 20-30mins from Peng Chau and Lantau.

We are willing to show you around our 
island and introduce our city HK to you. We hope our guests have a bit different during their journey on our island.
Our family like meeting new friends as much as we do, we welcome you to join our family dinner. Enjoy local cuisine and share our happiness:)))

host_about: Tokyo is a great place to come and people from all over the world visit here making it a truly international city.  I love Tokyo and seeing the amazing sights and people.  It is a great place to explore and every day can be different.  This is an awesome destination for walkers and wanders filled with friendly people, tasty restaurants, and plenty of lights.   My tip is to make the initial contact with Japanese people because they are typically shy at first.   They will be happy to try to practice their English with you.
